analyzed: teyeva paccayā suṭṭhu katvā paṭisaṅkharitvā laddhā ati ādara gārava yogena sakkaccam

original: abhisaṅkharitvā dānavasena upanayavasena laddhā. Vaṇṇabhaṇananti guṇakittanaṃ. Assāti tapassino.

analyzed: vodāsanti byāsanam vibhajjananti tam pana ittha vibhajjanam dvidhā

original: 62. Tapaṃ karotīti bhāvanāmanasikāralakkhaṇaṃ tapaṃ carati caranto viya hoti. Caṅkamaṃ otarati bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto viya. Vihāraṅgaṇaṃ sammajjati vattapaṭipattiṃ pūrento viya.

analyzed: a ruccamānam ti attanaḥ siddhante paṭikkhitta bhāvena a ruccamānam ruccati mā iti kappati

original: 63. Kujjhanasīlatāya kodhano. Vuttalakkhaṇo upanāho etassa atthīti upanāhī. Evaṃbhūto ca taṃsamaṅgī hotīti “samannāgato hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi.
analyzed: kujjhana sīla tāya kodhanaḥ vutta lakkhaṇo upanāhaḥ etassa atthi iti upanāhī evaṃbhūto ca tad samaṅgī hoti iti samannāgataḥ hoti iti vuttam esa nayaḥ itas paresu pi

original: Guṇehi samānaṃ, adhikañca atikkamitvā nihīnaṃ katvā maññanasīlatāya atimānī. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatthikatāsaṅkhātā
analyzed: guṇehi samānam adhikam ca atikkamitvā nihīnam katvā maññana sīla tāya atimānī asanta guṇa sambhāvanatthika tā saṅkhātā

original: Yanti yaṃ kathetabbadhammaṃ anupadhāretvā, tadatthañca appaccakkhaṃ katvā kathanaṃ,

original: etaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇaṃ tassa bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā. Vicchindajananatthanti
analyzed: etam aṭṭhānam akāraṇam tassa bodhi mūlā iya iva vicchinda janana ttham

original: ratanattayasaddhāya vicchindassa uppādanatthaṃ, aññathattāyāti attho. Soti māro.
analyzed: ratanattaya saddhāya vicchindassa uppādana attham aññathattāya ati attho saḥ ti māro

original: Musāvādaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhīti āgataphalassa ariyasāvakassa purato musā vattuṃ na visahi,
analyzed: musāvādam kātum na asakkhi iti āgata phalassa ariya sāvakassa puratas musā vattum na visahi

original: tasmā āma mārosmīti paṭijāni. Silāpathaviyanti ratanamayasilāpathaviyaṃ. Sineruṃ
analyzed: tasmai mārosmi iti paṭijāni silāpatha viyanti ratana maya silāpatha viyam sinerum

original: kira parivāretvā ṭhito bhūmippadeso sattaratanamayo, “suvaṇṇamayo”ti keci, sā vitthārato,
analyzed: kira parivāretvā ṭhitaḥ bhūmi ppadesaḥ satta ratana mayo suvaṇṇa mayaḥ ti keci sā vitthārato

original: ubbedhato anekayojanasahassaparimāṇā ativiya niccalā. Kiṃ tvaṃ etthāti kiṃ kāraṇā
analyzed: ubbedhataḥ aneka yojana sahassa parimāṇā niccalā kim tvam ettha ati kim kāraṇā

original: tvaṃ ettha. “Ṭhito”ti accharaṃ pahari. Ṭhātuṃ asakkontoti ariyasāvakassa purato ṭhātuṃ
analyzed: tvam ettha ṭhitaḥ ti accharam pahari ṭhātum a sakkonto ti ariya sāvakassa puratas ṭhātum

original: asakkonto. Ayañhi ariyadhammādhigamassa ānubhāvo, yaṃ māropi nāma mahānubhāvo ujukaṃ
analyzed: a sakkontaḥ ayam hi ariya dhamma adhigamassa ānubhāvaḥ yam mā āropi nāma mahā anubhāvaḥ ujukam

original: paṭipparituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: paṭipparitum na sakkoti

original: Maggo eva mūlaṃ maggamūlaṃ, tassa. Sañjātattā uppannattā. Tena maggamūlena patiṭṭhitasantāne
analyzed: maggaḥ eva mūlam magga mūlam tassa sañjāta ttā uppanna ttā tena magga mūlena patiṭṭhita santāne

analyzed: laddha patiṭṭhāḥ bhagavataḥ desanā dhammam nissāya ariyāya jātiyā jātaḥ bhagavantam

original: nissāya ariyabhūmiyaṃ jāto”ti vutto. “Ure vasitvā”ti idaṃ dhammaghosassa urato samuṭṭhānatāya
analyzed: nissāya ariya bhūmiyam jātaḥ ti vutto ure vasitvā ti idam dhammaghosassa uratas samuṭṭhāna tāya

original: vuttaṃ. Ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya vā oraso. Mukhato jātena jāto “mukhato jāto”ti
analyzed: vuttam vāyāma janita abhijāti tāya vai orasaḥ mukhataḥ jātena jātaḥ mukhataḥ jātaḥ iti

original: vutto. Kāraṇakāraṇepi hi kāraṇe viya vohāro hoti “tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddha”nti. Keci
analyzed: vuttaḥ kāraṇa kāraṇe api hi kāraṇe viya vohāraḥ hoti tiṇehi bhattam siddhanti keci

original: pana “vimokkhamukhassa vasena jātattā mukhato jāto”ti vadanti, tatthāpi vuttanayeneva
analyzed: pana vimokkha mukhassa vasena jāta ttā mukhataḥ jātaḥ ti vadanti tattha api vutta nayena iva

original: attho veditabbo. Purimenatthena yonijo, sedajo, mukhajoti tīsu sambandhesu mukhajena
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ purimena atthena yoni jaḥ seda jaḥ mukha jaḥ iti tīsu sambandhesu mukha jena

original: sambandhena bhagavato puttabhāvo vibhāvito. Atthadvayenāpi dhammajabhāvoyeva dīpito.
analyzed: sambandhena bhagavato putta bhāvaḥ vibhāvitaḥ attha dvayena api dīpito

original: Ariyadhammappattito laddhaviseso hutvā pavatto taduttarakāliko khandhasantāno “ariyadhammato
analyzed: ariya dhamma ppattitaḥ laddha visesaḥ hutvā pavattaḥ tad uttara kālikaḥ khandha santānaḥ ariya dhammato

original: jāto”ti veditabbo, ariyadhammaṃ vā maggaphalaṃ nissāya, upanissāya ca jāto sabbopi

analyzed: dhamma ppabandhaḥ ariya dhammataḥ jātaḥ ti gahetabbo tesam pana ariya dhammānam a pariyosita kicca tāya

original: ariyabhāvena abhinibbattimattaṃ upādāya “ariyadhammato jātattā”ti vuttaṃ. Pariyositakiccatāya
analyzed: ariya bhāvena abhinibbattimattam upādāya ariya dhammataḥ jāta ttā ti vuttam pariyosita kicca tāya

original: tathā nibbattipāripūriṃ upādāya “nimmitattā”ti vuttaṃ, yato “dhammajo dhammanimmito”ti
analyzed: tathā nibbatti pāripūrim upādāya nimmita ttā iti vuttam yatas dhamma jaḥ dhamma nimmito ti

original: vuttaṃ. “Navalokuttaradhammadāyaṃ ādiyatīti dhammadāyādo” tipi pāṭho. Assāti “bhagavatomhiputto”tiādinā
analyzed: vuttam nava lokuttara dhamma dāyam ādiyati iti dhamma dāyādaḥ tipi pāṭhaḥ assa ti

original: vuttassa vākyassa. Atthaṃ dassentoti bhāvatthaṃ pakāsento. Tathāgatassa anaññasādhāraṇasīlādidhammakkhandhassa
analyzed: vuttassa vākyassa attham dassento ti bhāva attham pakāsento tathāgatassa anañña sādhāraṇa sīla ādi dhamma kkhandhassa

original: samūhanivesavasena dhammakāyatāya na kiñci vattabbaṃ atthi, satthuṭṭhāniyassa pana
analyzed: samūha nivesa vasena dhamma kāya tāya na kiñci vattabbam atthi satthuṭṭhāniyassa pana

analyzed: tathāgataḥ hi itiādinā tam attham vissajja iti hadayena cintetvā ati imam dhammam imassa

original: desessāmī”ti tassa upagatassa veneyyajanassa bodhanatthaṃ cittena cintetvā. Vācāya
analyzed: desessāmi iti tassa upagatassa veneyya janassa bodhana attham cittena cintetvā vācāya

original: abhinīharīti saddhammadesanāvācāya karavīkarutamañjunā brahmassarena veneyyasantānābhimukhaṃ
analyzed: abhinīharīti saddhamma desanā vācāya karavīka ruta mañjunā brahmassarena veneyya santāna abhimukham

original: tadajjhāsayānurūpaṃ hitamatthaṃ nīhari upanesi. Tenāti tena kāraṇena evaṃsaddhammādhimuttibhāvena.
analyzed: tad ajjhāsayā anurūpam hitam attham nīhari upanesi tena ati tena kāraṇena evaṃsaddhamma adhimutti bhāvena

original: Assāti tathāgatassa. Dhammamayattāti dhammabhūtattā. Idhādhippetadhammo seṭṭhaṭṭhena
analyzed: assa ati tathāgatassa dhamma maya ttā ati dhamma bhūta ttā idha adhippeta dhammo seṭṭha aṭṭhena

analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ ti āha dhamma kāyattā eva brahma kāyo ti sabbasas adhammam pajahitvā anavasesato

original: arahatīti āha “dhammasabhāvo”ti.
analyzed: arahati iti āha dhamma sabhāvaḥ ti

original: 119. Seṭṭhacchedakavādanti “brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo”ti evaṃ vuttaseṭṭhabhāvacchedakavādaṃ.
analyzed: seṭṭha chedaka vādam ti brāhmaṇaḥ uva seṭṭhaḥ evam vutta seṭṭha bhāva chedaka vādam

analyzed: aparena api nayena ati yathā vutta seṭṭha chedaka vādataḥ aparena api porāṇaka loka uppatti dassana nayena

original: Seṭṭhaccheda…pe… dassetunti sopi hi “brāhmaṇova seṭṭho vaṇṇo, hīnā aññe vaṇṇā”ti,
analyzed: seṭṭha chedape dassetunti saḥ api hi brāhmaṇaḥ uva seṭṭhaḥ vaṇṇaḥ hīnāḥ aññe vaṇṇāti

original: Itthabhāvanti imaṃ pakārataṃ manussabhāvaṃ. Sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati,
analyzed: itthabhāvanti imam pakāratam manussa bhāvam sāmañña jotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati

original: pakaraṇavasena vā ayamattho avacchinno daṭṭhabbo. Maneneva nibbattāti bāhirapaccayena

analyzed: vinā andhakāram vidhamantā sayam eva pabhāsanti iti sayaṃpabhāḥ antalikkhe ākāse caranti iti

original: subhaṃ, subheva tiṭṭhantīti subhaṭṭhāyinoti attho veditabbo.
analyzed: subham subhā iva tiṭṭhanti iti subha ṭṭhāyinaḥ ti atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Rasapathavipātubhāvavaṇṇanā
120. Sabbaṃ cakkavāḷanti anavasesaṃ koṭisatasahassaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ. Samatanīti sañchādentī
analyzed: sabbam cakkavāḷanti anavasesam koṭi sata sahassam cakkavāḷam samatanīti sañchādentī

original: vipphari, sā pana tasmiṃ udake patiṭṭhitā ahosīti āha “patiṭṭhahī”ti. Vaṇṇena sampannāti
analyzed: vipphari sā pana tasmin udake patiṭṭhitā ahosi iti āha patiṭṭhahi iti vaṇṇena sampannā iti

original: sampannavaṇṇā. Makkhikaṇḍakarahitanti makkhikāhi ca tāsaṃ aṇḍakehi ca rahitaṃ.
analyzed: sampanna vaṇṇāḥ makkhi kaṇḍaka rahitanti makkhikāhi ca tāsam aṇḍakehi ca rahitam

original: Atītānantarepi kappe loloyeva. Kasmā? Evaṃ ciraparicitalolatāvasena sabbapaṭhamaṃ
analyzed: atīta anantare pi kappe kasmai evam cira paricita lola tā vasena sabba paṭhamam

original: tathā akāsīti dasseti. Kimevidanti “vaṇṇato, gandhato ca tāva ñātaṃ, rasato pana
analyzed: tathā akāsi iti dassa iti vaṇṇataḥ gandhato ca tāva ñātam rasato pana

analyzed: kim eva idam bhavissati iti saṃsaya jātaḥ vadati tiṭṭhati iti aṭṭhāsi

original: Candimasūriyādipātubhāvavaṇṇanā
121. Āluppakārakanti ettha ālopapariyāyo āluppa-saddoti āha “ālopaṃ katvā”ti. Paccakkhabhūtānampi
analyzed: āluppa kārakam ti ettha ālopa pariyāyaḥ āluppa saddo ti āha ālopam katvā iti paccakkha bhūtānam pi

original: aṭṭha pañhāvissajjanāni gahitāni. Tattha tesanti candimasūriyānaṃ. Kasminti kasmiṃ
analyzed: aṭṭha pañhā vissajjanāni gahitāni tattha tesanti candima sūriyānam kasmin ti kasmin

original: ekasmiṃ khaṇe pātubhavanti. Sūriyamaṇḍale pana atthaṅgate candamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyittha.
analyzed: ekasmin khaṇe pātubhavanti sūriya maṇḍale pana atthaṅgate canda maṇḍalam paññāyittha

original: Chandaṃ ñatvā vāti ruciṃ ñatvā viya.
analyzed: chandam ñatvā vāti rucim ñatvā

original: Ubhayanti anto, bahi ca.
analyzed: ubhayanti antar bahi ca

original: Ujukanti āyāmato, vitthārato, ubbedhato ca. Parimaṇḍalatoti parikkhepato.
analyzed: ujukanti āyāmataḥ vitthārataḥ ubbedhato ca parimaṇḍalato ti parikkhepato

original: Ujukaṃ saṇikaṃ gacchati amāvāsiyaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ gacchanto divase divase thokaṃ

original: thokaṃ ohīyanto puṇṇamāsiyaṃ upaḍḍhamaggameva ohīyanato. Tiriyaṃ sīghaṃ gacchati
analyzed: thokam ohīyantaḥ puṇṇamāsiyam upaḍḍha maggam eva ohīyanataḥ tiriyam sīgham gacchati

analyzed: ekasmim pi māse kadāci dakkhiṇatas kadāci uttaratas dassanataḥ dvīsu passesu iti idam

original: yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. Candassa purato, pacchato, samañca tārakā gacchantiyeva. Attano
analyzed: yebhuyya vasena vuttam candassa puratas pacchatas samañca tārakāḥ attano

original: ṭhānanti attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ. Na vijahanti attano vīthiyāva gacchanato. Sūriyassa
analyzed: ṭhānam ti attanaḥ gamana ṭṭhānam na vijahanti attanaḥ vīthiyā ava gacchanataḥ sūriyassa

original: ujukaṃ gamanassa sīghatā candassa gamanaṃ upādāya veditabbā. Tiriyaṃ gamanaṃ dakkhiṇadisato
analyzed: ujukam gamanassa sīgha tā candassa gamanam upādāya veditabbā tiriyam gamanam dakkhiṇa disataḥ

original: uttaradisāya, uttaradisato ca dakkhiṇadisāya gamanaṃ dandhaṃ chahi chahi māsehi ijjhanato.
analyzed: uttara disāya uttara disatas ca dakkhiṇa disāya gamanam dandham chahi chahi māsehi ijjhanato

original: Soti sūriyo. Kāḷapakkhauposathatoti kāḷapakkhe uposathe candena saheva gantvā tato
analyzed: saḥ iti sūriyaḥ kāḷapakkha auposathato ti kāḷapakkhe uposathe candena saha iva gantvā tatas

original: paraṃ. Pāṭipadadivaseti sukkapakkhapāṭipadadivase. Ohāya gacchati attano sīghagāmitāya,

original: tassa ca dandhagāmitāya. Lekhā viya paññāyati pacchimadisāyaṃ. Yāva uposathadivasāti

original: patitasūriyālokatāya heṭṭhato pavattāya sūriyassa dūrabhāvena divase divase anukkamena
analyzed: patita sūriya āloka tāya heṭṭhatas pavattāya sūriyassa dūra bhāvena divase divase anukkamena

original: parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena anukkamena candamaṇḍalappadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa
analyzed: parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena anukkamena canda maṇḍala ppadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa

original: viya dissamānatāya vuttaṃ, tasmā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā viya. Uposathadivase puṇṇamāyaṃ
analyzed: viya dissamāna tāya vuttam tasmai anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā viya uposatha divase puṇṇamāyam

original: paripuṇṇo hoti, paripuṇṇamaṇḍalo hutvā dissatīti attho. Dhāvitvā gaṇhāti candassa

analyzed: dandha gati tāya attano ca sīgha gati tāya anukkamena hāyitvā ati ettha anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ati

original: viya dissati, idha chāyāya vaḍḍhamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ hāyamānaṃ viya dissati.
analyzed: viya dissati idha chāyāya vaḍḍhamāna tāya maṇḍalam hāyamānam viya dissati

original: Yāya vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakā devaputtā sūriyābhitāpasantattā attano
analyzed: vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassa valāhakā deva puttā sūriya abhitāpa santattā attano

analyzed: vimānataḥ na nikkhamanti kīḷā pasutāḥ hutvā na vicaranti tadā kira sūriyassa vimānam

original: pakatimaggato adho otaritvā vicarati, tassa oruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi adho

analyzed: vadanti pubbenivāsa ñāṇam pi pana kappa sata sahassa adhikassa ati ādinā kicca vasena dassitam eva

original: lakkhaṇahāravasena vā itaresaṃ pettha gahitatā veditabbā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa hāra vasena vā itaresam pa ittha gahita tā veditabbā

original: Atthappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanavavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṃ atthe pabhedagataṃ

original: bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati, anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu
analyzed: bhūta pubba ttā tattha siyā ñāṇassa sa visaye gati anāgatesu pana sabbaso a sañjātesu

original: kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti. Tenāha “anāgatāpī”tiādi. “Cittena paricchinditvā viditā”ti
analyzed: katham ti imam attham tena āha anāgatā api itiādi cittena paricchinditvā viditā ati

original: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa visayo,
analyzed: kasmā vuttam nanu atīta anāgate sattāhe eva pavattam cittam cetas pariya ñāṇassa visayo

original: na tato paranti? Nayidaṃ cetopariyañāṇakiccavasena vuttaṃ, atha kho pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsañāṇavasena
analyzed: na tatas paranti na yidam cetas upariya ñāṇa kicca vasena vuttam atha kho pubbenivāsa anāgataṃsa ñāṇa vasena

original: vuttaṃ, tasmā nāyaṃ doso.
analyzed: vuttam tasmā na ayam doso

original: Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā, setughātato
analyzed: vidita ṭṭhāne na karoti sikkhāpadena iva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhitta ttā setu ghātato

original: ca. Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva akāsi, na vibhajja byākāsīti āha
analyzed: ca katham pana theraḥ dvaya sambhave paṭikkhepam eva akāsi na vibhajja byākāsi iti āha

original: “thero kirā”tiādi. Pāraṃ pariyantaṃ minotīti pāramī, sā eva ñāṇanti pāramiñāṇaṃ,
analyzed: theraḥ kirāti ādi pāram pariyantam minoti iti pāramī sā eva pārami ñāṇam

original: sāvakānaṃ pāramiñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ. Sāvakānaṃ ukkaṃsapariyantagate jānane
analyzed: sāvakānam pāramiñāṇam sāvaka pāramiñāṇam tasmin sāvakānam ukkaṃsa pariyanta gate jānane

original: nāyaṃ anuyogo, atha kho sabbaññutaññāṇe sabbaññutāya jānane. Keci pana “sāvakapāramiñāṇeti
analyzed: na ayam anuyogaḥ atha kho sabbaññu ta ññāṇe sabbaññu tāya jānane keci pana sāvaka pārami ñāṇā iti

original: sāvakapāramiñāṇavisaye”ti atthaṃ vadanti. Tathā sesapadesupi. Sīla..pe… samatthanti
analyzed: sāvaka pārami ñāṇa visayā iti attham vadanti tathā sesa padesu pi sīlape

original: sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttisaṅkhātakāraṇānaṃ jānanasamatthaṃ. Buddhasīlādayo hi buddhānaṃ
analyzed: sīla samādhi paññā vimutti saṅkhāta kāraṇānam jānana samattham buddha sīla ādayaḥ hi buddhānam

original: buddhakiccassa, parehi “buddhā”ti jānanassa ca kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: buddha kiccassa parehi buddhā ati jānanassa ca kāraṇam

original: 143. Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayapiṭṭhikaṃ ahutvā “idamida”nti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ
analyzed: anumāna ñāṇam viya saṃsaya piṭṭhikam a hutvā idam idam ti yathā sabhāvataḥ ñeyyam

analyzed: dhāreti nicchinoti iti dhammaḥ paccakkha ñāṇanti āha dhammassa paccakkhataḥ ñāṇassa ati

original: Anuetīti anvayoti āha “anuyogaṃ anugantvā”ti. Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā

original: anumānañāṇassa pavatti diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumānanti veditabbo. Vidite vedakampi

original: viddho paṭiladdho, adhigatoti attho. Appamāṇoti aparimāṇo mahāvisayattā. Tenāha “apariyanto”ti.
analyzed: viddhaḥ paṭiladdhaḥ adhigato ti attho appamāṇaḥ ti aparimāṇaḥ mahā visaya ttā tena āha apariyantaḥ iti

original: Tenāti apariyantattā, tena vā apariyantena ñāṇena, eteneva thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ
analyzed: tena ati apariyanta ttā tena vā apariyantena ñāṇena etena iva theraḥ yam yam anumeyyam attham

original: ñātukāmo hoti, tattha tatthassa asaṅgamappaṭihaṭaanumānañāṇaṃ pavattatīti dasseti.

original: Tenāha “so iminā”tiādi. Tattha imināti iminā kāraṇena. Pākārassa thirabhāvaṃ uddhamuddhaṃ

original: dassetīti dassento “ekadvāranti kasmā āhā”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Yassā paññāya

original: vasena puriso “paṇḍito”ti vuccati, taṃ paṇḍiccanti āha “paṇḍiccena samannāgato”ti.
analyzed: vasena puriso paṇḍito ti vuccati tam paṇḍiccanti āha paṇḍiccena samannāgato ti

original: Taṃtaṃitikattabbatāsu chekabhāvo byattabhāvo veyyattiyaṃ. Medhati sammosaṃ hiṃsati

original: vidhamatīti medhā, sā etassa atthīti medhāvī. Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti
analyzed: vidhamati iti medhā sā etassa atthi iti medhāvī ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthi iti

original: ṭhānuppattikā, ṭhānaso uppajjanakapaññā. Anupariyāyanti etenāti anupariyāyo, so eva

original: iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha “dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna”nti. Chinnaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: iṭṭhakānam vigamena evam vuccati iti āha dvinnam iṭṭhakānam apagata ṭṭhānanti chinna ṭṭhānanti

original: Kiliṭṭhanti malīnaṃ. Upatāpentīti kilesapariḷāhena santāpenti. Vibādhentīti pīḷenti.
analyzed: malīnam upatāpenti iti kilesa pariḷāhena santāpenti vibādhenti iti pīḷenti

analyzed: uppannāya paññāya nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātum sakkā iti āha anuppannāya paññāya uppajjitum

analyzed: na denti iti tasmā ati paccaya upaghātena uppajjitum appadānataḥ catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu

analyzed: yathā sabhāvena bhāvetvā ati aviparīta sabhāvena yathā paṭipakkhāḥ samucchijjanti evam bhāvetvā

analyzed: purima naye satipaṭṭhānāni bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetā ti tatas aññathā vattum apica itthā atiādi

analyzed: vutta ttā sati paṭṭhāne vipassanā iti gahetvā satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtam bhāvetvā ati

analyzed: adhigatesu lokanāthena sabbaññu ta ññāṇam pi adhigatam eva hoti iti bojjhaṅge maggo sabbaññu ta ññāṇañca ati

analyzed: adhippāyaḥ iti iti vutta ppakāra parāmasanam theraḥ iti sāriputta theraḥ

original: Tatthāti tesu paccantanagarādīsu. Nagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ tadatthikehi upagantabbato,

analyzed: upagatānam ca parissaya rahita sukha adhigamana ṭhānato pākāraḥ viya sīlam tad upagatānam

analyzed: pariyāya pathaḥ ti kho bhikkhu hiriyā etam adhivacanan ti dvāram viya ariya maggaḥ nibbāna nagara ppavesana añjasa bhāvato

analyzed: paṇḍita dovārikaḥ viya dhamma senāpati nibbāna nagara paviṭṭha pavisanakānam sattānam sat lakkhaṇato

original: Dinnoti dāpito, sodhitoti attho.
analyzed: dinnaḥ ti dāpito sodhito ti attho

original: 144. Nipphattidassanatthanti siddhidassanatthaṃ, adhigamadassanatthanti attho. “Pañcanavutipāsaṇḍe”ti
analyzed: nipphatti dassana tthan ti siddhi dassana ttham adhigama dassana tthan ti attho pañcanavuti pāsaṇḍā iti

analyzed: upari upari paṇīta paṇītanti paṇītataram paṇītatamam ca ati attho kaṇhanti kāḷakam saṃkilesa dhammam

original: Sukkanti odātaṃ vodānadhammaṃ. Savipakkhaṃ katvāti pahātabbapahāyakabhāvadassanavasena
analyzed: sukkam ti odātam vodāna dhammam sa vipakkham katvā iti pahātabba pahāyaka bhāva dassana vasena

original: evaṃ kaṇhaṃ paṭibāhitvā desanāvasena nīharitvā sukkaṃ, “ayaṃ sukkadhammo, iminā ayaṃ
analyzed: evam kaṇham paṭibāhitvā desanā vasena nīharitvā sukkam ayam sukka dhammaḥ iminā ayam

original: pahātabbo”ti evaṃ sukkaṃ paṭibāhitvā kaṇhaṃ. Saussāhanti phaluppādanasamatthatāvasena

original: sabyāpāraṃ. Tenāha “savipāka”nti. Vipākadhammanti attho.
analyzed: sa byāpāram tena āha sa vipākanti vipāka dhamman ti attho

original: Tasmiṃ desite dhammeti tasmiṃ vuttanayena bhagavā tumhehi desite dhamme ekaccaṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: tasmin desite dhamme ti tasmin vutta nayena bhagavā tumhehi desite dhamme ekaccam dhammam

original: nāma sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā. Taṃjānane hi vutte catusaccadhammajānanaṃ

original: Vipakkho pana parato āgamissati. Etthāti “dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ agama”nti etasmiṃ pade.
analyzed: vipakkhaḥ pana paratas āgamissati ettha ati dhammesu niṭṭham agamanti etasmim pade

analyzed: thera sallāpaḥ iti sallāpa sadisaḥ vinicchaya vādo kāḷavalla vāsī iti kāḷavalla vihāra vāsī

original: Idānīti etarahi “idāhaṃ bhante”tiādivacanakāle. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāneti “dhammesu niṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: idāni iti etarahi idā aham bhante ti ādi vacana kāle imasmim pana ṭhāne iti dhammesu niṭṭham

original: agama”nti imasmiṃ padese, imasmiṃ vā niṭṭhānakāraṇabhūte yoniso parivitakkane. “Imasmiṃ
analyzed: agamanti imasmin padese imasmin vā niṭṭhāna kāraṇa bhūte parivitakkane imasmin

original: pana ṭhāne buddhaguṇesu niṭṭhaṅgato”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu sāvakapāramiñāṇasamadhigatakāle

analyzed: evam vuttam sabbam nti catu sacca dhammesu utiādi sumattherena vuttam sabbam arahatte

original: niṭṭhaṅgatoti etthāpi vuttanayeneva anuyogaparihārā veditabbā. Yadipi dhammasenāpati
analyzed: niṭṭhaṅgato ti ettha api vutta nayena iva anuyoga parihārāḥ veditabbāḥ yadi pi dhammasenāpati

original: “sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ mayā samadhigata”nti ito pubbepi jānātiyeva, idāni pana asaṅkhyeyyāparimeyyabhede

analyzed: buddha guṇe naya ggāha vasena pariggahetvā kicca siddhiyā tasmim ñāṇe niṭṭhaṅgataḥ ahosi iti

original: dassento “mahāsivatthero…pe… dhammesūti sāvakapāramiñāṇe niṭṭhaṅgato”ti avoca.
analyzed: dassentaḥ dhammesu iti sāvaka pāramiñāṇe niṭṭhaṅgato ti avoca

analyzed: buddha guṇā pana nayataḥ āgatā te naya ggāhataḥ yāthāvataḥ jānantaḥ sāvaka pārami ñāṇe tathā jānana vasena

original: niṭṭhaṅgatattā sāvakapāramiñāṇameva tassa aparāparuppattivasena, tena tena bhāvetabbakiccabahutāvasena

original: Nittandīti vigatathinamiddho. Sā pana nittanditā kāyālasiyavigamane pākaṭā hotīti
analyzed: nittandī iti vigata thinamiddhaḥ sā pana nittanditā kāya alasiya vigamane pākaṭā hoti iti

analyzed: anusāsana vidhā desanā ādi vaṇṇanā

original: Tenāha “sabbaññutaññāṇassa suppaṭividdhattā”ti. Ettakanti dassethāti dīpeti thero.

original: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anussaratī”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tassa anussaraṇamattaṃ

original: 158. Tumhākaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ yeva anuttarā anaññasādhāraṇattā. Idāni tassā desanāya

analyzed: niddosehi khīṇāsavehi pavattetabbataḥ niddosāḥ dosehi saha a pavattanataḥ tatas eva

analyzed: pamāṇa karaṇa dhammanti pamāṇa rahita tāya appamāṇanti vattabba tam arahati tasmā appamāṇa ttā iti vuttam

original: Adhibhavatīti phalassa uḷārabhāvena abhibhuyya tiṭṭhati. Atthato paṇītapaṇītānaṃ
analyzed: adhibhavati iti phalassa uḷāra bhāvena abhibhuyya tiṭṭhati atthato paṇīta paṇītānam

original: bhogānaṃ paṭilābho evāti āha “atirekaṃ labhatī”ti. Adhigacchatīti vindati, nibbattamānova
analyzed: bhogānam paṭilābhaḥ eva ati āha atirekam labhati iti adhigacchati iti vindati nibbattamānā iva

original: tena samannāgato hotīti attho. Ekadesena aphusitvā sabbappadesehi phusanato sabbappadesehi
analyzed: tena samannāgataḥ hoti iti attho ekadesena a phusitvā sabba ppadesehi phusanataḥ sabba ppadesehi

original: phusantiyo etesaṃ pādatalānaṃ santīti “sabbāvantehi pādatalehī”ti vuttaṃ. Yathā nikkhipane
analyzed: phusantiyaḥ etesam pāda talānam santi iti sabbāvantehi pāda talehi iti vuttam yathā nikkhipane

original: sabbe pādatalappadesā saṃhaccakārino aninnatāya samabhāvato, evaṃ uddharaṇepīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: sabbe pāda tala ppadesā saṃhacca kārinaḥ aninna tāya sama bhāvataḥ evam uddharaṇe pi iti vuttam

original: “samaṃ phusati, samaṃ uddharatī”ti. Idāni imassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇassa samadhigamena
analyzed: samam phusati samam uddharati iti idāni imassa mahā purisa lakkhaṇassa samadhigamena

original: laddhabbanissandaphalavibhāvanamukhena ānubhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “sacepi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: laddhabba nissanda phala vibhāvana mukhena ānubhāvam vibhāvetum sace pi hi itiādi vuttam

original: Tattha narakanti āvāṭaṃ. Anto pavisati samabhāvāpattiyā. “Cakkalakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhāna”nti
analyzed: tattha narakam ti āvāṭam antar pavisati sama bhāva āpattiyā cakka lakkhaṇena patiṭṭhātabba ṭṭhānam ti

original: idaṃ yaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ pādatalaṃ phusati, tattha cakkalakkhaṇampi phusanavasena patiṭṭhātīti
analyzed: idam yam bhūmi ppadesam pāda talam phusati tattha cakka lakkhaṇam pi phusana vasena patiṭṭhāti iti

original: katvā vuttaṃ. Tassa pana tathā patiṭṭhānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya evāti suppatiṭṭhitapādatāya
analyzed: katvā vuttam tassa pana tathā patiṭṭhānam suppatiṭṭhita pāda tāya eva ati suppatiṭṭhita pāda tāya

original: ānubhāvakittane “lakkhaṇantarānayanaṃ kimatthiya”nti na cintetabbaṃ. Sīlatejenāti
analyzed: ānubhāva kittane lakkhaṇa antara ānayanam kim atthiyanti na cintetabbam sīla tejena ati

original: sīlappabhāvena. Puññatejenāti kusalappabhāvena. Dhammatejenāti ñāṇappabhāvena. Tīhipi
analyzed: sīla ppabhāvena puñña tejena ati kusala ppabhāvena dhamma tejena ati ñāṇa ppabhāvena tīhi pi

original: padehi bhagavato buddhabhūtassa dhammā gahitā, “dasannaṃ pāramīna”nti iminā buddhakaradhammā gahitā.
analyzed: padehi bhagavataḥ buddha bhūtassa dhammāḥ gahitāḥ iminā buddha kara dhammāḥ gahitā

original: 202. Mahāsamuddova sīmā sabbabhūmissarabhāvato. “Akhilamanimittamakaṇṭaka”nti tīhipi
analyzed: mahā samuddaḥ iva sīmā sabba bhūmi ssara bhāvataḥ akhilam animittam akaṇṭakanti tīhi pi

original: padehi theyyābhāvova vuttoti āha “niccora”ntiādi. Kharasamphassaṭṭhenāti ghaṭṭanena
analyzed: padehi theyya abhāvaḥ u vutto ti āha niccora ntiādi khara samphassa ṭṭhena ati ghaṭṭanena

original: dukkhasamphassabhāvena khilāti. Upaddavapaccayaṭṭhenāti anatthahetutāya nimittāti.
analyzed: dukkha samphassa bhāvena khilā ati upaddava paccaya ṭṭhena ati anattha hetu tāya nimittā ati

original: “Akhila”ntiādinā ekacārīhi corābhāvo vutto, “nirabbuda”nti iminā pana gaṇabandhavasena
analyzed: akhila nti ādinā ekacārīhi cora abhāvaḥ vuttaḥ iminā pana gaṇa bandha vasena

original: vicaraṇacorābhāvo vuttoti dassetuṃ “gumbaṃ gumbaṃ hutvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Avikkhambhanīyoti
analyzed: vicaraṇa cora abhāvaḥ vutto ti dassetum gumbam gumbam hutvā atiādi vuttam a vikkhambhanīyaḥ ti

original: na vibandhanīyo kenaci appaṭibāhanīyo ṭhānato anikkaḍḍhanīyo. Paṭipakkhaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: na vibandhanīyaḥ kenacid a paṭibāhanīyaḥ ṭhānataḥ a nikkaḍḍhanīyaḥ paṭipakkham aniṭṭham

original: atthetīti paccatthiko, etena pākaṭabhāvena virodhaṃ akaronto veripuggalo vutto. Paṭiviruddho
analyzed: attheti iti paccatthikaḥ etena pākaṭa bhāvena virodham a karontaḥ veri puggalaḥ vuttaḥ paṭiviruddho

original: amitto paccāmitto, etena pākaṭabhāvena virodhaṃ karonto veripuggalo vutto. Vikkhambhetuṃ
analyzed: amitto paccāmittaḥ etena pākaṭa bhāvena virodham karontaḥ veri puggalaḥ vuttaḥ vikkhambhetum

original: nāsakkhiṃsu, aññadatthu sayameva vighātabyasanaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu ceva sāvakattañca pavedesuṃ.
analyzed: na asakkhiṃsu aññadatthu sayam eva vighāta byasanam pāpuṇiṃsu ca iva sāvaka ttam ca pavedesuṃ

original: “Kamma”ntiādīsu kammaṃ nāma buddhabhāvaṃ uddissa katūpacito lakkhaṇasaṃvattaniyo
analyzed: kamma nti ādīsu kammam nāma buddha bhāvam uddissa katu upacitaḥ lakkhaṇa saṃvattaniyo

original: puññasambhāro. Tenāha “satasahassakappādhikānī”tiādi. Kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma tasseva
analyzed: tena āha sata sahassa kappa adhikāni itiādi kamma sarikkhakam nāma tassa eva

original: puññasambhārassa karaṇakāle kenaci akampanīyassa daḷhāvatthitabhāvassa anucchaviko
analyzed: puñña sambhārassa karaṇa kāle kenaci a kampanīyassa daḷha avatthita bhāvassa anucchavikaḥ

original: suppatiṭṭhitapādatāsaṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa parehi avikkhambhanīyatāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo,
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhita pāda tā saṅkhātassa lakkhaṇassa parehi a vikkhambhanīya tāya ñāpaka nimitta bhāvaḥ

original: svāyaṃ nimittabhāvo tasseva lakkhaṇassāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma…pe…
analyzed: nimitta bhāvo tassa iva lakkhaṇassa ati aṭṭhakathāyam kammasarikkhakam

original: mahāpurisalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Ṭhānagamanesu pādānaṃ daḷhāvatthitabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: mahāpurisa lakkhaṇan ti vuttam ṭhāna gamanesu pādānam daḷha avatthita bhāvaḥ lakkhaṇam

original: nāma. Pādānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ samaṃ nikkhipanaṃ, pādatalānaṃ sabbabhāgehi phusanaṃ, samameva
analyzed: nāma pādānam bhūmiyam samam nikkhipanam pāda talānam sabba bhāgehi phusanam samam eva

original: uddharaṇaṃ, tasmā suṭṭhu samaṃ sabbabhāgehi patiṭṭhitā pādā etassāti suppatiṭṭhitapādo,
analyzed: uddharaṇam tasmā suṭṭhu samam sabba bhāgehi patiṭṭhitāḥ pādāḥ etassa ati su patiṭṭhita pādaḥ

original: tassa bhāvo suppatiṭṭhitapādatāti vuccati lakkhaṇaṃ. Suṭṭhu samaṃ bhūmiyā phusaneneva
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ suppatiṭṭhita pāda tā ti vuccati lakkhaṇam suṭṭhu samam bhūmiyā phusanena iva

original: hi nesaṃ tattha daḷhāvatthitabhāvo siddho, yaṃ “kammasarikkhaka”nti vuttaṃ. Lakkhaṇānisaṃsoti
analyzed: hi na īsam tattha daḷha avatthita bhāvo siddho yam kamma sarikkhakan ti vuttam lakkhaṇa anisaṃso ti

original: lakkhaṇapaṭilābhassa udrayo, lakkhaṇasaṃvattaniyassa kammassa ānisaṃsaphalanti attho.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa paṭilābhassa udrayaḥ lakkhaṇa saṃvattaniyassa kammassa ānisaṃsa phalanti attho

original: Nissandaphalaṃ pana heṭṭhā bhāvitameva.
analyzed: nissanda phalam pana heṭṭhā bhāvitam eva

original: 203. Kammādibhedeti kammakammasarikkhakalakkhaṇa lakkhaṇānisaṃsavisaññite vibhāge.
analyzed: kamma ādi bhede iti vibhāge

original: Gāthābandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, attho pana apubbaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Porāṇakattherāti
analyzed: gāthābandham sandhāya vuttam atthaḥ pana apubbam natthi iti adhippāyaḥ porāṇaka ttherā ti

original: aṭṭhakathācariyā. Vaṇṇanāgāthāti thomanāgāthā vuttamevatthaṃ gahetvā thomanāvasena
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā cariyā vaṇṇanā gāthā ati thomanā gāthā vuttam eva attham gahetvā thomanā vasena

original: pavattattā. Aparabhāge therā nāma pāḷiṃ, aṭṭhakathañca potthakāropanavasena samāgatā
analyzed: pavattattā apara bhāge therāḥ nāma pāḷim aṭṭhakatham ca potthaka āropana vasena samāgatā

original: mahātherā, ye sāṭṭhakathaṃ piṭakattayaṃ potthakāruḷhaṃ katvā saddhammaṃ addhaniyaciraṭṭhitikaṃ
analyzed: mahā therāḥ ye sa aṭṭhakatham piṭaka ttayam potthaka āruḷham katvā saddhammam addha niya cira ṭṭhitikam

original: akaṃsu. Ekapadikoti “daḷhasamādāno ahosī”tiādipāṭhe ekekapadagāhī. Atthuddhāroti
analyzed: ekapadikaḥ iti daḷha samādānaḥ ahosi iti ādi pāṭhe ekeka pada gāhī

original: tadatthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena uddharaṇato atthuddhārabhūto, tayidaṃ
analyzed: tad atthassa sukha ggahaṇa attham gāthābandha vasena uddharaṇataḥ atthuddhāra bhūtaḥ

original: pāḷiyaṃ āgatapadāni gahetvā gāthābandhavasena tadatthavicāraṇabhāvadassanaṃ, na pana
analyzed: pāḷiyam āgata padāni gahetvā gāthābandha vasena tad attha vicāraṇa bhāva dassanam na pana

original: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena ṭhapitabhāvapaṭikkhipananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena ṭhapita bhāva paṭikkhipananti daṭṭhabbam

original: Kusaladhammānaṃ vacīsaccassa bahukārataṃ, tappaṭipakkhassa ca musāvādassa mahāsāvajjataṃ
analyzed: kusala dhammānam vacīsaccassa bahu kāra tam tad paṭipakkhassa ca musāvādassa mahā sāvajja tam

original: dassetuṃ anantarameva kusalakammapathadhamme vadantopi tato vacīsaccaṃ nīharitvā
analyzed: dassetum anantaram eva kusala kamma patha dhamme vadantaḥ api tatas vacīsaccam nīharitvā

original: katheti sacceti vā sannidhāneva “dhamme”ti vuccamānā kusalakammapathadhammā eva yuttāti
analyzed: kathā iti saccā iti vā sannidhānā iva dhammā iti vuccamānā kusala kammapatha dhammā eva yuttā ati

original: vuttaṃ “dhammeti dasakusalakammapathadhamme”ti. Gobalībaddañāyena vā ettha attho
analyzed: vuttam dhamme ti dasa kusala kammapatha dhamme ti go balībaddañāyena vā ettha atthaḥ

original: veditabbo. Indriyadamaneti indriyasaṃvare. Kusalakammapathagghaṇenassa vārittasīlameva
analyzed: veditabbaḥ indriya damana iti indriya saṃvare

original: gahitanti itarampi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ saṃyamasseva gahaṇaṃ katanti “saṃyameti sīlasaṃyame”ti
analyzed: itaram pi saṅgahetvā dassetum saṃyamassa iva gahaṇam saṃyama iti sīla saṃyama iti

original: vuttaṃ. Suci vuccati puggalo yassa dhammassa vasena, taṃ soceyyaṃ, kāyasucaritādi.
analyzed: vuttam suci vuccati puggalaḥ yassa dhammassa vasena tam soceyyam kāya su carita ādi

original: Etasseva hi vibhāgassa dassanatthaṃ vuttampi cetaṃ puna vuttaṃ, manosoceyyaggahaṇena
analyzed: etassa iva hi vibhāgassa dassana attham vuttam api ca itam puna vuttam manosoceyya ggahaṇena

original: vā jhānādiuttarimanussadhammānampi saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ soceyyaggahaṇaṃ. Ālayabhūtanti
analyzed: vā jhāna ādi uttari manussa dhammānam pi saṅgaṇhana attham soceyya gahaṇam ālaya bhūtanti

original: samathavipassanānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Uposathakammanti uposathadivase samādiyitvā
analyzed: samatha vipassanānam adhiṭṭhāna bhūtam uposatha kammanti uposatha divase samādiyitvā

original: samācaritabbaṃ puññakammaṃ uposatho sahacaraṇañāyena. “Avihiṃsāyāti sattānaṃ aviheṭhanāyā”ti
analyzed: samācaritabbam puñña kammam uposathaḥ sahacaraṇa ñāyena a vihiṃsāya ati sattānam a viheṭhanāya ati

original: vadanti, taṃ pana sīlaggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ. Tasmā avihiṃsāyāti karuṇāyāti attho. Avihiṃsāggahaṇeneva
analyzed: vadanti tam pana sīla ggahaṇena iva gahitam tasmai avihiṃsāya ati karuṇāya ati attho avihiṃsā ggahaṇena iva

original: cettha appamaññāsāmaññena cattāropi brahmavihārā upacārāvatthā gahitā lakkhaṇahāranayena.
analyzed: ca ittha appamaññā sāmaññena cattāro api brahmavihārāḥ upacāra avatthāḥ gahitāḥ lakkhaṇa hāra nayena

original: Sakalanti anavasesaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. Evamettha kāmāvacarattabhāvapariyāpannattā lakkhaṇassa
analyzed: sakalanti anavasesam paripuṇṇam evam ettha kāmāvacara tta bhāva pariyāpanna ttā lakkhaṇassa

original: taṃsaṃvattanikakāmāvacarakusaladhammā eva pāramitāsaṅgahapuññasambhārabhūtakāyasucaritādīhi
analyzed: tad saṃvattanika kāmāvacara kusala dhammāḥ eva pāramitā saṅgaha puñña sambhāra bhūta kāya su carita ādīhi

original: dvādasadhā vibhattā eva. Gāthāyaṃ “sacce”tiādinā dasadhā saṅgayha dassitā. Esa nayo sesalakkhaṇepi.
analyzed: dvādasadhā vibhattā eva gāthā ayam sacca iti ādinā dasadhā saṅgayha dassitā esa nayo sesa lakkhaṇe pi

original: Aṃnubhīti gāthāsukhatthaṃ akāraṃ sānunāsikaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Byañjanāni lakkhaṇāni
analyzed: aṃnubhi iti gāthā sukha attham akāram sa anunāsikam katvā vuttam byañjanāni lakkhaṇāni

original: ācikkhantīti veyañjanikā. Vikkhambhetabbanti paṭibāhitabbaṃ tassāti mahāpurisassa,
analyzed: ācikkhanti iti veyañjanikāḥ vikkhambhetabbam ti paṭibāhitabbam tassa ti mahāpurisassa

original: tassa vā mahāpurisalakkhaṇassa. Lakkhaṇasīsena cettha taṃsaṃvattanikapuññasambhāro vuccati.
analyzed: tassa vā mahāpurisa lakkhaṇassa lakkhaṇa sīsena ca ittha taṃsaṃvattanika puñña sambhāraḥ vuccati

original: Pādatalacakkalakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
204. Bhayaṃ nāma bhīti, taṃ pana ubbijjanākārena, uttasanākārena ca pavattiyā duvidhanti
analyzed: bhayam nāma bhī ti tam pana ubbijjana ākārena uttasana ākārena ca pavattiyā duvidhanti

original: āha “ubbegabhayañceva uttāsabhayañcā”ti. Tadubhayampi bhayaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi
analyzed: āha ubbega bhayam ca iva uttāsa bhayam ca ati tat ubhayam pi bhayam vibhāgena dassetum tattha atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Apanūditāti yathā corādayo viluppanabandhanādīni parassa na karonti, katañca
analyzed: vuttam apanūditā ti yathā cora ādayaḥ viluppana bandhana ādīni parassa na karonti katam ca

original: paccāharaṇādinā paṭipākatikaṃ hoti, evaṃ yathā ca caṇḍahatthiādayo dūrato parivajjitā
analyzed: pacca āharaṇa ādinā paṭipākatikam hoti evam yathā ca caṇḍahatthi ādayaḥ dūratas

original: honti, aparivajjite tassa yathā ṭhāne ṭhitehi abhibhavo na hoti, evaṃ apanūditā.
analyzed: honti a parivajjite tassa yathā ṭhāne ṭhitehi abhibhavaḥ na hoti evam apanūditā

original: Ativāhetīti atikkāmeti. Taṃ ṭhānanti taṃ sāsaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ. Asakkontānanti upayogatthe
analyzed: ativāheti iti atikkāmeti tam ṭhānam ti tam sāsaṅka ṭṭhānam a sakkontānam ti upayoga tthe

original: sāmivacanaṃ, asakkonteti attho. Asakkontānanti vā anādare sāmivacanaṃ. Saha parivārenāti
analyzed: sāmi vacanam a sakkonta iti atthaḥ a sakkontānam anti vā anādare sāmi vacanam saha parivārena ati

original: saparivāraṃ. Tattha kiñci deyyadhammaṃ dento yadā tassa parivārabhāvena aññampi deyyadhammaṃ
analyzed: sa parivāram tattha kiñci deyya dhammam dentaḥ yadā tassa parivāra bhāvena aññam pi deyya dhammam

original: deti, evaṃ tassa taṃ dānamayaṃ puññaṃ saparivāraṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: deti evam tassa tam dāna mayam puññam sa parivāram nāma hoti

original: Tamatthaṃ vitthārena dassetuṃ “tattha anna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yathā deyyadhammaṃ
analyzed: tam attham vitthārena dassetum tattha anna nti ādi vuttam tattha yathā deyya dhammam

original: tassa annadānassa parivāro, evaṃ tassa sakkaccakaraṇaṃ pīti dassento “atha kho”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tassa anna dānassa parivāraḥ evam tassa sakkacca karaṇam pi iti dassentaḥ atha kho ti ādim āha

original: Yāgubhattaṃ datvāva adāsīti yojanā. Esa nayo ito paratopi. Suttaṃ vaṭṭetīti cīvarassa
analyzed: yāgu bhattam adāsi iti yojanā esa nayaḥ itas paratas pi suttam vaṭṭeti iti cīvarassa

original: sibbanasuttakaṃ duvaṭṭativaṭṭādivasena vaṭṭitaṃ akāsi. Rajananti alliādirajanavatthuṃ.
analyzed: sibbana suttakam duvaṭṭati vaṭṭa ādi vasena vaṭṭitam akāsi rajananti alli ādi rajana vatthum

original: Paṇḍupalāsanti rajanupagameva paṇḍuvaṇṇaṃ palāsaṃ.
analyzed: rajan upagam iva paṇḍu vaṇṇam palāsam

original: Heṭṭhimānīti annādīni cattāri. Nisadaggahaṇeneva nisadapotopi gahito. Cīnapiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhimāni iti anna ādīni cattāri nisada ggahaṇena iva nisada poto api gahitaḥ cīna piṭṭham

original: sindhurakacuṇṇaṃ. Kojavanti uddalomiekantalomiādikojavattharaṇa. Suvibhattaantarānīti
analyzed: sindhuraka cuṇṇam suvibhatta antarāni iti

original: suṭṭhu vibhattaantarāni, etena cakkāvayavaṭṭhānānaṃ suparicchinnataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: suṭṭhu vibhatta antarāni etena cakka avayava ṭṭhānānam su paricchinna tam dasseti

original: Laddhābhisekā khattiyā attano vijite visavitāya brāhmaṇādike catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
analyzed: laddha abhisekā khattiyā attanaḥ vijite visavitāya brāhmaṇa ādike catūhi saṅgaha vatthūhi

original: rañjetuṃ sakkonti, na itarāti āha “rājānoti abhisittā”ti. Rājato yathāladdhagāmanigamādiṃ
analyzed: rañjetum sakkonti na itarā iti āha rājāno ti abhisittā iti rājataḥ yathā laddha gāma nigama ādim

original: issaravatāya bhuñjantīti bhojakā, tādiso bhogo etesaṃ atthi, tattha vā niyuttāti
analyzed: issaravatāya bhuñjanti iti bhojakā tādisaḥ bhogaḥ etesam atthi tattha vā niyuttā ati

original: bhogikā, te eva “bhogiyā”ti vuttā. Saparivāraṃ dānanti vuttanayena saparivāradānaṃ.
analyzed: bhogikā te eva bhogiyā iti vuttā sa parivāram dānam ti vutta nayena sa parivāra dānam

original: Jānātūti “sadevako loko jānātū”ti iminā viya adhippāyena nibbattaṃ cakkalakkhaṇanti
analyzed: jānātu uti sa devakaḥ lokaḥ jānātu uti iminā viya adhippāyena nibbattam cakka lakkhaṇanti

original: lakkhaṇasseva kammasarikkhatā dassitā. Evaṃ sati tikameva siyā, na catukkaṃ, tasmā
analyzed: lakkhaṇassa iva kamma sarikkha tā dassitā evam sati tikam eva siyā na catukkam tasmā

original: cakkalakkhaṇassa mahāparivāratāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma. Tenevāha
analyzed: cakka lakkhaṇassa mahā parivāra tāya ñāpaka nimitta bhāvaḥ kammasarikkhakam nāma tena iva āha

original: “saparivāraṃ…pe… jānātūti nibbatta”nti. “Dīghāyukatāya taṃ nimitta”nti ca vakkhati,
analyzed: jānātu uti nibbattanti dīgha āyuka tāya tam nimittam ti ca vakkhati

original: tathā “taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati tadatthajotaka”nti ca. Nissandaphalaṃ pana paṭipakkhābhibhavo
analyzed: tathā tam lakkhaṇam bhavati tad attha jotakan ti ca nissanda phalam pana paṭipakkha abhibhavaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo. Tenevāha gāthāyaṃ “sattumaddano”ti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ tena iva āha gāthā ayam

original: 205. Etanti etaṃ gāthābandhabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ panatthato gāthā evāti āha “imā tadatthaparidīpanā gāthā vuccantī”ti.
analyzed: etat ti etam gāthābandha bhūtam vacanam tam pana atthataḥ gāthāḥ eva ati āha imāḥ tad attha paridīpanāḥ gāthāḥ vuccanti iti

original: Puratthāti vā “pure”ti vuttatopi pubbe. Yasmā mahāpuriso na atītāya ekajātiyaṃ, nāpi
analyzed: puratthā ti vā purā iti vuttatas pi pubbe yasmā mahā purisaḥ na atītāya eka jātiyam na api

original: katipayajātīsu, atha kho purimapurimatarāsu tathāva paṭipanno, tasmā tattha paṭipattiṃ
analyzed: katipaya jātīsu atha kho purima purimatarāsu tathāva paṭipanno tasmā tattha paṭipattim

original: dassetuṃ “pure puratthā”ti vuttaṃ. Imissāpi jātiyaṃ atītakālavasena “purepuratthā”ti
analyzed: dassetum pure puratthā iti vuttam imissā api jātiyam atīta kāla vasena pure puratthā ti

original: vattuṃ labbhāti tato visesanatthaṃ “purimāsu jātīsū”ti vuttanti āha “imissā”tiādi.
analyzed: vattum labbhā ti tatas visesana attham purimāsu jātīsu iti vuttanti āha imissā atiādi

original: Keci “imissā jātiyā pubbe tusitadevaloke katakammapaṭikkhepavacana”nti vadanti, taṃ
analyzed: keci imissā jātiyā pubbe tusita deva loke kata kamma paṭikkhepa vacananti vadanti tam

original: tesaṃ matimattaṃ tattha tādisassa katakammassa abhāvato. Apanūdanoti apanetā. Adhimuttoti yuttapayutto.
analyzed: tesam matimattam tattha tādisassa kata kammassa abhāvataḥ apanūdanaḥ ti apanetā adhimuttaḥ iti yutta payuttaḥ

original: Puññakammenāti dānādipuññakammena. Evaṃ santeti satamattena puññakammena ekekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: puñña kammena ati dāna ādi puñña kammena evam santā iti sata mattena puñña kammena ekekam lakkhaṇam

original: nibbatteyya, evaṃ sati. Na rocayiṃsūti kevalaṃ satamattena puññakammena lakkhaṇanibbattiṃ
analyzed: nibbatteyyaḥ evam sati na rocayiṃsu iti kevalam satamattena puñña kammena lakkhaṇa nibbattim

original: na rocayiṃsu aṭṭhakathācariyā. Kathaṃ pana rocayiṃsūti āha “anantesu panā”tiādi.
analyzed: na rocayiṃsu aṭṭhakathā cariyā katham pana rocayiṃsu iti āha anantesu pana atiādi

original: Ekekaṃ kammanti ekekaṃ dānādipubbakammaṃ. Ekekaṃ sataguṇaṃ katvāti anantāsu lokadhātūsu
analyzed: ekekam kamman ti ekekam dāna ādi pubba kammam ekekam sataguṇam katvā iti anantāsu lokadhātūsu

original: yattakā sattā, tehi sabbehi paccekaṃ satakkhattuṃ katāni dānādipuññakammāni yattakāni,
analyzed: yattakā sattā tehi sabbehi paccekam satakkhattum katāni dāna ādi puñña kammāni yattakāni

original: tato ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ mahāsattena sataguṇaṃ kataṃ “sata”nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā idha
analyzed: tatas ekekam puñña kammam mahāsattena sataguṇam katam sata nti adhippetam tasmai idha

analyzed: sata saddaḥ bahu bhāva pariyāyaḥ na saṅkhyā vacanaḥ ti dasseti satak hi satam deva manussa ati ādīsu

original: viya. Tenāha “tasmā satapuññalakkhaṇoti imamatthaṃ rocayiṃsū”ti.
analyzed: tena āha tasmai sata puñña lakkhaṇo ti imam attham rocayiṃsu iti

original: Āyatapaṇhitāditilakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: āyata paṇhita āditi lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 206. Sarasacuti nāma jātassa sattassa yāvajīvaṃ jīvitvā pakatiyā maraṇaṃ. Ākaḍḍhajiyassa
analyzed: sarasacuti nāma jātassa sattassa yāvajīvam jīvitvā pakatiyā maraṇam ākaḍḍhajiyassa

original: dhanudaṇḍassa viya pādānaṃ antomukhaṃ kuṭilatāya antovaṅkapādatā. Bahimukhaṃ kuṭilatāya
analyzed: dhanu daṇḍassa viya pādānam antomukham kuṭila tāya antovaṅka pāda tā bahimukham kuṭila tāya

original: bahivaṅkapādatā. Pādatalassa majjhe ūnatāya ukkuṭikapādatā. Aggapādena khañjanakā
analyzed: bahivaṅka pāda tā pāda talassa majjhe ūna tāya ukkuṭika pāda tā agga pādena khañjanakā

original: aggakoṇḍā. Paṇhippadesena khañjanakā paṇhikoṇḍā. Unnatakāyenāti anonatabhāvena samussitasarīrena.
analyzed: agga koṇḍā paṇhi ppadesena khañjanakā paṇhi koṇḍā unnata kāyena ati anonata bhāvena samussita sarīrena

original: Muṭṭhikatahatthāti āvudhādīnaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ katamuṭṭhihatthā. Phaṇahatthakāti aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: muṭṭhi kata hatthā ti āvudha ādīnam gahaṇa attham kata muṭṭhi hatthā phaṇa hatthakā iti aññamaññam

original: saṃsaṭṭhaṅgulihatthā. Idamettha kammasarikkhakanti idaṃ imesaṃ tiṇṇampi lakkhaṇānaṃ
analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha aṅguli hatthā idam ettha idam imesam tiṇṇam pi lakkhaṇānaṃ

original: tathāgatassa dīghāyukatāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo ettha āyatapaṇhitā, dīghaṅgulitā brahmujugattatāti
analyzed: tathāgatassa dīgha āyuka tāya ñāpaka nimitta bhāvaḥ ettha āyata paṇhi tā dīgha aṅguli tā brahmu jugatta tā ati

original: etasmiṃ lakkhaṇattaye kammasarikkhakattaṃ. Nissandaphalaṃ pana anantarāyatādi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: etasmin lakkhaṇa ttaye nissanda phalam pana anantarāyata ādi daṭṭhabbam

original: 207. Bhāyitabbavatthunimittaṃ uppajjamānampi bhayaṃ attasinehahetukaṃ pahīnasinehassa
analyzed: bhāyitabba vatthu nimittam uppajjamānam api bhayam atta sineha hetukam pahīna sinehassa

original: tadabhāvatoti āha “yathā mayhaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ mama jīvitaṃ piya”nti. Suciṇṇenāti
analyzed: tad abhāvataḥ iti āha yathā maraṇataḥ bhayam mama jīvitam su ciṇṇena ati

original: suṭṭhu katūpacitena sucaritakammunā.
analyzed: suṭṭhu katu upacitena su carita kammunā

original: Cavitvāti saggato cavitvā. “Sujātagatto subhujo”ti ādayo sarīrāvayavaguṇā imehi lakkhaṇehi
analyzed: cavitvā iti saggataḥ cavitvā sujāta gatto su bhujo ti ādayo sarīra avayava guṇāḥ imehi lakkhaṇehi

original: avinābhāvinoti dassetuṃ vuttā. Cirayapanāyāti attabhāvassa cirakālaṃ pavattanāya.
analyzed: avinābhāvino ti dassetum vuttā cira yapanāya iti attabhāvassa cira kālam pavattanāya

original: Tenāha “dīghāyukabhāvāyā”ti. Tatoti cakkavattī hutvā yāpanato. Vasippattoti jhānādīsu
analyzed: tena āha dīgha āyuka bhāvāya ati tatoti cakkavattī hutvā yāpanataḥ vasi patto ti jhāna ādīsu

original: vasībhāvañceva cetovasibhāvañca patto hutvā, kathaṃ iddhibhāvanāya iddhipādabhāvanāyāti
analyzed: vasībhāvam ca iva cetaḥ vasi bhāvam ca pattas hutvā katham iddhi bhāvanāya iddhipāda bhāvanāya ati

original: attho. Yāpeti cirataranti yojanā.
analyzed: atthaḥ yāpa iti cirataranti yojanā

original: Sattussadatālakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sattussada tā lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 208. Raso jāto etesanti rasitāni, mahārasāni. Tenāha “rasasampannāna”nti. Piṭṭhakhajjakādīnīti
analyzed: rasaḥ jātaḥ rasitāni mahārasāni tena āha piṭṭha khajjaka ādīni iti

original: pūpasakkhalimodakādīni. Ādi-saddena pana kadaliphalādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Piṭṭhaṃ pakkhipitvā
analyzed: pūpa sakkhali modaka ādīni ādi saddena pana kadali phala ādim saṅgaṇhāti piṭṭham pakkhipitvā

original: pacitabbapāyasaṃ piṭṭhapāyasaṃ. Ādi-saddena tathārūpabhojjayāguādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: pacitabba pāyasam piṭṭha pāyasam ādi saddena tathārūpa bhojja yāgu ādim saṅgaṇhāti

original: Idha kammasarikkhakaṃ nāma sattussadatālakkhaṇassa paṇītalābhitāya ñāpakanimittabhāvo. Iminā nayena tattha tattha lakkhaṇe kammasarikkhakaṃ niddhāretvā yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: idha kamma sarikkhakam nāma sattu ssada tā lakkhaṇassa paṇīta lābhi tāya ñāpaka nimitta bhāvaḥ iminā nayena tattha tattha lakkhaṇe kamma sarikkhakam niddhāretvā yojetabbam

original: 209. Uttamo aggarasadāyakoti sabbasattānaṃ uttamo lokanātho aggānaṃ paṇītānaṃ rasānaṃ
analyzed: uttamaḥ agga rasa dāyakaḥ iti sabba sattānam uttamaḥ loka nāthaḥ aggānam paṇītānam rasānam

original: dāyako. Uttamānaṃ aggarasānanti paṇītesupi paṇītarasānaṃ. Khajjabhojjādijotakanti
analyzed: dāyakaḥ uttamānam agga rasānam ti paṇītesu pi paṇīta rasānam khajja bhojja ādi jotakam ti

original: khajjabhojjādilābhajotakaṃ. Lābhasaṃvattanikassa kammassa phalaṃ “lābhasaṃvattanika”nti
analyzed: khajja bhojja ādi lābha jotakam lābha saṃvattanikassa kammassa phalam lābha saṃvattanikanti

original: kāraṇūpacārena vadati. Tadatthajotakanti vā tassa paṇītabhojanadāyakattasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: kāraṇa upacārena vadati vā tassa paṇīta bhojana dāyaka tta saṅkhātassa

original: atthassa jotakaṃ. Tadādhigacchatīti ettha ā-kāro nipātamattanti āha “taṃ adhigacchatī”ti.
analyzed: atthassa jotakam tadā adhigacchati iti ettha ākāraḥ nipāta mattam ti āha tam adhigacchati iti

original: Lābhiruttamanti ra-kāro padasandhikaro.
analyzed: rakāraḥ pada sandhi karaḥ

original: Karacaraṇādilakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kara caraṇa ādi lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 210. Pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ pattacīvarādiṃ gihiparikkhāraṃ vatthāvudhayānasayanādiṃ.
analyzed: pabbajita parikkhāram patta cīvara ādim gihi parikkhāram vattha avudha yāna sayana ādim

original: Sabbanti sabbaṃ upakāraṃ. Makkhetvā nāseti makkhibhāve ṭhatvā. Telena viya makkhetīti
analyzed: sabbam ti sabbam upakāram makkhetvā nāseti makkhi bhāve ṭhatvā telena viya makkheti iti

original: satadhotatelena makkheti viya. Atthasaṃvaḍḍhanakathāyāti hitāvahakathāya. Kathāgahaṇañcettha
analyzed: makkheti viya attha saṃvaḍḍhana kathāya ati hita āvaha kathāya kathā gahaṇam ca ittha

original: nidassanamattaṃ. Paresaṃ hitāvaho kāyapayogopi atthacariyā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vacīpayogavaseneva atthacariyā vuttā.
analyzed: nidassana mattam paresam hita āvaho kāya payogaḥ api attha cariyā aṭṭhakathā ayam pana vacī payoga vasena iva attha cariyā vuttā

original: Samānattatāyāti sadisabhāve samānaṭṭhāne ṭhapanena, taṃ panassa samānaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ
analyzed: samānatta tāya ati sadisa bhāve samāna ṭhapanena tam panassa samāna ṭṭhāne ṭhapanam

original: attasadisatākaraṇaṃ, sukhena ekasambhogatā, attano sukhuppattiyaṃ; tassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ
analyzed: atta sadisa tā karaṇam sukhena eka sambhoga tā attano sukha uppattiyam tassa ca dukkha uppattiyam

original: tena attano ekasambhogatāti āha “samānasukhadukkhabhāvenā”ti. Sā ca samānasukhadukkhatā
analyzed: tena attanaḥ eka sambhoga tā ti āha samāna sukha dukkha bhāvena ati sā ca samāna sukha dukkha tā

original: ekato nisajjādinā pākaṭā hotīti taṃ dassento “ekāsane”tiādimāha. Na hi sakkā ekaparibhogo
analyzed: ekatas nisajja ādinā pākaṭā hoti iti tam dassentaḥ eka āsana iti ādim āha na hi sakkā eka paribhogaḥ

original: kātuṃ jātiyā hīnattā. Tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati bhogena adhikattā, tasmā dussaṅgaho.
analyzed: kātum jātiyāḥ hīna ttā tathā a kariyamāne ca saḥ kujjhati bhogena adhika ttā tasmā dussaṅgahaḥ

original: Na hi so ekaparibhogaṃ icchati jātiyā hīnabhāvato. Na akariyamāne ca kujjhati bhogena
analyzed: na hi saḥ eka paribhogam icchati jātiyāḥ hīna bhāvataḥ na a kariyamāṇe ca kujjhati bhogena

original: hīnabhāvato. Ubhohīti jātibhogehi. Sadisopi susaṅgaho ekasadisabhāveneva itarena
analyzed: hīna bhāvataḥ jāti bhogehi sadisaḥ api su saṅgahaḥ eka sadisa bhāvena iva itarena

original: saha ekaparibhogassa paccāsīsāya, akaraṇe ca tassa kujjhanassābhāvato. Adīyamānepi
analyzed: saha eka paribhogassa a karaṇe ca tassa a dīyamāne pi

original: kismiñci āmise akariyamānepi saṅgahe. Na pāpakena cittena passati pesalabhāvato.
analyzed: kismiñci āmise a kariyamāne pi saṅgahe na pāpakena cittena passati pesala bhāvato

original: Tato eva paribhogopi…pe… hoti. Evarūpanti gihī ce, ubhohi sadisaṃ; pabbajito ce,
analyzed: tatas eva hoti evarūpanti gihī ce ubhohi sadisam pabbajito ce

original: sīlavantanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: sīlavantanti adhippāyo

original: Susaṅgahitāva hontīti suṭṭhu saṅgahitā eva honti daḷhabhattibhāvato. Tenāha “na bhijjantī”ti.
analyzed: su saṅgahitāḥ ava honti iti suṭṭhu saṅgahitāḥ eva honti daḷha bhatti bhāvataḥ tena āha na bhijjanti iti

original: Dānādisaṅgahakammanti dānādibhedaṃ parasaṅgaṇhanavasena pavattaṃ kusalakammaṃ.
analyzed: dāna ādi saṅgaha kamman ti dāna ādi bhedam para saṅgaṇhana vasena pavattam kusala kammam

original: 211. Anavaññātena aparibhūtena sambhāvitena. Pamodo vuccati hāso, na appamodenāti
analyzed: an avaññātena a paribhūtena sambhāvitena pamodaḥ vuccati hāsaḥ na appamodena ati

original: ettha paṭisedhadvayena so eva vutto. So ca odagyasabhāvattā na dīno dhammūpasañhitattā
analyzed: ettha paṭisedha dvayena so eva vuttaḥ saḥ ca odagya sabhāvattā na dīnaḥ dhamma upasañhita ttā

original: na gabbhayuttoti āha “na dīnena na gabbhitenāti attho”ti. Sattānaṃ agaṇhanaguṇenāti yojanā.
analyzed: na gabbha yutto ti āha na dīnena na gabbhitena ati attho ti sattānam a gaṇhana guṇena ati yojanā

original: Atiruciranti ativiya rucirakataṃ, taṃ pana passantānaṃ pasādāvahanti āha “supāsādika”nti.
analyzed: ati ruciram ti ativiya rucira katam tam pana passantānam pasāda āvahanti āha su pāsādikam ti

original: Suṭṭhu chekanti ativiya sundaraṃ. Vidhātabboti vidhātuṃ sandisituṃ sakkuṇeyyo. Piyaṃ
analyzed: suṭṭhu sundaram vidhātabbaḥ ti vidhātum sandisitum sakkuṇeyyaḥ piyam

original: vadatīti piyavadū yathā “sabbavidū”ti. Sukhameva sukhatā, taṃ sukhataṃ. Dhammañca
analyzed: vadati iti piya vadū yathā sabba vidū iti sukham eva sukhatā tam sukhatam dhammam ca

original: anudhammañcāti lokuttaradhammañceva tassa anurūpapubbabhāgadhammañca.
analyzed: anudhammañca ati lokuttara dhammañca iva tassa anurūpa pubbabhāga dhammañca

original: Ussaṅkhapādādilakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ussaṅkha pāda ādi lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 212. “Atthūpasaṃhita”nti iminā vaṭṭanissitā dhammakathā vuttāti āha “idhalokaparalokatthanissita”nti.
analyzed: attha upasaṃhitanti iminā vaṭṭa nissitā dhamma kathā vuttā ti āha idhaloka para loka attha nissitanti

analyzed: dhamma upasaṃhitanti iminā vivaṭṭa nissitā tasmā dasa kusala kamma pathā vivaṭṭa sannissayā

original: veditabbā. Nidaṃsesīti sandassesi te dhamme paccakkhe katvā pakāsesi. Nidaṃsanakathanti
analyzed: veditabbā nidaṃsesi iti sandassesi te dhamme paccakkhe katvā pakāsesi nidaṃsana kathan ti

original: pākaṭakaraṇakathaṃ. Jeṭṭhaṭṭhena aggo, pāsaṃsaṭṭhena seṭṭho, pamukhaṭṭhena pāmokkho,
analyzed: pākaṭa karaṇa katham jeṭṭha ṭṭhena aggaḥ pāsaṃsa ṭṭhena seṭṭhaḥ pamukha ṭṭhena pāmokkhaḥ

original: padhānaṭṭhena uttamo, hitasukhatthikehi pakārato varaṇīyato rajanīyato pavaroti evaṃ
analyzed: padhāna ṭṭhena uttamaḥ hita sukha atthikehi pakārataḥ varaṇīyataḥ rajanīyataḥ pavaroti evam

original: atthavisesavācīnampi “aggo”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ bhāvatthassa bhedābhāvato “sabbāni aññamaññavevacanānī”ti āha.
analyzed: attha visesa vācīnam pi agga uti ādīnam padānam bhāva tthassa bheda abhāvato sabbāni aññamañña vevacanāni iti āha

original: Sīhapubbaddhakāyādilakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
224. Khemakāmoti anupaddavakāmo. Kammassakatāñāṇaṃ sattānaṃ vaḍḍhiāvahaṃ sabbasampattividhāyakanti āha “paññāyāti kammassakatāpaññāyā”ti.
analyzed: khema kāmo ti anupaddava kāmo kammassaka tā ñāṇam sattānam vaḍḍhi āvaham sabba sampatti vidhāyakanti āha paññāya ati kammassaka tā paññāya ati

original: Samantaparipūrānīti samantato sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇāni. Tato eva ahīnāni anūnāni. Dhanādīhīti dhanadhaññādīhi.
analyzed: samanta paripūrāni iti samantataḥ sabba bhāgehi paripuṇṇāni tatas eva ahīnāni anūnāni dhana ādīhi iti dhana dhañña ādīhi

original: 225. Okappanasaddhā saddheyyavatthuṃ okkanditvā pakkhanditvā saddahanasaddhā. Sā
analyzed: okappana saddhā saddheyya vatthum okkanditvā pakkhanditvā saddahana saddhā sā

original: eva pasādanīyavatthusmimpi abhippasīdanavasena pavattiyā pasādasaddhā. Pariyattisavanenāti
analyzed: eva pasādanīya vatthusmim pi abhippasīdana vasena pavattiyā pasāda saddhā pariyatti savanena ati

original: sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahāya pariyattiyā savanena. Dhāraṇaparicayādīnaṃ taṃmūlakattā

original: Rasaggasaggitālakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: rasa agga saggi tā lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 226. Tilaphalamattampi bhojanaṃ. Sabbattha pharatīti sabbā rasāharaṇiyo anussarantaṃ sabhāvena sabbasmiṃ kāye pharati. Samā hutvā vahantīti avisamā ujukā hutvā pavattanti.

original: Ārogyakaraṇakammanti arogabhāvakaraṃ sattānaṃ aviheṭhanakammaṃ. Madhurādibhedaṃ rasaṃ

analyzed: gasati harati etehi sayam eva vā tam gasanti gilanti antar pavesenti iti rasaggasā

original: rasaggasānaṃ aggā rasaggasaggā, te ettha santīti rasaggasaggī, tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: rasagga sānam aggāḥ rasagga saggā te ettha santi iti rasagga saggī tat eva lakkhaṇaṃ

original: Bhavati hi abhinnepi vatthusmiṃ taggatavisesāvabodhanatthaṃ bhinnaṃ viya katvā vohāro

original: 227. Vadha-saddo “attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodatī”tiādīsu bādhanatthopi hotīti tato
analyzed: vadha saddo attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodati itiādīsu bādhana tthaḥ api hoti iti tatas

original: visesanatthaṃ “māraṇavadhenā”ti vuttaṃ, māraṇasaṅkhātena vadhenāti attho. Bādhanattho
analyzed: visesana attham māraṇa vadhena ati vuttam māraṇa saṅkhātena vadhena ati atthaḥ bādhana atthaḥ

original: uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bādhanena. Tenāha “bandhanāgārappavesanenā”ti.

original: Abhinīlanettādilakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: abhinīla netta ādi lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 228. Visaṭanti kujjhanavasena vinisaṭaṃ katvā. Tenāha “kakkaṭako viyā”tiādi. Visācīti

analyzed: atthaḥ viceyya pekkhitā ti ujukam an oloketvā diṭṭhipātam vicāretvā oloketvā tena āha

analyzed: yaḥ kujjhitvā atiādi paroti kujjhitaḥ na tam sammukhāḥ gacchantam kujjhitvā

analyzed: attho jimham an āloketvā ujukam olokanam nāma kuṭila bhāva karānam pāpa dhammānam

analyzed: ummīlana vasena sammad eva patthaṭam vipulam tassa iva

original: vevacanaṃ. Piyaṃ piyāyitabbaṃ dassanaṃ olokanaṃ etassāti piyadassano.

original: Kāṇoti akkhīni nimmīletvā pekkhanako. Kākakkhīti kekarakkho. Vaṅkakkhīti jimhapekkhanako.

analyzed: veditabbā pasādaḥ ti pana tesam vaṇṇānam pasanna ākāram sandhāya vuttanti keci pañcavaṇṇo

original: Uṇhīsasīsalakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: uṇhīsa sīsa lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 230. Pubbaṅgamoti ettha pubbaṅgamatā nāma pamukhatā, jeṭṭhaseṭṭhakabhāvo bahujanassa anuvattanīyatāti āha “gaṇajeṭṭhako”tiādi.

analyzed: vicarati mahā purisaḥ ti mahā purisa jātikaḥ

original: Ekekalomatādilakkhaṇavaṇṇanā

original: Sīhahanulakkhaṇavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sīhahanu lakkhaṇa vaṇṇanā

original: 238. Appadhaṃsikoti appadhaṃsiyo. Ya-kārassa hi ka-kāraṃ katvā ayaṃ niddeso yathā “niyyānikā dhammā”ti guṇatoti attanā adhigataguṇato. Ṭhānatoti yathāṭhitaṭṭhānantarato.

original: Palāpakathāyāti samphappalāpakathāya. Antopaviṭṭhahanukā ekato, ubhato vā saṃkucitavisukā. Vaṅkahanukā ekapassena kuṭilavisukā. Pabbhārahanukā purato olambamānavisukā.

original: ṭhitasseva vakkhamānanayo yujjatīti “soti so sotāpanno”ti vuttaṃ. Pāpaka-saddo nihīnapariyāyoti

original: “lāmakehī”ti vuttaṃ. Apāyadukkhaṃ, vaṭṭadukkhañca pāpentīti vā pāpakā, tehi pāpakehi.
analyzed: lāmakehi iti vuttam apāya dukkham vaṭṭa dukkham ca pāpenti iti vā pāpakā tehi pāpakehi

original: Cha disā paṭicchādentoti tena tena bhāgena dissantīti “disā”ti saññite cha bhāge
analyzed: cha disā paṭicchādento ti tena tena bhāgena dissanti iti disā ati saññite cha bhāge

original: satte yathā tehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti, evaṃ paṭicchādento paṭisandhārento.
analyzed: satte yathā tehi saddhim attanaḥ chiddam na hoti evam paṭicchādentaḥ paṭisandhārentaḥ

original: Vijinanatthāyāti abhibhavanatthāya. Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ, samparāyikañca anatthaṃ
analyzed: vijinana tthāya ati abhibhavana tthāya yaḥ hi diṭṭhadhammikam samparāyikam ca anattham

original: parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadubhayatthaṃ sampādeti, so ubhayalokavijayāya
analyzed: parivajjana vasena abhibhavati tatas eva tat ubhayattham sampādeti saḥ ubhaya loka vijayāya

original: paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato, sakatthasampādanato ca. Tenāha “ayañceva
analyzed: paṭipannaḥ nāma hoti paccatthika niggaṇhanato sa kattha sampādanato ca tena āha ayam ca eva

original: loko”tiādi. Pāṇātipātādīni pañca verāni verappasavanato. Āraddho hotīti saṃsādhito
analyzed: loka uti ādi pāṇātipāta ādīni pañca verāni vera ppasavanataḥ āraddhaḥ hoti iti saṃsādhito

original: hoti, tayidaṃ saṃsādhanaṃ kittisaddena idha sattānaṃ cittatosanena, verābhāvāpādanena
analyzed: hoti tayā idam saṃsādhanam kitti saddena idha sattānam citta tosanena vera abhāva āpādanena

original: ca hotīti āha “paritosito ceva nipphādito cā”ti. Puna pañca verānīti pañca veraphalāni uttarapadalopena.
analyzed: ca hoti iti āha paritositaḥ ca iva nipphāditaḥ ca ati puna pañca verāni iti pañca vera phalāni uttara pada lopena

original: Katamassāti katame assa. Kilesasampayuttattā kilesoti taṃyogato taṃsadisaṃ vadati
analyzed: katamassa ati katame assa kilesa sampayutta ttā kileso ti tad yogataḥ tad sadisam vadati

original: yathā “pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, nīlaṃ vattha”nti ca. Sampayuttatā cettha tadekaṭṭhatāya
analyzed: yathā pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam nīlam ca sampayutta tā ca ittha tad ekaṭṭha tāya

original: veditabbā, na ekuppādāditāya. Evañca katvā pāṇātipātakammassa diṭṭhimānalobhādīhipi
analyzed: veditabbā na eka uppāda ādi tāya evam ca katvā pāṇātipāta kammassa diṭṭhi māna lobha ādīhi pi

original: kiliṭṭhatā siddhā hoti, micchācārassa dosādīhi kiliṭṭhatā. Tenāha “saṃkilesoyevā”tiādi.
analyzed: kiliṭṭha tā siddhā hoti micchā ācārassa dosa ādīhi kiliṭṭha tā tena āha

original: Pubbe vuttaatthavasena pana sammukhenapi nesaṃ kilesapariyāyo labbhateva. Etadatthaparidīpakamevāti
analyzed: pubbe vutta attha vasena pana sammukhena api na isam kilesa pariyāyaḥ labbhateva etad attha paridīpakam evā ti

original: yo “pāṇātipāto kho”tiādinā vutto, etassa atthassa paridīpakameva. Yadi evaṃ kasmā
analyzed: yaḥ pāṇa atipātaḥ kho ti ādinā vuttaḥ etassa atthassa paridīpakam eva yadi evam kasmā

original: puna vuttanti āha “gāthābandha”nti, tassa atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ bhagavā gāthābandhaṃ avocāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: puna vuttanti āha gāthābandham iti tassa atthassa sukha ggahaṇa attham bhagavā gāthābandham avoca ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Catuṭhānādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: catu ṭhāna ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 246. “Pāpakammaṃ karotī”ti kasmā ayaṃ uddesaniddeso pavattoti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: pāpa kammam karoti iti kasmai ayam uddesa niddeso pavatto ti antolīna codanam sandhāya

original: “idaṃ bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sukkapakkhavasena hi uddeso kato, kaṇhapakkhavasena ca
analyzed: idam bhagavā tiādi vuttam sukka pakkha vasena hi uddeso kato kaṇha pakkha vasena ca

original: niddeso āraddho. Kāraketi pāpakammassa kārake. Akārako pākaṭo hoti yathā paṭipajjanto
analyzed: niddesaḥ āraddhaḥ kāraka iti pāpa kammassa kārake akārakaḥ pākaṭaḥ hoti yathā paṭipajjanto

original: pāpaṃ karoti nāma, tathā appaṭipajjanato. Saṃkilesadhammavivajjanapubbakaṃ vodānadhammapaṭipattiācikkhanaṃ
analyzed: pāpam karoti nāma tathā a paṭipajjanato saṃkilesa dhamma vivajjana pubbakam vodāna dhamma paṭipatti ācikkhanam

original: idha desanākosallaṃ. Paṭhamataraṃ kārakaṃ dassento āha yathā “vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: desanākosallam paṭhamataram kārakam dassentaḥ āha yathā vāmam muñca dakkhiṇam

original: gaṇhā”ti tathā hi bhagavā aṭṭhatiṃsa maṅgalāni dassento “asevanā ca bālāna”nti vatvā
analyzed: gaṇhāti tathā hi bhagavā aṭṭhatiṃsa maṅgalāni dassentaḥ asevanā ca bālānaṃ ti vatvā

original: “paṇḍitānañca sevanā”ti avoca. Chandāgatinti ettha sandhivasena saralopoti dassento
analyzed: paṇḍitānam ca sevanā ati avoca ettha sandhi vasena dassento

original: āha “chandena pemena agati”nti. Chandāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti āha “chandenā”ti.
analyzed: āha chandena pemena agatinti chanda ati hetumhi nissakka vacananti āha chandena ati

original: Chanda-saddo cettha taṇhāpariyāyo, na kusalacchandādipariyāyoti āha “pemenā”ti. Parapadesūti
analyzed: chanda saddo ca ittha taṇhā pariyāyaḥ na kusala chanda ādi pariyāyaḥ iti āha pemena ati para padesu iti

original: “dosāgatiṃ gacchanto”tiādīsu vākyesu. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā “dosena kopenā”ti evamādi
analyzed: dosa āgatim gacchantaḥ iti ādīsu vākyesu iminā dosena kopena ati evamādi

original: atthavacanaṃ atidisati. Mittoti daḷhamitto, sambhattoti attho. Sandiṭṭhoti diṭṭhamattasahāyo.
analyzed: attha vacanam atidisati mitto ti daḷha mitto sambhatto ti attho sandiṭṭhaḥ ti diṭṭha matta sahāyaḥ

original: Pakativeravasenāti pakatiyā uppannaveravasena, cirakālānubandhavirodhavasenāti attho.
analyzed: pakati vera vasena ati pakatiyā uppanna vera vasena cira kāla anubandha virodha vasena ati attho

original: Tenevāha “taṅkhaṇuppannakodhavasena vā”ti. Yaṃ vā taṃ vā ayuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ vatvā.
analyzed: tena iva āha taṅkhaṇa uppanna kodha vasena vāti yam vā tam vā ayuttam akāraṇam vatvā

original: Visame corādike, visamāni vā kāyaduccaritādīni samādāya vattanena nissito visamanissito.
analyzed: visame cora ādike visamāni vā kāya duccarita ādīni samādāya vattanena nissitaḥ visama nissitaḥ

original: Chandāgatiādīni na gacchati maggeneva catunnampi agatigamanānaṃ pahīnattā, agatigamanānīti ca tathāpavattā apāyagamanīyā akusalacittuppādā veditabbā agati gacchati etehīti.
analyzed: chanda agati ādīni na gacchati maggena iva catunnam pi agati gamanānam pahīna ttā agati gamanāni iti ca tathā pavattāḥ apāya gamanīyāḥ akusala cittuppādāḥ veditabbāḥ agati gacchati etehi iti

original: Yassati tena kittīyatīti yaso, thutighoso. Yassati tena purecarānucarabhāvena parivārīyatīti
analyzed: yaḥ ati tena kittīyati iti yasaḥ thuti ghosaḥ yaḥ ati tena purecara anucara bhāvena parivārīyati iti

original: yaso, parivāroti āha “kittiyasopi parivārayasopī”ti. Parihāyatīti pubbe yo ca yāvatake
analyzed: parivāro ti āha kitti yaso pi parivāra yaso pi iti parihāyati iti pubbe yaḥ ca yāvatake

original: labbhati, tato parito hāyati parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: labbhati tatas paritas hāyati parikkhayam gacchati

original: Chaapāyamukhādivaṇṇanā
analyzed: cha apāya mukha ādi vaṇṇanā

original: 247. Pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā pūvasurā. Evaṃ sesasurāpi.
analyzed: pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjam udakam datvā madditvā katā pūva surā evam sesa surā api

original: Kiṇṇāti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati, ye “surāmodakā” tipi vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā
analyzed: kiṇṇā ati pana tassā surāya bījam vuccati ye surāmodakā vuccanti te pakkhipitvā

original: katā kiṇṇapakkhittā. Harītakīsāsapādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā sambhārasaṃyuttā. Madhukatālanāḷikerādipuppharaso
analyzed: katā kiṇṇa pakkhittā harītakī sāsapa ādi nānā sambhārehi saṃyojitā sambhāra saṃyuttā madhuka tāla nāḷikera ādi puppha rasaḥ

original: cirapārivāsiko pupphāsavo. Panasādiphalaraso phalāsavo. Muddikāraso madhvāsavo. Ucchuraso
analyzed: cira pārivāsikaḥ puppha āsavaḥ panasa ādi phala rasaḥ phala āsavaḥ muddikā rasaḥ madhvāsavaḥ ucchu rasaḥ

original: guḷāsavo. Harītakāmalakakaṭukabhaṇḍādinānāsambhārānaṃ raso cirapārivāsiko sambhārasaṃyutto.
analyzed: guḷa āsavaḥ rasaḥ cira pārivāsikaḥ sambhāra saṃyutto

original: Taṃ sabbampīti taṃ sabbaṃ dasavidhampi. Madakaraṇavasena majjaṃ pivantaṃ madayatīti
analyzed: tam sabbam pi iti tam sabbam dasavidham pi mada karaṇa vasena majjam pivantam madayati iti

original: katvā. Surāmerayamajje pamādaṭṭhānaṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānaṃ. Anu anu yogoti
analyzed: katvā surā meraya majje pamāda ṭṭhānam surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānam anu anu yogoti

original: punappunaṃ taṃsamaṅgitā. Tenāha “punappunaṃ karaṇa”nti, aparāparaṃ pavattananti attho.
analyzed: punappunam taṃsamaṅgi tā tena āha punappunam karaṇam ti apara aparam pavattananti attho

original: Uppannā ceva bhogā parihāyanti pānabyasanena byasanakaraṇato. Anuppannā ca nuppajjanti
analyzed: uppannā ca iva bhogā parihāyanti pāna byasanena byasana karaṇataḥ anuppannā ca na uppajjanti

original: pamattassa kammantesu ñāyakaraṇābhāvato. Bhogānanti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena “bhogā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ
analyzed: pamattassa kammantesu ñāya karaṇa abhāvataḥ bhogānanti bhuñjitabba ṭṭhena bhogāti laddha nāmānam

original: kāmaguṇānaṃ. Apāyamukha-saddassa attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. Avelāyāti ayuttavelāya.
analyzed: kāma guṇānam apāya mukha saddassa attho heṭṭhā vuttaḥ eva avelāya ati ayutta velāya

original: Yadā vicarato attharakkhādayo na honti. Visikhāsu cariyāti racchāsu vicaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: yadā vicarataḥ attha rakkhā ādayaḥ na honti visikhāsu racchāsu vicaraṇam

original: Samajjā vuccati maho, yattha naccānipi payojīyanti, tesaṃ dassanādiatthaṃ tattha
analyzed: samajjā vuccati mahaḥ yattha naccāni pi tesam dassana ādi attham tattha

original: abhirativasena caraṇaṃ upagamanaṃ samajjābhicaraṇaṃ. Naccādidassanavasenāti naccādīnaṃ
analyzed: abhirati vasena caraṇam upagamanam sa majja abhicaraṇam nacca ādi dassana vasena ati nacca ādīnam

original: dassanādivasenāti ādisaddalopo daṭṭhabbo, dassanena vā savanampi gahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena.
analyzed: dassana ādi vasena ati ādi sadda lopaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ dassanena vā savanam pi gahitam virūpa eka sesa nayena

original: Ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcaviññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasambhavato
analyzed: ālocana sabhāva tāya vā pañca viññāṇānam dassana saṅkhepa sambhavato

original: “dassanavasena” icceva vuttaṃ. Idha cittālasiyatā akāraṇanti “kāyālasiyatā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassana vasena iccā iva vuttam idha citta alasiya tā akāraṇam ti kāya alasiya tā ati vuttam

original: Yuttappayuttatāti tappasutatā atirekataratāya.
analyzed: yutta ppayutta tā ati tad pasuta tā atirekatara tāya

original: Surāmerayassa chaādīnavādivaṇṇanā
248. Sayaṃ daṭṭhabbanti sandiṭṭhaṃ. Sandiṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhikaṃ, dhanajānisaddāpekkhāya
analyzed: sayam daṭṭhabbanti sandiṭṭham sandiṭṭham eva sandiṭṭhikam dhana jāni sadda apekkhāya

original: pana itthiliṅgavasena niddeso, diṭṭhadhammikāti ayamettha atthoti āha “idhalokabhāvinī”ti.
analyzed: pana itthi liṅga vasena niddesaḥ diṭṭhadhammikā ti ayam ettha attho ti āha idha loka bhāvinī iti

original: Samaṃ, sammā passitabbāti vā sandiṭṭhikā, pānasamakālabhāvinīti attho. Kalahappavaḍḍhanī
analyzed: samam sammā passitabbā ati vā sandiṭṭhikā pāna sama kāla bhāvinī iti attho kalaha ppavaḍḍhanī

original: mittassa kalahe anādīnavadassibhāvato. Khettaṃ uppattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Āyatananti vā
analyzed: mittassa kalahe anādīnava dassi bhāvataḥ khettam uppatti ṭṭhāna bhāvataḥ āyatanan ti vā

original: kāraṇaṃ, ākaro vāti attho. Paraloke akittiṃ pāpuṇanti akittisaṃvattaniyassa kammassa
analyzed: kāraṇam ākaraḥ vā ati attho para loke akittim pāpuṇanti akitti saṃvattaniyassa kammassa

original: pasavanato. Kopīnaṃ vā pākaṭabhāvena akattabbarahassakammaṃ. Surāmadamattā ca pubbe
analyzed: pasavanataḥ kopīnam vā pākaṭa bhāvena a kattabba rahassa kammam surā mada mattā ca pubbe

original: attanā kataṃ tādisaṃ kammaṃ amattakāle chādentā vicaritvā mattakāle paccatthikānampi
analyzed: attanā katam tādisam kammam a matta kāle chādentāḥ vicaritvā matta kāle paccatthikānam pi

original: vivaranti pākaṭaṃ karonti, tena tesaṃ sā surā tassa kopīnassa nidaṃsanato “kopīnanidaṃsanī”ti
analyzed: pākaṭam karonti tena tesam sā surā tassa kopīnassa nidaṃsanataḥ kopīna nidaṃsanī iti

original: vuccatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kammassakatāpaññanti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuccati iti evam ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo nidassana mattam daṭṭhabbam

original: “Yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ paññaṃ dubbalaṃ karotiyevā”ti hi sakkā viññātuṃ. Tathā hi byatirekamukhena
analyzed: yam kiñci lokiyam paññam dubbalam hi sakkā viññātum tathā hi byatireka mukhena

original: tamatthaṃ patiṭṭhapetuṃ “maggapaññaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Antomukhameva na pavisatī”ti
analyzed: tam attham patiṭṭhapetum magga paññam pana atiādi vuttam antomukham eva na pavisati iti

original: iminā surāya maggapaññādubbalakaraṇassa durasamussāritabhāvamāha. Nanu cevaṃ surāya
analyzed: iminā surāya magga paññā dubbala karaṇassa dura samussārita bhāvam āha nanu ca ivam surāya

original: tassā paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe sāmatthiyavighāto acodito hoti ariyānaṃ anuppayogasseva
analyzed: paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe sāmatthiya vighāto a coditaḥ hoti ariyānam an uppayogassa iva

original: coditattāti? Nayidaṃ evaṃ upayogopi nāma sadā tesaṃ natthi, kuto kiccakaraṇanti imassa
analyzed: codita ttā ati evam upayogaḥ api nāma sadā tesam natthi kutas kicca karaṇam ti imassa

original: atthassa vuttattā. Atha pana aṭṭhānaparikappavasenassā kadāci siyā upayogo, tathāpi
analyzed: atthassa vutta ttā atha pana aṭṭhāna parikappa vasena assā kadāci siyā upayogo tathā api

original: so tassā dubbaliyaṃ īsakampi kātuṃ nālameva sammadeva paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
analyzed: so tassāḥ dubbaliyam īsakam pi kātum na alam eva sammat eva paṭipakkha dūrībhāvena su patiṭṭhita bhāvato

original: Tenāha “maggapaññaṃ pana dubbalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotī”ti. Maggasīsena cettha ariyānaṃ
analyzed: tena āha magga paññam pana dubbalam kātum na sakkoti iti magga sīsena ca ittha ariyānam

original: sabbassāpi lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya dubbalabhāvāpādāne asamatthatā dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: sabbassa api lokiya lokuttarāya paññāya dubbala bhāva apādāne asamattha tā dassitā ati daṭṭhabbam

original: Pajjati etena phalanti padaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: pajjati etena phalanti padam kāraṇam

original: 249. Attāpissa akālacārissa agutto sarasato arakkhito upakkamatopi parivajjanīyānaṃ
analyzed: attā apissa a kāla cārissa a gutto sarasataḥ a rakkhitaḥ upakkamataḥ pi

original: aparivajjanato. Tenāha “avelāya caranto hī”tiādi. Kaṇṭakādīnipīti pi-saddena sobbhādike
analyzed: tena āha avelāya carantaḥ hi itiādi kaṇṭaka ādīni pi iti pi saddena sobbha ādike

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Verinopīti pi-saddena corādikā saṅgayhanti. Puttadārāti ettha puttaggahaṇena
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti verinā api iti pi saddena cora ādikā saṅgayhanti putta dārā ti ettha putta ggahaṇena

original: puttīpi gahitāti āha “puttadhītaro”ti. Bahi patthananti kāmapatthanāvasena antogehassitato
analyzed: gahitā ti āha putta dhītaro ti bahi patthananti kāma patthanā vasena

original: nibaddhavatthuto bahiddhā patthanaṃ katvā. Aññehi katapāpakammesūti parehi katāsu
analyzed: nibaddha vatthutaḥ bahiddhā patthanam katvā aññehi kata pāpa kammesu iti parehi katāsu

original: pāpakiriyāsu. Saṅkitabbo hoti akāle tattha tattha caraṇato. Ruhati yasmiṃ padese
analyzed: pāpa kiriyāsu saṅkitabbaḥ hoti akāle tattha tattha caraṇataḥ ruhati yasmin padese

original: corikā pavattā, tattha parehi diṭṭhattā. Vattuṃ na sakkāti “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ, ettakaṃ
analyzed: corikā pavattā tattha parehi diṭṭha ttā vattum na sakkā ati ettakam dukkham ettakam

original: domanassa”nti paricchinditvā vattuṃ na sakkā. Taṃ sabbampi vikālacārimhi puggale
analyzed: paricchinditvā vattum na sakkā tam sabbam pi vikāla cārimhi puggale

original: āharitabbaṃ tassa upari pakkhipitabbaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Aññasmiṃ puggale tathārūpe āsaṅkitabbe
analyzed: āharitabbam tassa upari pakkhipitabbam hoti katham aññasmin puggale tathārūpe āsaṅkitabbe

original: asati. Itīti evaṃ. Soti vikālacārī. Purakkhato purato attano upari āsaṅkante katvā carati.

analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ ñāpakam kāraṇam vaṇṇanataḥ thūla rassa ādi bhāvena upaṭṭhānataḥ vaṇṇaḥ saṇṭhānam

original: “Mahantaṃ khuddakaṃ, majjhima”nti vaṇṇetabbato pamāṇetabbato vaṇṇo, pamāṇaṃ. Vaṇṇīyati

original: Kevalaparipuṇṇanti ekadesampi asesetvā niravasesatova paripuṇṇanti ayamettha atthoti
analyzed: kevala paripuṇṇanti eka desam pi a sesetvā niravasesataḥ va paripuṇṇanti ayam ettha atthaḥ ti

original: anatthantarena pana kappa-saddena padavaḍḍhanaṃ kataṃ kevalameva kevalakappanti.

original: Atha vā kappanīyatā, paññāpetabbatā kevalakappā. Abyāmissatā vijātiyena asaṅkarā
analyzed: atha vā kappanīya tā paññāpetabba tā kevalakappā a byāmissa tā vijātiyena asaṅkarā

original: Kappa-saddo panāyaṃ sa-upasaggo, anupasaggo cāti adhippāyena okappaniyapade labbhamānaṃ

original: nāmettha gimhānaṃ pacchime māse paccūsavelāyaṃ samasītuṇhautu hoti, evameva sabbakālaṃ
