original: samasītuṇhova utu hoti, na ca tesaṃ koci upaghāto, vihesā vā uppajjati. Akaṭṭhapākimameva
analyzed: hoti na ca tesam koci upaghātaḥ vihesā vā uppajjati

original: sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulaphalaṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ nesaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, gaṇḍo,
analyzed: sālim a kaṇam a thusam su gandham taṇḍula phalam paribhuñjantānam kuṭṭham gaṇḍo

original: kilāso, soso, kāso, sāso, apamāro, jaroti evamādiko na koci rogo uppajjati. Na te
analyzed: kilāsaḥ sosaḥ kāsaḥ sāsaḥ apamāraḥ evamādikaḥ na koci rogaḥ uppajjati na te

original: khujjā vā vāmanakā vā kāṇā vā kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkhahatā vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā
analyzed: khujjā vā vāmanakā vā kāṇā vā kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkha hatā vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā

original: vā honti. Itthiyopi tattha nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷā nāccodātā
analyzed: vā honti itthiyaḥ pi tattha na ati dīghā na ati rassā na ati kisā na ati thūlā na ati kāḷā na accodātā

original: sobhaggappattarūpā honti. Tathā hi dīghaṅgulī tambanakhī lambatthanā tanumajjhā puṇṇacandamukhī
analyzed: sobhagga ppatta rūpāḥ honti tathā hi dīghaṅgulī tambanakhī lambatthanā tanumajjhā puṇṇacandamukhī

original: visālakkhī mudugattā saṃhitūrū odātadantā gambhīranābhī tanujaṅghā dīghanīlavellitakesī
analyzed: visa alakkhī mudu gattā saṃhita ūrū odāta dantā gambhīra nābhī tanu jaṅghā dīgha nīla vellita kesī

original: puthulasusoṇī nātilomānālomā subhagā utusukhasamphassā saṇhā sakhilasambhāsā nānābharaṇavibhūsitā
analyzed: puthula su soṇī na atilomā anālomā subhagā utu sukha samphassā saṇhā sa khila sambhāsā nānā ābharaṇa vibhūsitā

original: vicaranti. Sabbadā hi soḷasavassuddesikā viya honti. Purisā ca pañcavīsativassuddesikā
analyzed: vicaranti sabbadā hi soḷasa vassuddesikāḥ viya honti purisā ca pañcavīsati vassuddesikā

original: viya, na puttadāresu rajjanti. Ayaṃ tattha dhammatā.
analyzed: viya na putta dāresu rajjanti ayam tattha dhamma tā

original: Sattāhikameva ca tattha itthipurisā kāmaratiyā viharanti, tato vītarāgā yathāsakaṃ
analyzed: sattāhikam eva ca tattha itthi purisāḥ kāma ratiyā viharanti tatas vīta rāgāḥ yathāsakam

original: gacchanti. Na tattha idha viya gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ, gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ, vijāyanamūlakaṃ
analyzed: gacchanti na tattha idha viya gabbha ukkanti mūlakam gabbha pariharaṇa mūlakam vijāyana mūlakam

original: vā dukkhaṃ hoti. Rattakañcukato kañcanapaṭimā viya dārakā mātukucchito amakkhitā
analyzed: vā dukkham hoti ratta kañcukataḥ kañcana paṭimāḥ viya dārakāḥ mātukucchitaḥ a makkhitā

original: eva semhādinā sukheneva nikkhamanti, ayaṃ tattha dhammatā.
analyzed: eva semha ādinā sukhena iva nikkhamanti ayam tattha dhamma tā

original: Mātā pana puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā vijāyitvā tesaṃ vicaraṇappadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā
analyzed: mātā pana puttam vā dhītaram vā vijāyitvā tesam vicaraṇa ppadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā

original: yathāruci gacchati. Tesaṃ tattha sayitānaṃ ye passanti purisā, itthiyo vā, te attano
analyzed: yathāruci gacchati tesam tattha sayitānam ye passanti purisāḥ itthiyaḥ vā te attanaḥ

original: aṅguliyo upanāmenti, tesaṃ kammabalena tato khīraṃ pavattati, tena dārakā yāpenti.
analyzed: aṅguliyaḥ upanāmenti tesam kamma balena tatas khīram pavattati tena dārakāḥ yāpenti

original: Evaṃ pana vaḍḍhantā katipayadivaseheva laddhabalā hutvā dārikā itthiyo upagacchanti,
analyzed: evam pana vaḍḍhantā katipaya divasehi iva laddha balāḥ hutvā dārikāḥ itthiyaḥ upagacchanti

original: dārakā purise. Kapparukkhato eva ca tesaṃ tattha tattha vatthābharaṇāni nippajjanti.
analyzed: dārakā purise kappa rukkhataḥ eva ca tesam tattha tattha vattha ābharaṇāni nippajjanti

original: Nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittāni hi sukhumāni mudusukhasamphassāni vatthāni tattha tattha
analyzed: nānā virāga vaṇṇa vicittāni hi sukhumāni mudu sukha samphassāni vatthāni tattha tattha

original: kapparukkhesu olambantāni iṭṭhanti. Nānāvidharaṃsijālasamujjalavividhavaṇṇaratanavinaddhāni
analyzed: kappa rukkhesu olambantāni iṭṭhanti nānāvidha raṃsi jāla samujjala vividha vaṇṇa ratana vinaddhāni

original: anekavidhamālākammalatākammabhittikammavicittāni sīsūpagagīvūpagahatthūpagakaṭūpagapādūpagāni
analyzed: anekavidha mālā kamma latā kamma bhitti kamma vicittāni sīsūpaga gīvūpaga hatthūpaga kaṭu upaga pādūpagāni

original: sovaṇṇamayāni ābharaṇāni ca kapparukkhato olambanti. Tathā vīṇāmudiṅgapaṇavasammatāḷasaṅkhavaṃsavetāḷaparivānivallakīpabhutikā
analyzed: sovaṇṇa mayāni ābharaṇāni ca kappa rukkhataḥ olambanti tathā

original: tūriyabhaṇḍāpi tato tato olambanti. Tattha ca bahū phalarukkhā kumbhamattāni phalāni
analyzed: tato tato olambanti tattha ca bahū phala rukkhā kumbha mattāni phalāni

original: phalanti madhurarasāni, yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāhampi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti.
analyzed: phalanti madhura rasāni yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāham pi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti

original: Najjopi tattha suvisuddhajalā supatitthā ramaṇīyā akaddamā vālukatalā nātisītā nāccuṇhā
analyzed: najjā upi tattha su visuddha jalā su patitthā ramaṇīyā a kaddamā vāluka talā na ati sītā na accuṇhā

original: surabhigandhīhi jalajapupphehi sañchannā sabbakālaṃ surabhiṃ vāyantiyo sandanti.
analyzed: surabhi gandhīhi jala ja pupphehi sañchannā sabbakālam surabhim vāyantiyaḥ sandanti

original: Na tattha kaṇṭakatiṇakakkhaḷagacchalatā honti, akaṇṭakā pupphaphalasampannā eva honti.
analyzed: na tattha kaṇṭaka tiṇaka khaḷaga chalatāḥ honti akaṇṭakāḥ puppha phala sampannāḥ eva honti

original: Candananāgarukkhā sayameva rasaṃ paggharanti. Nhāyitukāmā ca nadītitthe ekajjhaṃ
analyzed: candana nāga rukkhā sayam eva rasam paggharanti nhāyitu kāmā ca nadī titthe ekajjham

original: vatthābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otaritvā nhatvā uttiṇṇuttiṇṇā upariṭṭhimaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ
analyzed: vattha ābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadim otaritvā nhatvā uttiṇṇa uttiṇṇā upariṭṭhimam vattha ābharaṇam

original: gaṇhanti, na tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “idaṃ mama, idaṃ parassā”ti, tato eva na tesaṃ koci
analyzed: gaṇhanti na tesam evam hoti idam mama idam parassa ati tatas eva na tesam koci

original: viggaho vā vivādo vā. Sattāhikā eva ca nesaṃ kāmaratikīḷā hoti, tato vītarāgā viya
analyzed: viggahaḥ vā vivādaḥ vā sattāhikāḥ eva ca na isam kāma rati kīḍā hoti tatas vīta rāgā

original: vicaranti. Yattha ca rukkhe sayitukāmā honti, tattheva sayanaṃ upalabhanti. Mate
analyzed: vicaranti yattha ca rukkhe sayitu kāmāḥ honti tattha iva sayanam upalabhanti mate

original: ca satte disvā na rodanti, na socanti, tañca maṇḍayitvā nikkhipanti. Tāvadeva ca
analyzed: ca satte disvā na rodanti na socanti tat ca maṇḍayitvā nikkhipanti tāvat eva ca

original: nesaṃ tathārūpā sakuṇā upagantvā mataṃ dīpantaraṃ nenti. Tasmā susānaṃ vā asuciṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tathārūpā sakuṇāḥ upagantvā matam dīpa antaram na inti tasmā su sānam vai a suci ṭṭhānam

original: vā tattha natthi. Na ca tato matā nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā upapajjanti.
analyzed: vā tattha natthi na ca tatas matā nirayam vā tiracchāna yonim vā petti visayam vā upapajjanti

original: “Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te devaloke nibbattantī”ti vadanti. Vassasahassameva
analyzed: dhammatā siddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te deva loke nibbattanti iti vadanti vassa sahassam eva

original: ca nesaṃ sabbakālaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ. Sabbametaṃ tesaṃ pañcasīlaṃ viya dhammatāsiddhaṃ
analyzed: ca nesam sabba kālam āyu ppamāṇam sabbam etam tesam pañcasīlam viya dhamma tā siddham

original: evāti veditabbaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ uttarakurudīpe.
analyzed: eva ati veditabbam tattha iti tasmin uttarakuru dīpe

original: Ekakhuraṃ katvāti anekasaphampi ekasaphaṃ viya katvā, assaṃ viya katvāti attho. “Gāvi”nti
analyzed: eka khuram katvā iti aneka sapham pi eka sapham viya katvā assam viya katvā ati atthaḥ gāvin ti

original: vatvā puna “pasu”nti vuttattā gāvito itaro sabbo catuppado idha “pasū”ti adhippetoti
analyzed: vatvā puna pasu nti vutta ttā gāvito itaro sabbo catuppadaḥ idha pasu iti adhippeto ti

original: āha “ṭhapetvā gāvi”nti.
analyzed: āha gāvinti

original: Tassāti gabbhinitthiyā. Piṭṭhi onamituṃ sahatīti kucchiyā garubhāratāya tesaṃ āruḷhakāle
analyzed: tassa ati gabbhi nitthiyā piṭṭhi onamitum sahati iti kucchiyā āruḷha kāle

original: piṭṭhi onamati, tesaṃ nisajjaṃ sahati pallaṅke nisinnā viya honti. Sammādiṭṭhiketi
analyzed: piṭṭhi onamati tesam nisajjam sahati pallaṅke nisinnāḥ viya honti sammādiṭṭhikā iti

original: kammapathasammādiṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhike. Etthāti jambudīpe. Ettha hi janapadavohāro,
analyzed: kamma patha sammādiṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhike ettha ati jambudīpe ettha hi janapada vohāro

original: na uttarakurumhi. Tathā hi “paccantimamilakkhuvāsike”ti ca vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na uttarakurumhi tathā hi ca vuttam

original: Tassa raññoti vessavaṇamahārājassa. Iti so attānameva paraṃ viya katvā vadati. Eseva
analyzed: tassa rañño ti vessavaṇa mahā rājassa iti saḥ attānam eva param viya katvā vadati esa eva

original: nayo paratopi. Bahuvidhaṃ nānāratanavicittaṃ nānāsaṇṭhānaṃ rathādi dibbayānaṃ upaṭṭhitameva
analyzed: paratas api bahuvidham nānā ratana vicittam nānā saṇṭhānam ratha ādi dibba yānam upaṭṭhitam eva

original: hoti sudantavāhanayuttaṃ, na nesaṃ yānānaṃ upaṭṭhāpane ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbaṃ atthi.
analyzed: hoti su danta vāhana yuttam na nesam yānānam upaṭṭhāpane ussukkam āpajjitabbam atthi

original: Etānīti hatthiyānādīni. Nesanti vessavaṇaparicārikānaṃ. Kappitāni hutvā uṭṭhitāni
analyzed: etāni iti hatthi yāna ādīni vessavaṇa paricārikānam kappitāni hutvā uṭṭhitāni

original: āruhituṃ upakappanayānāni. Nipannāpi nisinnāpi vicaranti candimasūriyā viya yathāsakaṃ vimānesu.
analyzed: āruhitum upakappana yānāni nipannā api nisinnā api vicaranti candima sūriyāḥ viya yathāsakam vimānesu

original: Nagarā ahūti liṅgavipallāsena vuttanti āha “nagarāni bhaviṃsūti attho”ti. Āṭānāṭā nāmāti itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ āsi.
analyzed: nagarāḥ ahū iti liṅga vipallāsena vuttanti āha nagarāni bhaviṃsu iti attho ti āṭānāṭāḥ nāma ati itthi liṅga vasena laddha nāmam nagaram āsi

original: Tasmiṃ ṭhatvāti tasmiṃ padese parakusiṭanāṭānāmake nagare ṭhatvā. Tato ujuṃ uttaradisāyaṃ. Etassāti kasivantanagarassa. Aparabhāge aparakoṭṭhāse, parato icceva attho.
analyzed: tasmin ṭhatvā iti tasmin padese parakusiṭanāṭā nāmake nagare ṭhatvā tatas ujum uttara disāyam etassa ati kasivanta nagarassa apara bhāge apara koṭṭhāse paratas icca eva attho

original: Kuveroti tassa purimajātisamudāgataṃ nāmanti teneva pasaṅgena yenāyaṃ sampatti adhigatā,
analyzed: tassa purima jāti samudāgatam tena iva pasaṅgena yena ayam sampatti adhigatā

original: tadassa pubbakammaṃ ācikkhituṃ “ayaṃ kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ucchuvappanti ucchusassaṃ.
analyzed: tat assa pubba kammam ācikkhitum ayam kira iti ādi vuttam ucchuvappanti ucchusassam

original: Avasesasālāhīti avasesayantasālāhi, nissakkavacanañcetaṃ. Tatthevāti puññatthaṃ dinnasālāyameva.
analyzed: avasesa sālāhi iti avasesa yanta sālāhi nissakka vacanam ca itam tattha iva ati puññattham

original: Paṭiesantoti pati pati atthe esanto vīmaṃsanto. Na kevalaṃ te vīmaṃsanti eva, atha
analyzed: paṭiesanto ti pati pati atthe esantaḥ vīmaṃsantaḥ na kevalam te vīmaṃsanti eva atha

original: kho tamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpentīti āha “visuṃ visuṃ atthe upaparikkhamānā anusāsamānā”ti.
analyzed: kho tam attham patiṭṭhāpenti iti āha visum visum atthe upaparikkhamānā anusāsamānā iti

original: Yakkharaṭṭhikāti yakkharaṭṭhādhipatino. Yakkhā ca vessavaṇassa rañño nivesanadvāre
analyzed: yakkharaṭṭhikā ati yakkharaṭṭha adhipatinaḥ yakkhā ca vessavaṇassa rañño nivesana dvāre

original: niyuttā cāti yakkhadovārikā, tesaṃ yakkhadovārikānaṃ.
analyzed: niyuttā ca ati yakkha dovārikā tesam yakkha dovārikānam

original: Yasmā dharaṇīporakkhaṇito purāṇodakaṃ bhassayantaṃ heṭṭhā vuṭṭhi hutvā nikkhamati,
analyzed: yasmai dharaṇī porakkhaṇitaḥ purāṇa udakam bhassayantam heṭṭhā vuṭṭhi hutvā nikkhamati

original: tasmā taṃ tato gahetvā meghehi pavuṭṭhaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ “yato pokkharaṇito udakaṃ
analyzed: tasmā tam tatas gahetvā meghehi pavuṭṭham viya hoti iti vuttam yatas pokkharaṇitaḥ udakam

original: gahetvā meghā pavassantī”ti. Yatoti yato dharaṇīpokkharaṇito. Sabhāti yakkhānaṃ upaṭṭhānasabhā.
analyzed: gahetvā meghā pavassanti iti yatas ti yatas dharaṇī pokkharaṇitaḥ sabhā ati yakkhānam upaṭṭhāna sabhā

original: Tasmiṃ ṭhāneti tassā pokkharaṇiyā tīre yakkhānaṃ vasanavane. Sadā phalitāti niccakālaṃ
analyzed: tasmim ṭhāne iti tassā pokkharaṇiyā tīre yakkhānam vasana vane sadā phalitā ati nicca kālam

original: sañjātaphalā. Niccapupphitāti niccaṃ sañjātapupphā. Nānādijagaṇāyutāti nānāvidhehi
analyzed: sañjāta phalā nicca pupphitā ati niccam sañjāta pupphā nānā ādi jagaṇa āyutā ati nānāvidhehi

original: dijagaṇehi yuttā. Tehi pana sakuṇasaṅghehi ito cito ca sampatantehi paribbhamantehi
analyzed: dija gaṇehi yuttā tehi pana sakuṇa saṅghehi itas citas ca sampatantehi paribbhamantehi

original: yasmā sā pokkharaṇī ākulā viya hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “vividhapakkhisaṅghasamākulā”ti.
analyzed: yasmā sā pokkharaṇī ākulā viya hoti tasmā vuttam vividha pakkhi saṅgha samākulā ati

original: Koñcasakuṇehīti sārasasakuntehi.
analyzed: koñca sakuṇehi iti sārasa sakuntehi

original: “Evaṃ viravantāna”nti iminā tathā vassitavasena “jīvañjīvakā”ti ayaṃ tesaṃ samaññāti
analyzed: evam iminā tathā vassita vasena jīvañjīvakā ati ayam tesam samaññā ti

original: dasseti. Uṭṭhavacittakāti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tenāha “evaṃ vassamānā”ti. Pokkharasātakāti
analyzed: dasseti uṭṭhavacittakā ti ettha api esā iva nayaḥ tena āha evam vassamānā ati pokkharasātakā ti

original: pokkharasaṇṭhānatāya “pokkharasātakā”ti evaṃ laddhanāmā.
analyzed: pokkhara saṇṭhāna tāya pokkharasātakā ati evam laddha nāmā

original: Sabbakālaṃ sobhatīti sabbautūsu sobhati, na tassā hemantādivasena sobhāvirato atthi.
analyzed: sabbakālam sobhati iti sabba otūsu sobhati na tassāḥ hemanta ādi vasena sobhā virataḥ atthi

original: Evaṃbhūtā ca niccaṃ pupphitajalajathalajapupphatāya, phalabhārabharitarukkhaparivāritatāya,
analyzed: evaṃbhūtā ca niccam pupphita jalaja thalaja puppha tāya phala bhāra bharita rukkha parivārita tāya

original: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatasalilatāya ca nirantaraṃ sobhati.
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅga samannāgata salila tāya ca nirantaram sobhati

original: 282. Parikammanti pubbupacāraṃ. Parisodhetvāti ekakkharassāpi avirādhanavasena ācariyasantike
analyzed: parikammanti pubba upacāram parisodhetvā iti eka kkharassa api avirādhana vasena ācariya santike

original: sabbaṃ sodhetvā. Suṭṭhu uggahitāti parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya
analyzed: sabbam sodhetvā suṭṭhu uggahitā ati parimaṇḍala pada byañjanāya poriyā vācāya vissaṭṭhāya

original: anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpanīyā sammadeva uggahitā. Tathā hi “atthañca byañjanañca
analyzed: anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpanīyā sammadeva uggahitā tathā hi atthañca byañjanañca

original: parisodhetvā”ti vuttaṃ. Atthaṃ jānato eva hi byañjanaṃ parisujjhati, no ajānato.
analyzed: parisodhetvā iti vuttam attham jānataḥ eva hi byañjanam parisujjhati no a jānataḥ

original: Padabyañjanānīti padañceva byañjanañca ahāpetvā. Evañhi paripuṇṇā nāma hotīti. Visaṃvādetvāti
analyzed: pada byañjanāni iti padam ca iva byañjanam ca evam hi paripuṇṇā nāma hoti iti

original: aññathā katvā. Tejavantaṃ na hoti virajjhanato ceva vimhayatthabhāvato ca. Sabbasoti
analyzed: aññathā katvā tejavantam na hoti virajjhanataḥ ca iva vimhayattha bhāvataḥ ca sabbaso ti

original: anavasesato ādimajjhapariyosānato. Tejavantaṃ hotīti sabhāvaniruttiṃ avirādhetvā
analyzed: anavasesataḥ ādi majjha pariyosānataḥ tejavantam hoti iti sabhāva niruttim a virādhetvā

original: suppavattibhāvena sādhanato. Evaṃ payogavipattiṃ pahāya payogasampattiyā sati parittassa
analyzed: suppavatti bhāvena sādhanataḥ evam payoga vipattim pahāya payoga sampattiyā sati parittassa

original: atthasādhakataṃ dassetvā idāni ajjhāsayavipattiṃ pahāya ajjhāsayasampattiyā atthasādhakataṃ

original: vuttaṃ. Titthiyā hi upattivisese vimuttisaññino, aññāvirāgāvirāgesu ādīnavānisaṃsadassino

original: vā hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti, na sāsanikā. Vāyokasiṇe
analyzed: vā hutvā asañña samāpattim nibbattetvā akkhaṇa bhūmiyam uppajjanti na sāsanikāḥ vāyokasiṇe

original: parikammaṃ katvāti vāyokasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiyajjhāne ciṇṇavasī
analyzed: parikammam katvā ti vāyokasiṇe paṭhama ādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā tatiya jhāne ciṇṇavasī

original: hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā. Tenāha “catutthajjhānaṃ
analyzed: hutvā tatas vuṭṭhāya catuttha jhāna adhigamāya parikammam katvā tena āha catuttha jhānam

original: nibbattetvā”ti. Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Yadettha vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: nibbattetvā ti kasmā pana ittha vāyokasiṇeya iva parikammam vuttan ti yat ettha vattabbam

original: taṃ brahmajālaṭīkāyaṃ vitthāritameva. Dhīti jigucchanatthe nipāto, tasmā dhī cittanti
analyzed: tam brahmajālaṭīkāyam vitthāritam eva dhī iti jigucchana tthe nipāto tasmā dhī cittam ti

original: cittaṃ jigucchāmīti attho. Dhibbatetaṃ cittanti etaṃ mama cittaṃ jigucchitaṃ vata
analyzed: cittam jigucchāmi iti atthaḥ dhibbata etam cittam ti etam mama cittam jigucchitam vata

original: hotu. Vatāti sambhāvane, tena jigucchaṃ sambhāvento vadati. Nāmāti ca sambhāvane
analyzed: hotu vata ati sambhāvane tena jiguccham sambhāventaḥ vadati nāma ati ca sambhāvane

original: eva, tena cittassa abhāvaṃ sambhāveti. Cittassa bhāvābhāvesu ādīnavānisaṃse dassetuṃ
analyzed: eva tena cittassa abhāvam sambhāveti cittassa bhāva abhāvesu ādīnava anisaṃse dassetuṃ

original: “cittañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvāti “cittassa abhāvo eva sādhu suṭṭhū”ti
analyzed: cittam hi itiādi vuttam khantim rucim uppādetvā ati cittassa abhāvaḥ eva sādhu suṭṭhu iti

original: imaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ, tattha ca abhiruciṃ uppādetvā.
analyzed: imam diṭṭhi nijjhāna kkhantim tattha ca abhirucim uppādetvā

original: Tathā bhāvitassa jhānassa ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvappattiyā aparihīnajjhānassa titthāyatane
analyzed: tathā bhāvitassa jhānassa ṭhiti bhāgiya bhāva ppattiyā aparihīna jjhānassa tittha āyatane

original: pabbajitasseva tathā jhānabhāvanā hotīti āha “manussaloke”ti. Paṇihito ahosīti maraṇassa
analyzed: pabbajitassa iva tathā jhāna bhāvanā hoti iti āha manussa loke iti paṇihito ahosi iti maraṇassa

original: āsannakāle ṭhapito ahosi. Yadi ṭhānādinā ākārena nibbatteyya, kammabalena yāva bhedā
analyzed: āsanna kāle ṭhapitaḥ ahosi yadi ṭhāna ādinā ākārena kamma balena yāva bhedā

original: tenevākārena tiṭṭheyya vāti āha “so tena iriyāpathenā”tiādi.
analyzed: tena iva ākārena tiṭṭheyya vā ti āha saḥ tena iriyāpathena atiādi

original: Eva rūpānampīti evaṃ acetanānampi. Pi-saddena pageva sacetanānanti dasseti. Kathaṃ
analyzed: eva rūpānam pi iti evam acetanānam pi pi saddena pageva sa cetanānam ti dasseti katham

original: pana acetanānaṃ nesaṃ paccayāhārassa upakappananti codanaṃ sandhāya tattha nidassanaṃ
analyzed: pana acetanānam na īsam paccaya āhārassa upakappananti codanam sandhāya tattha nidassanam

original: dassento “yathā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: yathā iti ādim āha

original: Ye uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā
analyzed: ye uṭṭhāna vīriyena iva divasam vītināmetvā tassa nissanda phala mattam kiñcid eva labhitvā

original: jīvikaṃ kappenti, te uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino. Ye pana attano puññaphalameva upajīventi,
analyzed: jīvikam kappenti te uṭṭhāna phala upajīvinaḥ ye pana attano puñña phalam eva upajīventi

original: te puññaphalūpajīvino. Nerayikānaṃ pana neva uṭṭhānavīriyavasena jīvikākappanaṃ,
analyzed: te puñña phala upajīvinaḥ nerayikānam pana na iva uṭṭhāna vīriya vasena jīvikā kappanam

original: puññaphalassa pana lesopi natthīti vuttaṃ “ye pana te nerayikā…pe… na puññaphalūpajīvīti
analyzed: puñña phalassa pana lesaḥ api natthi iti vuttam ye pana te na puñña phala upajīvī iti

original: vuttā”ti. Paṭisandhiviññāṇassa āharaṇena manosañcetanāhāroti vuttā, na yassa kassaci
analyzed: vuttā ati paṭisandhi viññāṇassa āharaṇena manaḥ sañcetanā āhāraḥ ti vuttā na yassa kassaci

original: phalassāti adhippāyena “kiṃ pañca āhārā atthī”ti codeti. Ācariyo nippariyāyāhāre
analyzed: phalassa ati adhippāyena kim pañca āhārāḥ atthi iti codeti ācariyaḥ nippariyāya āhāre

original: adhippete siyā tava codanāyāvasaro, sā pana ettha anavasarāti dassetuṃ “pañca na
analyzed: adhippete siyā tava codanāya avasaraḥ sā pana ettha anavasarā ti dassetum pañca na

original: pañcāti idaṃ na vattabba”nti vatvā pariyāyāhārasseva panettha adhippetabhāvaṃ dassento
analyzed: pañca iti idam na vattabbam ti vatvā pariyāya āhārassa iva pana ittha adhippeta bhāvam dassento

original: “nanu paccayo āhāroti vuttameta”nti āha. Tasmāti yassa kassaci paccayassa “āhāro”ti
analyzed: nanu paccayaḥ āhāraḥ iti vuttam etat ti āha tasmā ti yassa kassaci paccayassa āhāro ti

original: icchitattā. Idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthento “yaṃ sandhāyā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: icchita ttā idāni vutta mevattham pāḷiyā samatthentaḥ yam sandhāya ati ādim āha

original: Mukhyāhāravasenapi nerayikānaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikataṃ dassetuṃ “kabaḷīkāraṃ āhāraṃ…pe…
analyzed: mukhya āhāra vasena api nerayikānam āhāra ṭṭhiti katam dassetum kabaḷīkāram

original: sādhetī”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ nerayikā sukhapaṭisaṃvedinopi hontīti? Noti dassetuṃ
analyzed: sādheti iti vuttam yadi evam nerayikā sukha paṭisaṃvedinaḥ api honti iti no ti dassetuṃ

original: “kheḷopi hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tayoti tayo arūpāhārā kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāvato. Avasesānanti
analyzed: kheḷaḥ api hi itiādi vuttam tayaḥ ti tayaḥ arūpa āhārā kabaḷīkāra āhārassa abhāvataḥ avasesānam ti

original: asaññasattehi avasesānaṃ. Kāmabhavādīsu nibbattasattānaṃ paccayāhāro hi sabbesaṃ
analyzed: asañña sattehi avasesānam kāma bhava ādīsu nibbatta sattānam paccaya āhāraḥ hi sabbesam

original: sādhāraṇoti. Etaṃ pañhanti “katamo eko dhammo”ti evaṃ coditametaṃ pañhaṃ. Kathetvāti vissajjetvā.
analyzed: sādhāraṇaḥ ti etam pañhanti katamaḥ ekaḥ dhammo ti evam ca uditam etam pañham kathetvā ati vissajjetvā

original: “Tattha tattha…pe… dukkhaṃ hotī”ti etena yathā idha paṭhamassa pañhassa niyyātanaṃ,
analyzed: tattha tatthape dukkham hoti iti etena yathā idha paṭhamassa pañhassa niyyātanam

original: dutiyassa uddharaṇaṃ na kataṃ, evaṃ iminā eva adhippāyena ito paresu dukatikādipañhesu
analyzed: dutiyassa uddharaṇam na katam evam iminā eva adhippāyena itas paresu dukatika ādi pañhesu

original: tattha tattha ādipariyosānesu eva uddharaṇaniyyātanāni katvā sesesu na katanti dasseti.
analyzed: tattha tattha ādi pariyosānesu eva uddharaṇa niyyātanāni katvā sesesu na kata nti dasseti

original: Paṭicca etasmā phalaṃ etīti paccayo, kāraṇaṃ, tadeva attano phalaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāroti
analyzed: paṭicca etasmā phalam eti iti paccayaḥ kāraṇam tat eva attanaḥ phalam saṅkharoti iti

original: āha “imasmimpi…pe… saṅkhāroti vutto”ti. Āhārapaccayoti āharaṇaṭṭhavisiṭṭho paccayo.
analyzed: āha saṅkhāro ti vutto ti āhāra paccayo ti āharaṇa ṭṭha visiṭṭhaḥ paccayo

original: Āharaṇañcettha uppādakattappadhānaṃ, saṅkharaṇaṃ upatthambhakattappadhānanti ayametesaṃ
analyzed: āharaṇam ca ittha uppāda katta ppadhānam saṅkharaṇam upatthambha katta ppadhānam ti ayam etesam

original: viseso. Tenāha “ayamettha heṭṭhimato viseso”ti. Nippariyāyāhāre gahite “sabbe sattā”ti
analyzed: viseso tena āha ayam ettha heṭṭhimataḥ viseso ti nippariyāya āhāre gahite sabbe sattā ti

original: vuttepi asaññasattā na gahitā eva bhavissantīti padesavisayo sabba-saddo hoti yathā
analyzed: vutte api asañña sattāḥ na gahitāḥ eva bhavissanti iti padesa visayaḥ sabba saddaḥ hoti yathā

original: “sabbe tasantidaṇḍassā”tiādīsu. Na hettha khīṇāsavādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ hoti. Pākaṭo bhaveyya
analyzed: sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa ati ādīsu na ha ittha khīṇāsava ādīnam gahaṇam hoti pākaṭaḥ bhaveyya

original: visesasāmaññassa visayattā pañhānaṃ. No ca gaṇhiṃsu aṭṭhakathācariyā. Dhammo nāma
analyzed: visesa sāmaññassa visaya ttā pañhānam no ca gaṇhiṃsu aṭṭhakathā cariyāḥ dhammaḥ nāma

original: natthi saṅkhatoti adhippāyo. Idha dutiyapañhe “saṅkhāro”ti paccayo eva kathitoti sambandho.
analyzed: natthi saṅkhatoti adhippāyaḥ idha dutiya pañhe saṅkhāro ti paccayaḥ eva kathito ti sambandho

original: Yadā sammāsambodhisamadhigato, tadā eva sabbañeyyaṃ sacchikataṃ jātanti āha “mahābodhimaṇḍe
analyzed: yadā sammāsambodhi samadhigataḥ tadā eva sabbañeyyam sacchikatam jātan ti āha mahā bodhimaṇḍe

original: nisīditvā”ti. Sayanti sāmaṃyeva. Addhaniyanti addhānakkhamaṃ cirakālāvaṭṭhāyi pārampariyavasena.
analyzed: nisīditvā ati sayanti sāmaṃyā iva addhaniyanti addhānakkhamam cira kāla avaṭṭhāyi pārampariya vasena

original: Tenāha “ekena hī”tiādi. Paramparakathāniyamenāti paramparakathākathananiyamena, niyamitatthabyañjanānupubbiyā
analyzed: tena āha ekena hi itiādi parampara kathā niyamena ati parampara kathā kathana niyamena niyamita attha byañjana anupubbiyā

original: kathāyāti attho. Ekakavasenāti ekaṃ ekaṃ parimāṇaṃ etassāti ekako, pañho. Tassa ekakassa
analyzed: kathāya iti attho ekaka vasena ati ekam ekam parimāṇam etassa ati ekakaḥ pañhaḥ tassa ekakassa

original: vasena. Ekakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ vissajjananti adhippāyoti.
analyzed: vasena ekakam niṭṭhitam vissajjananti adhippāyaḥ ti

original: Ekakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ekaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dukavaṇṇanā
analyzed: duka vaṇṇanā

original: 304. Cattāro khandhāti tesaṃ tāva nāmanaṭṭhena nāmabhāvaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā nibbānassa
analyzed: cattāro khandhā ti tesam tāva nāmanaṭṭhena nāma bhāvam paṭhamam vatvā pacchā nibbānassa

original: vattukāmo āha. Tassāpi hi tathā nāmabhāvaṃ parato vakkhati. “Nāmaṃ karoti nāmayatī”ti
analyzed: vattu kāmaḥ āha tassa api hi tathā nāma bhāvam paratas vakkhati nāmam karoti nāmayati iti

original: ettha yaṃ nāmakaraṇaṃ, taṃ nāmanti āha “nāmanaṭṭhenāti nāmakaraṇaṭṭhenā”ti, attanovāti
analyzed: ettha yam nāmakaraṇam tam nāmanti āha nāmana ṭṭhena āti nāmakaraṇa ṭṭhena āti attano vā ati

original: adhippāyo. Evañhi sātisayamidaṃ tesaṃ nāmakaraṇaṃ hoti. Tenāha “attano nāmaṃ karontāva
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ evam hi sa atisayam idam tesam nāmakaraṇam hoti tena āha attanaḥ nāmam karontāva

original: uppajjantī”tiādi. Idāni tamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: uppajjanti itiādi idāni tam attham byatireka mukhena vibhāvetum yathā hi itiādi vuttam

original: Yassa nāmassa karaṇeneva te “nāma”nti vuccanti, taṃ sāmaññanāmaṃ, kittimanāmaṃ, guṇanāmaṃ
analyzed: yassa nāmassa karaṇena iva te nāmanti vuccanti tam sāmañña nāmam kittima nāmam guṇa nāmam

original: vā na hoti, atha kho opapātikanāmanti purimāni tīṇi nāmāni udāharaṇavasena dassetvā
analyzed: vā na hoti atha kho opapātika nāmanti purimāni tīṇi nāmāni udāharaṇa vasena dassetvā

original: “na evaṃ vedanādīna”nti te paṭikkhipitvā itaranāmameva nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena nāmanti dassento
analyzed: na evam vedanā ādīnam ti te paṭikkhipitvā itara nāmam eva nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena nāman ti dassento

original: “vedanādayo hī”tiādimāha. “Mahāpathaviādayo”ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu pathaviāpādayo
analyzed: vedanā ādayaḥ hi iti ādim āha mahā pathavi ādayo ti kasmai vuttam nanu

original: idha nāmanti anadhippetā, rūpanti pana adhippetāti? Saccametaṃ, phassavedanādīnaṃ
analyzed: idha nāman ti anadhippetā rūpan ti pana adhippetā ati saccam etam phassa vedanā ādīnam

original: viya pana pathaviādīnaṃ opapātikanāmatāsāmaññena “pathaviādayo viyā”ti nidassanaṃ
analyzed: viya pana pathavi ādīnam opapātika nāma tā sāmaññena pathavi ādayaḥ viya ati nidassanam

original: kataṃ, na arūpadhammā viya rūpadhammānaṃ nāmasabhāvattā. Phassavedanādīnañhi arūpadhammānaṃ
analyzed: katam na arūpa dhammāḥ viya rūpa dhammānam nāma sabhāva ttā phassa vedanā ādīnam hi arūpa dhammānam

original: sabbadāpi phassādināmakattā, pathaviādīnaṃ kesakumbhādināmantarāpatti viya nāmantarānāpajjanato
analyzed: sabbadā api phassa ādi nāmaka ttā pathavi ādīnam kesa kumbha ādi nāma ntara āpatti viya nāma ntara an āpajjanato

original: ca sadā attanāva katanāmatāya catukkhandhanibbānāni nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena nāmaṃ. Atha
analyzed: ca sadā kata nāma tāya catu khandha nibbānāni nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena nāmam atha

original: vā adhivacanasamphasso viya adhivacananāmamantarena ye anupacitasambhārānaṃ gahaṇaṃ
analyzed: vā adhivacana samphassaḥ adhivacana nāmam antarena ye

original: na gacchanti, te nāmāyattaggahaṇā nāmaṃ. Rūpaṃ pana vināpi nāmasādhanaṃ attano ruppanasabhāvena
analyzed: na gacchanti te nāma āyatta ggahaṇāḥ nāmam rūpam pana vinā api nāma sādhanam attanaḥ

original: gahaṇaṃ upayātīti rūpaṃ. Tenāha “tesu uppannesū”tiādi. Idhāpi “yathāpathaviyā”tiādīsu
analyzed: upayāti iti rūpam tena āha tesu uppannesu itiādi idha api yathā pathaviyāti ādīsu

original: vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo nidassanavasena āgatattā. “Atītepī”tiādinā vedanādīsu
analyzed: vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ nidassana vasena āgata ttā atīte pi itiādinā vedanā ādīsu

original: nāmasaññā niruḷhā, anādikālikā cāti dasseti.
analyzed: nāma saññā niruḷhā anādikālikā ca ati dasseti

original: Iti atītādivibhāgavantānampi vedanādīnaṃ nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena nāmabhāvo ekantiko, tabbibhāgarahite
analyzed: iti atīta ādi vibhāgavantānam pi vedanā ādīnam nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena nāma bhāvaḥ ekantikaḥ tad vibhāga rahite

original: pana ekasabhāve nicce nibbāne vattabbameva natthīti dassento “nibbānaṃ pana…pe… nāmanaṭṭhena
analyzed: pana eka sabhāve nicce nibbāne vattabbam eva natthi iti dassentaḥ nibbānam panape nāmanaṭṭhena

original: nāma”nti āha. Nāmanaṭṭhenāti nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena. Namantīti ekantato sārammaṇattā tanninnā
analyzed: nāman ti āha nāmana ṭṭhena ati nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena namanti iti ekantato sārammaṇa ttā tad ninnā

original: honti, tehi vinā nappavattantīti attho. Sabbanti khandhacatukkaṃ, nibbānañca. Yasmiṃ
analyzed: honti tehi vinā na ppavattanti iti attho sabbanti khandha catukkam nibbānam ca yasmin

original: ārammaṇeyeva vedanākkhandho pavattati, taṃsampayuttatāya saññākkhandhādayopi tattha
analyzed: ārammaṇe iya iva vedanā khandho pavattati tad sampayutta tāya saññā khandha ādayaḥ api tattha

original: pavattantīti so ne tattha nāmento viya hoti vinā appavattanato. Esa nayo saññākkhandhādīsupīti
analyzed: pavattanti iti so ne tattha nāma intaḥ viya hoti vinā a pavattanato esa nayo saññākkhandha ādīsu pi iti

original: vuttaṃ “ārammaṇe aññamaññaṃ nāmentī”ti. Anavajjadhamme maggaphalādike. Kāmaṃ kesuci
analyzed: vuttam ārammaṇe aññam aññam nāmenti iti anavajja dhamme magga phala ādike kāmam kesuci

original: rūpadhammesupi ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo labbhateva, nibbāne panesa sātisayo tassa accantasantapaṇītatākappabhāvatoti
analyzed: rūpa dhammesu pi ārammaṇa adhipati bhāvaḥ labbhateva nibbāne pana esa sa atisayo tassa accanta santa paṇīta tā kappa bhāvato ti

original: tadeva ārammaṇādhipatipaccayatāya “attani nāmetī”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi ariyā sakalampi
analyzed: tat eva ārammaṇa adhipati paccaya tāya attani nāma iti iti vuttam tathā hi ariyā sakalam pi

original: divasabhāgaṃ taṃ ārabbha vītināmentāpi tittiṃ na gacchanti.
analyzed: divasa bhāgam tam ārabbha tittim na gacchanti

original: “Ruppanaṭṭhenā”ti etena ruppatīti rūpanti dasseti. Tattha sītādivirodhipaccayasannipāte
analyzed: ruppana ṭṭhena āti etena ruppati iti rūpan ti dasseti tattha sītā ādi virodhi paccaya sannipāte

original: visadisuppatti ruppanaṃ. Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamāgame visadisuppatti
analyzed: visadisuppatti ruppanam nanu ca arūpa dhammānam pi virodhi paccaya samāgame visadisuppatti

original: labbhatīti? Saccaṃ labbhati, na pana vibhūtataraṃ. Vibhūtatarañhettha ruppanaṃ adhippetaṃ
analyzed: labbhati iti saccam labbhati na pana vibhūtataram vibhūtataram ha ittha ruppanam adhippetam

original: sītādiggahaṇato. Vuttañhetaṃ “ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā ‘rūpa’nti vuccati. Kena
analyzed: sītā ādi gahaṇataḥ vuttam ha etam ruppati iti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati kena

original: ruppati? Sītenapi ruppati, uṇhenapi ruppatī”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ brahmaloke rūpasamaññāti?

original: āha “savana uggahaṇapaccavekkhaṇā lokiyā”ti. Ariyamaggakkhaṇe sammasanamanasikārānaṃ
analyzed: āha savane uggahaṇa paccavekkhaṇā lokiyā ti ariya magga kkhaṇe

original: nipphatti pariniṭṭhānanti tesaṃ lokuttaratāpariyāyopi labbhatīti vuttaṃ “sammasanamanasikārā
analyzed: nipphatti pariniṭṭhānanti tesam lokuttara tā pariyāyaḥ api labbhati iti vuttam sammasana manasikārā

original: lokiyalokuttaramissakā”ti. Paccayadhammānaṃ hetuādīnaṃ attano paccayuppannānaṃ hetupaccayādibhāvena
analyzed: lokiya lokuttara missakā ti paccaya dhammānam hetu ādīnam attanaḥ paccaya uppannānam hetu paccaya ādi bhāvena

analyzed: vasena dvādasavidhaḥ ti āha uggaha ādi vasena ati uggaha manasikāra savana sammasana paṭivedha paccavekkhaṇa vasena

analyzed: ṭhānam ca iva tiṭṭhati phalam tad āyatta vutti tāya ati kāraṇam ca hetu paccaya bhāvena karaṇato

original: nipphādanato. Tesaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ. Etasmiṃ duke attho veditabboti sambandho. Ye
analyzed: nipphādanato tesam sota viññāṇa ādīnam etasmin duke atthaḥ veditabbaḥ iti sambandhaḥ ye

original: dhammā yassa dhammassa kāraṇabhāvato ṭhānaṃ, teva dhammā taṃvidhurassa dhammassa
analyzed: dhammā yassa dhammassa kāraṇa bhāvataḥ ṭhānam te iva dhammā taṃ vidhurassa dhammassa

analyzed: dīpitā dutiya naye pana abhinne pi phale paccaya dhamma bhedena tesam ṭhānāṭṭhāna tā

original: dīpitāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Na hi kadāci ariyā diṭṭhisampadā niccaggāhassa kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: dīpitā ati ayam etesam visesaḥ na hi kadāci ariyā diṭṭhi sampadā nicca ggāhassa kāraṇam

original: hoti, akiriyatā pana siyā tassa kāraṇanti.
analyzed: hoti akiriya tā pana siyā tassa kāraṇanti

original: Ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, ajimhatā akuṭilatā avaṅkatāti atthoti tamatthaṃ anajjavapaṭikkhepamukhena

analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā paṭipattiyā vaṅka bhāvato purima sadisaḥ ti paṭhamam

original: vuttabhikkhusadiso. Candavaṅkatā nāma paṭipattiyā majjhaṭṭhāne vaṅkabhāvāpattito.

original: Naṅgalakoṭivaṅkatā nāma pariyosāne vaṅkabhāvāpattito. Idaṃ ajjavaṃ nāma sabbatthakameva

analyzed: uju bhāva siddhitaḥ ajjavatā ati ākāra niddesaḥ yena ākārena assa ajjavaḥ pavattati tad ākāra niddesaḥ ti

original: attho. Lajjatīti lajjī, hirimā, tassa bhāvo lajjavaṃ, hirīti attho. Lajjā etassa
analyzed: atthaḥ lajjati iti lajjī hirimā tassa bhāvaḥ lajjavam hirī iti atthaḥ lajjā etassa

original: atthīti lajjī yathā “mālī, māyī”ti ca, tassa bhāvo lajjībhāvo, sā eva lajjā.
analyzed: atthi iti lajjī yathā mālī māyī iti ca tassa bhāvaḥ lajjī bhāvaḥ sā eva lajjā

original: Parāparādhādīnaṃ adhivāsanakkhamaṃ adhivāsanakhanti. Sucisīlatā soraccaṃ. Sā hi sobhanakammaratatā, suṭṭhu vā pāpato oratabhāvo viratatā soraccaṃ. Tenāha “suratabhāvo”ti.
analyzed: para aparādha ādīnam adhivāsana kkhamam adhivāsana khanti suci sīla tā soraccam sā hi sobhana kamma rata tā suṭṭhu vā pāpataḥ orata bhāvaḥ virata tā soraccam tena āha surata bhāva iti

original: “Nāmañca rūpañcā”tiādīsu ayaṃ aparo nayo – nāmakaraṇaṭṭhenāti aññaṃ anapekkhitvā

original: sayameva attano nāmakaraṇasabhāvatoti attho. Yañhi parassa nāmaṃ karoti, tassa ca
analyzed: sayam eva attanaḥ nāmakaraṇa sabhāvato ti atthaḥ yat hi parassa nāmam karoti tassa ca

original: karīyati, tassa ca nāmakaraṇasabhāvatā natthīti, natthiyeva nāmabhāvo. Vedanādīnaṃ
analyzed: tassa ca nāma karaṇa sabhāva tā natthi iti nāma bhāvaḥ vedanā ādīnam

original: pana sabhāvasiddhattā vedanādināmassa nāmakaraṇasabhāvato nāmatā vuttā. Pathavīādi
analyzed: pana sabhāva siddha ttā vedanā ādi nāmassa nāma karaṇa sabhāvataḥ nāma tā vuttā pathavī ādi

original: nidassanena nāmassa sabhāvasiddhataṃyeva nidasseti, na nāmabhāvasāmaññaṃ, niruḷhattā
analyzed: nidassanena nāmassa nidasseti na nāma bhāva sāmaññam niruḷha ttā

original: pana nāma-saddo arūpadhammesu eva vattati, na pathavīādīsūti na tesaṃ nāmabhāvo.
analyzed: pana nāma saddaḥ arūpa dhammesu eva vattati na pathavī ādīsu iti na tesam nāma bhāvo

original: Na hi pathavīādināmaṃ vijahitvā kesādināmehi rūpadhammānaṃ viya vedanādināmaṃ vijahitvā

analyzed: aññena nāmena arūpa dhammānam voharitabbena piṇḍa ākārena pavatti atthi iti

original: Atha vā rūpadhammā cakkhādayo rūpādayo ca, tesaṃ pakāsakapakāsitabbabhāvato vināpi
analyzed: atha vā rūpa dhammā cakkha ādayaḥ rūpa ādayaḥ ca tesam pakāsaka pakāsitabba bhāvataḥ vinā api

original: “nāma”nti vuttā. Paṭighasamphasso ca na cakkhādīni viya nāmena vinā pākaṭoti “nāma”nti
analyzed: nāman ti vuttā paṭigha samphasso ca na cakkha ādīni viya nāmena vinā pākaṭaḥ ti nāman ti

original: vutto, arūpatāya vā aññanāmasabhāgattā saṅgahitoyaṃ, aññaphassasabhāgattā vā. Vacanatthopi
analyzed: vuttaḥ arūpa tāya vā añña nāma sabhāga ttā saṅgahitaḥ ayam añña phassa sabhāga ttā vā vacana atthaḥ api

original: hi rūpayatīti rūpaṃ, nāmayatīti nāmanti idha pacchimapurimānaṃ sambhavati. Rūpayatīti
analyzed: hi rūpayati iti rūpam nāmayati iti idha pacchima purimānam sambhavati rūpayati iti

original: vināpi nāmena attānaṃ pakāsetīti attho. Nāmayatīti nāmena vinā apākaṭabhāvato attano

original: Dhātuvisayā sabbāpi paññā dhātukusalatā. Tadekadesā manasikārakusalatāti adhippāyena

original: pana catubbidhāpi paññā uggahoti tato pavatto aniccādimanasikāro “uggahamanasikāro”ti
analyzed: pana catubbidhā api paññā uggahaḥ ti tatas pavatto anicca ādi manasikāro uggaha manasikāro ti

original: vutto. Tassa jānanaṃ pavattanameva, “yathā pavattaṃ vā uggahaṃ, evameva pavatto uggaho”ti

original: jānanaṃ uggahajānanaṃ. “Manasikāro evaṃ pavattetabbo, evañca pavatto”ti jānanaṃ manasikārajānanaṃ.

original: Tadubhayampi “manasikārakosalla”nti vuttaṃ. Uggahopi hi manasikārasampayogato manasikāraniruttiṃ
analyzed: tat ubhayam pi manasikāra kosallanti vuttam uggahaḥ api hi manasikāra sampayogataḥ manasikāra niruttim

original: laddhuṃ arahati. Yo ca manasikātabbo, yo ca manasikaraṇūpāyo, sabbo so “manasikāro”ti
analyzed: laddhum arahati yaḥ ca manasikātabbaḥ yaḥ ca manasikaraṇa upāyo sabbo so manasikāro ti

original: vattuṃ vaṭṭati, tattha kosallaṃ manasikārakusalatāti. Sammasanaṃ paññā, sā maggasampayuttā

original: aniccādisammasanakiccaṃ sādheti niccasaññādipajahanato. Manasikāro sammasanasampayutto,

original: so tattheva aniccādimanasikārakiccaṃ maggasampayutto sādhetīti āha “sammasanamanasikārā
analyzed: saḥ tattha eva anicca ādi manasikāra kiccam magga sampayuttaḥ sādheti iti āha sammasana manasikārā

original: lokiyalokuttaramissakā”ti. “Iminā paccayenidaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ avijjādīnaṃ saṅkhārādipaccayuppannassa
analyzed: lokiya lokuttara missakā ti iminā paccayena idam hoti iti evam avijjā ādīnam saṅkhāra ādi paccaya uppannassa

original: paccayabhāvajānanaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā.
analyzed: paccaya bhāva jānanam paṭiccasamuppāda kusala tā

original: Adhivāsanaṃ khamanaṃ. Tañhi paresaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duruttañca paṭivirodhākaraṇena attano
analyzed: adhivāsanam khamanam tat hi paresam dukkaṭam duruttam ca paṭivirodha akaraṇena attano

original: paresaṃ akkhīsu assūnaṃ anuppādanā anassuropo. Attamanatāti sakamanatā. Cittassa
analyzed: paresam akkhīsu assūnam an uppādanā an assu ropaḥ attamana tā ati sa kamana tā cittassa

original: abyāpanno sako manobhāvo attamanatā. Cittanti vā cittappabandhaṃ ekattena gahetvā

original: tassa antarā uppannena pītisahagatamanena sakamanatā. Attamano vā puggalo, tassa
analyzed: tassa antarā uppannena pīti sahagata manena sa kamana tā atta manaḥ vā puggalaḥ tassa

original: bhāvo attamanatā, sā na sattassāti puggaladiṭṭhinivāraṇatthaṃ “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ attamanatā sā na sattassa ti puggala diṭṭhi nivāraṇa attham cittassa ati vuttam

original: Adhivāsanalakkhaṇā khanti adhivāsanakhanti. Sucisīlatā soraccaṃ. Sā hi sobhanakammaratatā.
analyzed: adhivāsana lakkhaṇā khanti adhivāsana khanti suci sīla tā soraccam sā hi sobhana kamma rata tā

original: Suṭṭhu pāpato oratabhāvo viratatā soraccaṃ. Tenāha “suratabhāvo”ti.
analyzed: suṭṭhu pāpataḥ orata bhāvaḥ virata tā soraccam tena āha surata bhāva iti

original: Sakhilo vuccati saṇhavāco, tassa bhāvo sākhalyaṃ, saṇhavācatā. Taṃ pana byatirekamukhena
analyzed: sakhilaḥ vuccati saṇha vācaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ sākhalyam saṇha vāca tā tam pana byatireka mukhena

original: vibhāventī yā pāḷi pavattā, taṃ dassento “tattha katamaṃ sākhalya”ntiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: vibhāventī yā pāḷi pavattā tam dassento tattha katamam tattha

original: aṇḍakāti sadosavaṇe rukkhe niyyāsapiṇḍiyo, ahicchattakādīni vā uṭṭhitāni “aṇḍakānī”ti
analyzed: aṇḍakā ati sadosavaṇe rukkhe niyyāsa piṇḍiyaḥ ahicchattaka ādīni vā uṭṭhitāni aṇḍakāni iti

original: vadanti. Pheggurukkhassa pana kuthitassa aṇḍāni viya uṭṭhitā cuṇṇapiṇḍiyo, gaṇṭhiyo
analyzed: vadanti pheggu rukkhassa pana kuthitassa aṇḍāni viya uṭṭhitā cuṇṇa piṇḍiyaḥ gaṇṭhiyaḥ

original: vā aṇḍakā. Idha pana byāpajjanakakkasādibhāvato aṇḍakapakatibhāvena vācā “aṇḍakā”ti
analyzed: vā aṇḍakāḥ idha pana byāpad jana kakkasa ādi bhāvataḥ aṇḍaka pakati bhāvena vācā

original: vuttā. Padumanāḷaṃ viya sotaṃ ghaṃsayamānā pavisantī kakkasā daṭṭhabbā. Kodhena nibbattattā
analyzed: vuttā paduma nāḷam viya sotam ghaṃsayamānā pavisantī kakkasā daṭṭhabbā kodhena nibbatta ttā

original: tassa parivārabhūtā kodhasāmantā. Pure saṃvaddhanārī porī, sā viya sukumārā mudukā
analyzed: tassa parivāra bhūtā kodha sāmantā pure saṃvaddha nārī porī sā viya su kumārā mudukā

original: vācā porī viyāti porī. Tatthāti “bhāsitā hotī”ti vuttāya kiriyāyātipi yojanā sambhavati,
analyzed: vācā porī viyāti porī tattha ati bhāsitā hoti iti vuttāya kiriyāya atipi yojanā sambhavati

original: tattha vācāyāti vā. “Saṇhavācatā”tiādinā taṃ vācaṃ pavattayamānaṃ cetanaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: tattha vācāya iti vā saṇha vāca tā ati ādinā tam vācam pavattayamānam cetanam dasseti

original: Sammodakassa puggalassa mudukabhāvo maddavaṃ sammodakamudukabhāvo. Āmisena alabbhamānena,
analyzed: sammodakassa puggalassa muduka bhāvaḥ maddavam sammodaka muduka bhāvaḥ āmisena a labbhamānena

original: tathā dhammena cāti dvīhi chiddo. Āmisassa, dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa
analyzed: tathā dhammena ca ati dvīhi chiddaḥ āmisassa dhammassa ca alābhena attano parassa

original: ca antare sambhavantassa hi chiddassa vivarassa bhedassa paṭisantharaṇaṃ pidahanaṃ
analyzed: ca antare sambhavantassa hi chiddassa vivarassa bhedassa paṭisantharaṇam pidahanam

original: saṅgaṇhanaṃ paṭisanthāro. Taṃ sarūpato, paṭipattito ca pāḷidassanamukhena vibhāvetuṃ
analyzed: saṅgaṇhanam paṭisanthāro tam sarūpataḥ paṭipattitaḥ ca pāḷi dassana mukhena vibhāvetum

original: “abhidhammepī”tiādimāha. Aggaṃ aggahetvāti aggaṃ attano aggahetvā. Uddesadānanti
analyzed: abhidhamme pi itiādim āha aggam agga hetvā iti aggam attanaḥ agga hetvā uddesa dānam ti

original: pāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca uddisanaṃ. Pāḷivaṇṇanāti pāḷiyā atthavaṇṇanā. Dhammakathākathananti
analyzed: pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca uddisanam pāḷi vaṇṇanā ati pāḷiyā attha vaṇṇanā dhamma kathā kathanan ti

original: sarabhaññasarabhaṇanādivasena dhammakathanaṃ.
analyzed: sarabhañña sarabhaṇana ādi vasena dhamma kathanam

original: Karuṇāti karuṇābrahmavihāramāha. Karuṇāpubbabhāgoti tassa pubbabhāgaupacārajjhānaṃ
analyzed: karuṇā iti karuṇā brahmavihāram āha karuṇā pubbabhāgaḥ ti tassa pubbabhāga aupacāra jhānam

analyzed: vadati pāḷi pade pana yā kāci karuṇā karuṇā ati vuttā karuṇā cetaḥ vimuttī iti pana appanā appattā ava

original: Mettāyapi eseva nayo. Suci-saddato bhāve yya-kāraṃ, i-kārassa ca e-kārādesaṃ katvā
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ su ci saddataḥ bhāve yyakāram ikārassa ca ekāra ādesam katvā

original: ayaṃ niddesoti āha “soceyyanti sucibhāvo”ti. Hotu tāva sucibhāvo soceyyaṃ, tassa
analyzed: ayam niddeso ti āha soceyyanti suci bhāvo ti hotu tāva suci bhāvo soceyyam tassa

original: pana mettāpubbabhāgatā kathanti āha “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi.

original: Muṭṭhā sati etassāti muṭṭhassati, tassa bhāvo muṭṭhassaccaṃ, satipaṭipakkho dhammo,
analyzed: muṭṭhā sati etassa ati muṭṭhaḥ sati tassa bhāvaḥ muṭṭha ssaccam sati paṭipakkhaḥ dhammo

analyzed: na satiyāḥ abhāva mattam yasmā paṭipakkhe satī tassa vasena sati vigatā vippavutthā

original: nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “sativippavāso”ti. “Assatī”tiādīsu a-kāro paṭipakkhe daṭṭhabbo,
analyzed: nāma hoti tasmā vuttam sati vippavāsaḥ ti assati iti ādīsu akāraḥ paṭipakkhe daṭṭhabbo

original: na sattapaṭisedhe. Udake lābu viya yena cittaṃ ārammaṇe pilavantā viya tiṭṭhati,
analyzed: na satta paṭisedhe udake lābu viya yena cittam ārammaṇe pilavantā viya tiṭṭhati

original: na ogāhati, sā pilāpanatā. Yena gahitampi ārammaṇaṃ sammussati na sarati, sā sammussanatā.
analyzed: na ogāhati sā pilāpana tā yena gahitam pi ārammaṇam sammussati na sarati sā sammussana tā

original: Yathā vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā vijjāya pahātabbato, evaṃ sampajaññapaṭipakkhaṃ asampajaññaṃ, avijjāyeva.
analyzed: yathā vijjā paṭipakkhā avijjā vijjāya pahātabbataḥ evam sampajañña paṭipakkham asampajaññam avijjāya iva

original: Indriyasaṃvarabhedoti indriyasaṃvaravināso. Appaṭisaṅkhāti apaccavekkhitvā ayoniso ca āhāraparibhoge ādīnavānisaṃse avīmaṃsitvā.
analyzed: indriya saṃvara bhedo ti indriya saṃvara vināso a paṭisaṅkhāti a paccavekkhitvā ayonisaḥ ca āhāra paribhoge ādīnava anisaṃse a vīmaṃsitvā

original: Appaṭisaṅkhāyāti itikattabbatāsu appaccavekkhaṇāya nāmaṃ. Aññāṇaṃ appaṭisaṅkhāta
analyzed: a paṭisaṅkhāya ati itikattabba tāsu ap paccavekkhaṇāya nāmam aññāṇam appaṭisaṅkhāta

analyzed: nimittam akampana ñāṇan ti tāya an abhibhavanīyam ñāṇam tattha tattha paccavekkhaṇā ñāṇam ca iva

analyzed: paccavekkhaṇāya muddha bhūtam lokuttara ñāṇañca nippariyāyataḥ magga bhāvanā bhāvanā

analyzed: nāma yā ca tad atthā tat ubhayam ca bhāventassa iva icchitabbam na bhāvita bhāvanassa ati

original: vuttaṃ “bhāventassa uppannaṃ bala”nti. Tenāha “yā kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkamma”nti.

original: Kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvopi balaṭṭho eva, paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīyatā
analyzed: kāmam sampayutta dhammesu thira bhāvaḥ api balaṭṭhaḥ eva paṭipakkhehi pana akampanīya tā

original: sātisayaṃ balaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ “assatiyā akampanavasenā”ti. Paccanīkadhammasamanato
analyzed: sa atisayam balaṭṭho ti vuttam assatiyā a kampana vasena āti paccanīka dhamma samanato

original: samatho samādhi. Aniccādinā vividhenākārena dassanato vipassanā paññā. Taṃ ākāraṃ
analyzed: samatho anicca ādinā vividhena ākārena dassanataḥ vipassanā paññā tam ākāram

original: gahetvāti samādhānākāraṃ gahetvā. Yenākārena pubbe alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ majjhimaṃ bhāvanāvīthipaṭipannaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā ti samādhāna ākāram gahetvā yena ākārena pubbe alīnam anuddhatam majjhimam bhāvanā vīthi paṭipannam

original: hutvā cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hoti, taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā sallakkhetvā. Nimittavasenāti kāraṇavasena.
analyzed: hutvā cittam samāhitam hoti tam ākāram gahetvā sallakkhetvā nimitta vasena ati kāraṇa vasena

original: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā paggahova taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā puna pavattetabbassa paggāhassa
analyzed: esā iva nayo ti iminā paggahaḥ uva tam ākāram gahetvā puna pavattetabbassa paggāhassa

original: nimittavasena paggāhanimittanti imamatthaṃ atidisati, tassattho samathe vuttanayānusārena
analyzed: nimitta vasena paggāha nimittam ti imam attham atidisati tassa atthaḥ samathe vutta naya anusārena

analyzed: veditabbaḥ paggāhaḥ vīriyam kosajja pakkhataḥ cittassa patitum a datvā paggaṇhanato

original: Avikkhepo ekaggatā vikkhepassa uddhaccassa paṭipakkhabhāvato. Paṭisaṅkhānakiccanibbattibhāvato
analyzed: avikkhepaḥ ekagga tā vikkhepassa uddhaccassa paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ paṭisaṅkhāna kicca nibbatti bhāvataḥ

samathapaggāhānaṃ upari pavattisabbhāvato samathanimittadukassapi missakatā vuttā.
analyzed: samatha paggāhānam upari pavatti sabbhāvato samatha nimitta dukassa api missaka tā vuttā

original: Yathāsamādinnassa sīlassa bhedakaro vītikkamo. Sīlavināsako asaṃvaro. Sammādiṭṭhivināsikāti “atthi dinna”ntiādi nayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā dūsikā.

original: Sīlassa sampādanaṃ nāma sabbabhāgato tassa anūnatāpādananti āha “sampādanato paripūraṇato”ti.

original: Pāripūrattho hi sampadā-saddoti. Mānasikasīlaṃ nāma sīlavisodhanavasena abhijjhādippahānaṃ.
analyzed: pāripūra atthaḥ hi sampadā saddaḥ ti mānasika sīlam nāma sīla visodhana vasena abhijjhā ādi ppahānam

original: Diṭṭhipāripūribhūtaṃ ñāṇanti atthikadiṭṭhiādisammādiṭṭhiyā pāripūribhāvena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhi pāripūri bhūtam ñāṇan ti atthika diṭṭhi ādi sammādiṭṭhiyā pāripūri bhāvena pavattam ñāṇam

original: Visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthanti cittavisuddhiādiuparivisuddhiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ.
analyzed: visuddhim pāpetum samatthanti citta visuddhi ādi upari visuddhiyā paccayaḥ bhavitum samattham

original: Suvisuddhameva hi sīlaṃ tassā padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti. Visuddhiṃ pāpetuṃ samatthaṃ dassananti
analyzed: su visuddham eva hi sīlam tassā padaṭṭhānam hoti iti visuddhim pāpetum samattham dassanan ti

original: ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ, paramatthavisuddhinibbānañca pāpetuṃ upanetuṃ samatthaṃ kammassakatāñāṇādisammādassanaṃ.
analyzed: ñāṇa dassana visuddhim paramattha visuddhi nibbānañca pāpetum upanetum samattham kammassaka tā ñāṇa ādi sammādassanam

original: Tenāha “abhidhamme”tiādi. Ettha ca “idaṃ akusalaṃ kammaṃ no sakaṃ, idaṃ pana kammaṃ
analyzed: tena āha abhidhamma itiādi ettha ca idam akusalam kammam no sakam idam pana kammam

original: saka”nti evaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca kammassakatājānanañāṇaṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ.

original: Tenāha “ettha cā”tiādi. “Parena katampī”ti idaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ yathā parena
analyzed: tena āha ettha ca ati ādi parena katampi iti idam nidassana vasena vuttam yathā parena

original: kataṃ, evaṃ attanā katampi sakakammaṃ nāma na hotīti. Attanā vā ussāhitena parena
analyzed: katam evam attanā katam pi saka kammam nāma na hoti iti attanā vā ussāhitena parena

original: kataṃpīti evaṃ vā attho daṭṭhabbo. Yañhi taṃ parassa ussāhanavasena kataṃ, tampi
analyzed: katam pi iti evam vā atthaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yat hi tam parassa ussāhana vasena katam tam pi

original: sakakammaṃ nāma hotīti ayañhettha adhippāyo. Atthabhañjanatoti diṭṭhadhammikādisabbaatthavināsanato.
analyzed: saka kammam nāma hoti iti ayam ha ittha adhippāyaḥ attha bhañjanataḥ ti diṭṭhadhammika ādi sabba attha vināsanato

original: Atthajananatoti idhalokatthaparalokatthaparamatthānaṃ uppādanato. Ārabbhakāle “aniccaṃ
analyzed: attha jananato ti idha loka ttha para loka ttha paramatthānam uppādanataḥ ārabbha kāle aniccam

original: dukkhaṃ anattā”ti pavattampi vacīsaccañca lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhantaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ
analyzed: dukkham anattā ti pavattam pi vacī saccam ca lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhantam vipassanā ñāṇam

original: anulometi tattheva paṭivijjhanato. Paramatthasaccañca nibbānaṃ na vilometi na virodheti
analyzed: anulomā iti tattha eva paṭivijjhanato paramattha saccam ca nibbānam na vilomā iti na virodhā iti

original: ekanteneva sampāpanato.
analyzed: ekantena iva sampāpanataḥ

original: Ñāṇadassananti ñāṇabhūtaṃ dassanaṃ, tena maggaṃ vadati. Taṃsampayuttameva vīriyanti
analyzed: ñāṇa dassananti ñāṇa bhūtam dassanam tena maggam vadati tad sampayuttam eva vīriyanti

original: paṭhamamaggasampayuttaṃ vīriyamāha. Sabbāpi maggapaññā diṭṭhivisuddhiyevāti dassetuṃ
analyzed: paṭhama magga sampayuttam vīriyam āha sabbā api magga paññā diṭṭhi visuddhiyā eva āti dassetuṃ

original: “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayameva ca nayo abhidhammapāḷiyā sametīti dassento “abhidhamme panā”ti ādiṃ avoca.
analyzed: apica atiādi vuttam ayam eva ca nayaḥ abhidhamma pāḷiyā sameti iti dassentaḥ abhidhamme pana iti ādim avoca

original: Yasmā saṃvego nāma sahottappañāṇaṃ, tasmā saṃvegavatthuṃ bhayato bhāyitabbato dassanavasena
analyzed: saṃvegaḥ nāma saha uttappa ñāṇam tasmā saṃvega vatthum bhayataḥ bhāyitabbataḥ dassana vasena

analyzed: pavatta ñāṇam tena āha bhāyanti etasmā ati bhayam eva bhayam

original: jātibhayaṃ. Saṃvejanīyanti saṃvijjitabbaṃ bhāyitabbaṃ uttāsitabbaṃ. Ṭhānanti kāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: jāti bhayam saṃvejanīyanti saṃvijjitabbam bhāyitabbam uttāsitabbam ṭhānam ti kāraṇam

original: vatthūti attho. Saṃvegajātassāti uppannasaṃvegassa. Upāyapadhānanti upāyena pavattetabbaṃ vīriyaṃ.
analyzed: vatthu uti attho saṃvega jātassa ati uppanna saṃvegassa upāya padhānam ti upāyena pavattetabbam vīriyam

original: Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti sīlādīnaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ. Bhāvanāyāti uppādanena vaḍḍhanena
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam ti sīla ādīnam anavajja dhammānam bhāvanāya ati uppādanena vaḍḍhanena

original: ca. Asantuṭṭhassāti “alaṃ ettāvatā, kathaṃ ettāvatā”ti saṅkocāpattivasena na santuṭṭhassa.
analyzed: ca asantuṭṭhassa ati alam ettāvatā katham ettāvatā iti saṅkoca āpatti vasena na santuṭṭhassa

original: Bhiyyokamyatāti bhiyyo bhiyyo uppādanicchā. Vosānanti saṅkocaṃ asamatthanti. Tussanaṃ
analyzed: bhiyyokamyatā ati bhiyyas bhiyyas uppāda nicchā vosāna nti saṅkocam asamattha nti tussanam

original: tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, natthi etassa santuṭṭhīti asantuṭṭhi, tassa bhāvo asantuṭṭhitā.
analyzed: tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi natthi etassa santuṭṭhi iti asantuṭṭhi tassa bhāvaḥ asantuṭṭhi tā

original: Vīriyappavāhe vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanaṃ nivattanaṃ paṭivānaṃ, taṃ tassa atthīti
analyzed: vīriya pavāhe vattamāne antarā eva paṭigamanam nivattanam paṭivānam tat tassa atthi iti

original: paṭivānī, na paṭivānī appaṭivānī, tassa bhāvo appaṭivānitā. Sakkaccakiriyatāti kusalānaṃ
analyzed: paṭivānī na paṭivānī appaṭivānī tassa bhāvaḥ appaṭivāni tā kusalānam

original: karaṇe sakkaccakiriyatā ādarakiriyatā. Sātaccakiriyatāti satatameva karaṇaṃ. Aṭṭhitakiriyatāti
analyzed: karaṇe ādara kiriya tā sātacca kiriya tā ati satatam eva karaṇam aṭṭhita kiriya tā ati

original: antarā aṭṭhapetvā khaṇḍaṃ akatvā karaṇaṃ. Anolīnavuttitāti na līnappavattitā. Anikkhittachandatāti
analyzed: antarā aṭṭhapetvā khaṇḍam a katvā karaṇam anolīna vutti tā ati na līna ppavatti tā a nikkhitta chanda tā ati

original: kusalacchandassa anikkhipanaṃ. Anikkhittadhuratāti kusalakaraṇe vīriyadhurassa anikkhipanaṃ.

analyzed: bhavanti sesa dvaye pi iminā nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ vutta nayena iva ati kāma paṭisaṃyuttaḥ

original: brahmacariyesanā eva.

original: Ākārasaṇṭhānanti visiṭṭhākārāvaṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃvidhanti hi kena pakārena saṇṭhitaṃ,

analyzed: samavaṭṭhitanti attho saddatthato pana vidahanam visiṭṭha ākārena avaṭṭhānam vidhā

original: yāthāvā’ yāthāvabhūtānaṃ vasena. Tayo mānā vuttā seyyasseva uppajjanakā. Esa nayo

original: sadisahīnesupi. Tenāha “ayañhi māno”tiādi. Idāni yathāuddiṭṭhe navavidhepi māne vatthuvibhāgena

original: dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rājūnañceva pabbajitānañca uppajjati kasmā? Te visesato

original: attānaṃ seyyato dahantīti. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassento “rājā hī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: attānam seyyataḥ dahanti iti idāni tam attham vitthārataḥ dassentaḥ rājā hi itiādim āha

original: Ko mayā sadiso atthīti ko-saddo paṭikkhepattho, añño sadiso natthīti adhippāyo. Etesaṃyevāti
analyzed: kaḥ mayā sadisaḥ atthi iti ko saddo paṭikkhepa atthaḥ aññaḥ sadisaḥ natthi iti adhippāyaḥ etesam yeva ati

analyzed: rājūnam pabbajitānam ca uppajjati seṭṭha vatthuka ttā tassa hīnaḥ ham asmi iti māne pi esa eva nayo

original: vā “amacco ti nāmāmeva…pe… nāmāha”nti vāti sadisassa seyyamānādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pavattiākāradassanaṃ.

original: Dāsādīnanti ādi-saddena bhatika kammakarādīnaṃ parādhīnavuttikānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Ādi-saddena

original: pavattatīti nāyaṃ virodho. Tenevāha “kiṃ dāso nāma ahanti ete māne karotī”ti. Tathā
analyzed: pavattati iti na ayam virodhaḥ tena iva āha kim dāsaḥ nāma ahanti ete māne karoti iti tathā

original: hissa yāthāvamānatā vuttā.
analyzed: hi ssa yāthāvamāna tā vuttā

original: Yāthāvamānā bhavanikanti viya, attadiṭṭhi viya ca na mahāsāvajjā, tasmā te na apāyagamanīyā.
analyzed: ca na te na apāya gamanīyā

original: Yathābhūtavatthukatāya hi te yāthāvamānā. “Arahattamaggavajjhā”ti ca tassa anavasesappahāyitāya
analyzed: yathā bhūta vatthuka tāya hi te yāthāva mānāḥ ca tassa anavasesa ppahāyi tāya

analyzed: vuttam dutiya tatiya maggehi ca te yathākkamam pahīyanti ye oḷārikatarāḥ oḷārikatamā

original: paṭhamamaggavajjhā vuttā.
analyzed: paṭhama magga vajjhā vuttā

original: Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhā, kāloti āha “tayo addhāti tayo kālā”ti.

original: Suttantapariyāyenāti bhaddekarattasuttādīsu āgatanayena. Tattha hi “yo cāvuso mano,
analyzed: suttanta pariyāyena ati bhaddekaratta sutta ādīsu āgata nayena tattha hi yaḥ ca āvuso mano

original: ye ca dhammā, ubhayametaṃ paccuppannaṃ, tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ

original: hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgapaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto

original: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratī”ti addhāpaccuppannaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha
analyzed: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati iti addhā paccuppannam sandhāya evam vuttam tena āha

original: “paṭisandhito pubbe”tiādi. Tadantaranti tesaṃ cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ vemajjhaṃ paccuppanno
analyzed: paṭisandhito pubba itiādi tad antaram ti tesam cuti paṭisandhīnam vemajjham paccuppannaḥ

analyzed: addhā yaḥ pubbanta aparantānam vemajjhatāya pubbanta aparante kaṅkhati pubbanta aparante

analyzed: aññāṇam ti evamādīsu pubba anta apara anto ti ca vuccati bhaṅgaḥ dhammo atīta aṃsena saṅgahito ti

original: āha “bhaṅgato uddhaṃ atīto addhā nāmā”ti. Tathā anuppanno dhammo anāgataṃsena saṅgahitoti

original: āha “uppādato pubbe anāgato addhā nāmā”ti. Khaṇattayeti uppādo, ṭhiti, bhaṅgoti tīsu

original: khaṇesu. Yadā hi dhammo hetupaccayassa samavāye uppajjati, yadā ca veti, iti dvīsupi
analyzed: khaṇesu yadā hi dhammaḥ hetu paccayassa samavāye uppajjati yadā ca veti iti dvīsu pi

original: voharīyati, dhammappavattimattatāya hi paramatthato avijjamānopi kālo tasseva dhammassa
analyzed: voharīyati dhamma ppavattimattatāya hi paramatthataḥ a vijjamānaḥ api kālaḥ tassa iva dhammassa

original: pavattiavatthāvisesaṃ upādāya teneva vohārena “atīto addhā”tiādinā vutto.
analyzed: pavatti avatthā visesam upādāya tena iva vohārena atītaḥ addhā iti ādinā vuttaḥ

original: Anta-saddo loke pariyosāne, koṭiyaṃ niruḷhoti tadatthaṃ dassento “antoyeva anto”ti
analyzed: anta saddo loke pariyosāne koṭiyam niruḷho ti tad attham dassento anto yeva anto ti

original: āha, koṭi antoti attho. Parabhāgoti pārimanto. Amati gacchati bhavappabandho niṭṭhānaṃ

analyzed: antaḥ lāmakaḥ bhāgasaḥ ñāyati iti antaḥ aṃso ti āha koṭṭhāsaḥ antaḥ ti santo paramatthato

analyzed: ayam āpajjeyya na tikaḥ tasmā hetumanta ggahaṇena hetu ggahaṇam na cintetabbam ayam

analyzed: aññassa dukkha sabhāvassa abhāvataḥ vipariṇāme iti pariṇāme vigame ti attho tena āha

original: sukhavedanuparamo dukkhato upaṭṭhāti, svāyamattho piyavippayogena dīpetabbo. Tenāha
analyzed: sukha vedanā uparamaḥ dukkhataḥ upaṭṭhāti tena āha

original: itaradukkhatāvacanena nivattīyatīti nāyaṃ virodho. Tenevāha “ṭhapetvā dukkhavedanaṃ sukhavedanañcā”ti.
analyzed: itara dukkha tā vacanena nivattīyati iti na ayam virodhaḥ tena iva āha ṭhapetvā dukkha vedanam sukha vedanam ca ati

analyzed: micchā sabhāvaḥ ti hita sukha āvahaḥ me bhavissati iti evam tathā abhāvataḥ

original: “subha”ntiādiviparītappavattito ca micchāsabhāvo, musāsabhāvoti attho. Mātughātakādīsu
analyzed: ca micchā sabhāvaḥ musā sabhāvaḥ ti atthaḥ mātughātaka ādīsu

original: pavattamānāpi hi hitasukhaṃ icchantāva pavattantīti te dhammā “hitasukhāvahā me bhavissantī”ti
analyzed: pavattamānā api hi hita sukham icchantā ava pavattanti iti te dhammā hita sukha āvahāḥ me bhavissanti iti

original: pavatti hotīti te dhammā asubhādīsu subhādiviparītappavattikā honti. Vipākadāne sati

original: Anekesu ānantariyesu katesu yaṃ tattha balavaṃ, taṃ vipaccati, na itarānīti ekantavipākajanakatāya

original: Apacīticetanā apacitisahagataṃ apacīyati etāyāti yathā nandīrāgo eva nandīrāgasahagatā,
analyzed: apacīti cetanā apaciti sahagatam apacīyati etā āyāti yathā nandī rāgaḥ eva nandī rāga sahagatā

original: yathāvuttāya vā apacitiyā sahagataṃ sahapavattanti apacitisahagataṃ. Apacāyanavasena
analyzed: yathā vuttāya vā apacitiyā sahagatam sahapavattanti apaciti sahagatam apacāyana vasena

original: pavattaṃ puññakiriyavatthu. Vayasā guṇehi ca vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattapaṭipattīsu byāvaṭo
analyzed: pavattam puñña kiriya vatthu vayasā guṇehi ca vatta paṭipattīsu

original: hoti yāya cetanāya, sā veyyāvaccaṃ, veyyāvaccameva veyyāvaccasahagataṃ. Veyyāvaccasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: hoti yāya cetanāya sā veyyāvaccam veyyāvaccam eva veyyāvacca sahagatam veyyāvacca saṅkhātāya

original: vā vattapaṭipattiyā samuṭṭhāpanavaseneva sahagataṃ pavattanti veyyāvaccasahagataṃ,
analyzed: vā vatta paṭipattiyā samuṭṭhāpana vasena iva sahagatam pavattanti veyyāvacca sahagatam

original: tathāpavattaṃ puññakiriyavatthu. Attano santāne pattaṃ puññaṃ anuppadīyati etenāti
analyzed: tathāpavattam puña kiriya vatthu attano santāne pattam puññam anuppadīyati etena ati

original: pattānuppadānaṃ. Tathā parena anuppadinnatāya pattaṃ abbhanumodati etenāti pattabbhanumodanaṃ.
analyzed: patta an uppadānam tathā parena an uppadinna tāya pattam abbhanumodati etena ati patta bbhanumodanam

original: Ananuppadinnaṃ pana kevalaṃ abbhanumodīyati etenāti abbhanumodanaṃ. Dhammaṃ deseti
analyzed: an an uppadinnam pana kevalam abbhanumodīyati etena ati abbhanumodanam dhammam deseti

original: etāyāti desanā, desanāva desanāmayaṃ. Suṇāti etenāti savanaṃ, savanameva savanamayaṃ.
analyzed: etāya ati desanā desanā ava desanām ayam suṇāti etena ati savanam savanam eva savana mayam

original: Diṭṭhiyā ñāṇassa ujugamanaṃ diṭṭhijugataṃ. Sabbattha “puññakiriyavatthū”ti padaṃ
analyzed: diṭṭhiyāḥ ñāṇassa uju gamanam diṭṭhi ju gatam sabbattha puñña kiriya vatthu uti padam

original: apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgatā.
analyzed: apekkhitvā napuṃsaka liṅga tā

original: Pūjāvasena sāmīcikiriyā apacāyanaṃ apaciti. Vayasā guṇehi ca jeṭṭhānaṃ gilānānañca
analyzed: pūjā vasena sāmīcikiriyā apacāyanam vayasā guṇehi ca

original: taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ. Ayametesaṃ visesoti āha “tatthā”tiādi. Cattāro paccaye
analyzed: taṃ taṃ kicca karaṇam veyyāvaccam ayam etesam visesaḥ ti āha tattha atiādi cattāro paccaye

original: datvā sabbasattānanti ca ekadesato ukkaṭṭhaniddeso, yaṃ kiñci deyyadhammaṃ datvā,
analyzed: da tvā sabba sattānam ti ca eka desataḥ ukkaṭṭha niddesaḥ yam kiñci deyya dhammam da tvā

original: puññaṃ vā katvā “katipayānaṃ, ekasseva vā patti hotū”ti pariṇāmanampi pattānuppadānameva.
analyzed: puññam vā katvā ekassa iva vā patti hotu uti pariṇāmanam pi patta anuppadānam eva

original: Taṃ na mahapphalaṃ taṇhāya parāmaṭṭhattā. Paresaṃ deseti hitapharaṇena muducittenāti
analyzed: tam na mahapphalam taṇhāya parāmaṭṭha ttā paresam deseti hita pharaṇena mudu cittena ati

original: ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Evanti evaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā bahussuto hutvā pare dhammadesanāya
analyzed: ānetvā sambandhitabbam evanti evam imam dhammam sutvā bahussutaḥ hutvā pare dhamma desanāya

original: anuggaṇhissāmīti hitapharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti. Evañhissa savanaṃ attano,
analyzed: anuggaṇhissāmi iti hita pharaṇena mudu cittena dhammam suṇāti evam hissa savanam attano

original: paresañca sammāpaṭipattiyā paccayabhāvato mahapphalaṃ bhavissatīti. Sabbesanti sabbesampi
analyzed: paresam ca sammāpaṭipattiyāḥ paccaya bhāvataḥ mahapphalam bhavissati iti sabbesan ti sabbesam pi

original: dasannaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ. Niyamalakkhaṇanti mahapphalabhāvassa niyāmakasabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: dasannam puñña kiriya vatthūnam niyama lakkhaṇam ti mahat phala bhāvassa niyāmaka sabhāvam

original: Diṭṭhiyā ujubhāvenevāti “atthi, natthī”ti antadvayassa durasamussāritatāya “atthi
analyzed: diṭṭhiyāḥ uju bhāvena iva ati atthi natthi iti anta dvayassa dura samussārita tāya atthi

original: dinna”ntiādi nayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā ujukameva pavattiyā. Dānādīsu hi yaṃ kiñci
analyzed: dinna nti ādi naya ppavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyai ujukam eva pavattiyai dāna ādīsu hi yam kiñci

original: imāya eva sammādiṭṭhiyā parisodhitaṃ mahājutikaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ bhavati.
analyzed: imāya eva sammādiṭṭhiyā parisodhitam mahā jutikam mahā vipphāram bhavati

original: Purimeheva tīhīti pāḷiyaṃ āgateheva tīhi. Sīlamaye puññakiriyavatthumhi saṅgahaṃ
analyzed: purimehi iva tīhi iti āgatehi iva tīhi sīla maye puñña kiriya vatthumhi saṅgaham

original: gacchanti cārittasīlabhāvato. Dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti dānasabhāvattā, dānavisayattā
analyzed: gacchanti cāritta sīla bhāvataḥ dāna maye saṅgaham gacchanti dāna sabhāva tā dāna visaya tā

original: ca. Kāmaṃ desanā dhammadānasabhāvato dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti vattuṃ yuttā, kusaladhammāsevanabhāvato
analyzed: ca kāmam desanā dhamma dāna sabhāvataḥ dāna maye saṅgaham gacchati iti vattum yuttā kusala dhamma āsevana bhāvataḥ

original: pana vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā pavattitā viya savanena saddhiṃ bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ
analyzed: pana vimutta āyatana sīse savanena saddhim bhāvanā maye saṅgaham

original: gacchantīti vuttaṃ. “Diṭṭhijugataṃ bhāvanāmaye”ti keci. Diṭṭhijugate eva ca attanā
analyzed: gacchanti iti vuttam diṭṭhi jugatam bhāvanā mayā iti keci diṭṭhi jugate eva ca attanā

original: katassa puññassa anussaraṇaṃ, tassa ca paresaṃ atthāya pariṇāmanaṃ, guṇapasaṃsā,
analyzed: katassa puññassa anussaraṇam tassa ca paresam atthāya pariṇāmanam guṇa pasaṃsā

original: aññehi kariyamānāya puññakiriyāya, sammāpaṭipattiyā ca anumodanaṃ saraṇagamananti
analyzed: aññehi kariyamānāya puñña kiriyāya sammā paṭipattiyā ca anumodanam saraṇa gamananti

original: evaṃ ādayo puññavisesā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti diṭṭhijukammavaseneva tesaṃ ijjhanato.
analyzed: evam ādayo puñña visesā saṅgaham gacchanti diṭṭhi ju kamma vasena iva tesam ijjhanataḥ

original: Parassa paṭipattiyā sodhanattho anuyogo codanā, sā yāni nissāya pavattati, tāni codanāvatthūni
analyzed: parassa paṭipattiyā sodhana ttho anuyogaḥ codanā sā yāni nissāya pavattati tāni codanā vatthūni

original: diṭṭhasutaparisaṅkitāni. Tenāha “codanākāraṇānī”ti. Diṭṭhenāti ca hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ,
analyzed: diṭṭha suta parisaṅkitāni tena āha codanā kāraṇāni iti diṭṭhena ati ca hetumhi karaṇa vacanam

original: diṭṭhena hetunāti attho. Kiṃ pana taṃ diṭṭhanti āha “vītikkama”nti. Disvāti ca dassanahetūti
analyzed: diṭṭhena hetunā ati attho kim pana tat diṭṭhanti āha vītikkamanti disvā iti ca dassana hetū ti

original: ayamettha attho yathā “paññāya cassa disvā”ti. “Sutenā”tiādīsupi iminā nayena attho
analyzed: ayam ettha atthaḥ yathā paññāya cassa disvā ati sutena ati ādīsu pi iminā nayena atthaḥ

original: veditabbo. Parassāti parato, parassa vā vacanaṃ sutvā. Diṭṭhaparisaṅkitenāti diṭṭhānugatena
analyzed: veditabbo parassa ati paratas parassa vā vacanam sutvā diṭṭha parisaṅkitena ati diṭṭha anugatena

original: parisaṅkitena, tathā parisaṅkitena vā vītikkamena. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Codeti
analyzed: parisaṅkitena tathā parisaṅkitena vā vītikkamena sesa pada dvaye pi eṣa iva nayaḥ codeti

original: vatthusandassanena vā saṃvāsappaṭikkhepena vā sāmīcippaṭikkhepena vā. Imasmiṃ pana
analyzed: vatthu sandassanena vā saṃvāsa ppaṭikkhepena vā sāmīci ppaṭikkhepena vā imasmin pana

original: atthe vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hotīti āha “ayamettha saṅkhepo”ti. Vitthāraṃ pana
analyzed: atthe vitthāriyamāne atippapañcaḥ hoti iti āha ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ iti vitthāram pana

original: icchantānaṃ tassa adhigamupāyaṃ dassento “vitthāro pana…pe… veditabbo”ti āha.
analyzed: icchantānam tassa adhigama upāyam dassentaḥ vitthāraḥ panape veditabbaḥ ti āha

original: Kāmūpapattiyoti kāmehi upapannatā, samannāgatatāti attho. Samannāgamo ca tesaṃ paṭisevanaṃ,
analyzed: kāma upapattiyaḥ ti kāmehi upapanna tā samannāgata tā ati attho samannāgamaḥ ca tesam paṭisevanaṃ

original: samadhigamo cāti āha “kāmūpasevanā kāmapaṭilābhā vā”ti. Paccupaṭṭhitakāmāti dutiyatatiyarāsīnaṃ
analyzed: samadhigamaḥ ca ati āha kāma upasevanā kāma paṭilābhā vā ati paccupaṭṭhita kāmā ti

original: viya sayaṃ, parehi ca animmitā. Uṭṭhānakammaphalūpajīvibhāvato pana tadubhayavasena
analyzed: sayam parehi ca a nimmitāḥ uṭṭhāna kamma phala upajīvi bhāvato pana tad ubhaya vasena

original: paccupaṭṭhitā kāmā etesanti paccupaṭṭhitakāmā. Te pana tesaṃ yebhuyyena nibaddhāni
analyzed: paccupaṭṭhitā kāmā etesanti paccupaṭṭhita kāmā te pana tesam yebhuyyena nibaddhāni

original: hontīti “nibaddhakāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Catudevalokavāsinoti cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: honti iti nibaddha kāmā ati vuttam catu deva loka vāsinaḥ ti cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya yāva

original: tusitā devā. Vinipātikāti āpāyikā. Paranimmitā kāmā etesanti paranimmitakāmā.
analyzed: tusitāḥ devāḥ vinipātikā ati āpāyikā para nimmitā kāmā etesanti para nimmita kāmā

original: Pakatisevanavasenāti anumānato jānanaṃ vadati, na paccakkhato. Vasaṃ vattentīti yathāruci
analyzed: pakati sevana vasena āti anumānataḥ jānanam vadati na paccakkhatas vasam vattenti iti yathāruci

original: pātabyataṃ āpajjanti. “Methunaṃ paṭisevantī”ti idaṃ pana kecivādapaṭisedhanatthaṃ
analyzed: pātabyatam āpajjanti methunam paṭisevanti iti idam pana keci vāda paṭisedhana attham

original: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “keci panā”tiādi. Te “yāmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āliṅgitamattena, tusitānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam tena āha keci pana atiādi te yāmānam aññam aññam āliṅgita mattena tusitānam

original: hatthāmasanamattena, nimmānaratīnaṃ hasitamattena, paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ olokitamattena
analyzed: nimmāna ratīnam hasita mattena para nimmita vasavattīnam olokita mattena

original: kāmakiccaṃ ijjhatī”ti vadanti. “Itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyā vā”ti vadanti
analyzed: kāma kiccam ijjhati iti vadanti itaresam dvinnam dvayaṃdvaya samāpattiyā vā ati vadanti

original: tādisassa kāmesu virajjanassa tesu abhāvato, kāmānañca uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītatarapaṇītatamabhāvato.
analyzed: tādisassa kāmesu virajjanassa tesu abhāvataḥ kāmānam ca uttaruttari paṇīta paṇītatara paṇītatama bhāvataḥ

original: Kevalaṃ pana nissandābhāvo tesaṃ vattabbo. Kāmakiccanti taṅkhaṇikapariḷāhūpasamāvahaṃ
analyzed: kevalam pana nissanda abhāvo tesam vattabbo kāma kiccan ti taṅkhaṇika pariḷāhu upasamāvaham

original: phassasukhaṃ. Kāmāti kāmūpabhogā. Pākatikā evāti heṭṭhimehi ekasadisā eva. Ekasaṅkhātanti
analyzed: phassa sukham kāmā ati kāma upabhogā pākatikāḥ eva ati heṭṭhimehi eka sadisāḥ eva eka saṅkhātanti

original: ekarūpaṃ samānarūpanti, samaññātaṃ samānabhāvanti vā attho.
analyzed: eka rūpam samāna rūpanti samaññātam samāna bhāvanti vā attho

original: Sukhapaṭilābhāti sukhasamadhigamā. Heṭṭhāti paṭhamajjhānabhūmito heṭṭhā manussesu,
analyzed: sukha paṭilābhā ati sukha samadhigamā heṭṭhā iti paṭhamajjhāna bhūmitaḥ heṭṭhā manussesu

original: devesu vā. Paṭhamajjhānasukhanti kusalapaṭhamajjhānaṃ. Bhūmivasenapi heṭṭhuparibhāvo
analyzed: devesu vā kusala paṭhamajjhānam bhūmi vasena api heṭṭhuparibhāvaḥ

original: labbhateva brahmakāyikesu, brahmapurohitesu vā kusalajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmapurohitesu,
analyzed: labbha tā iva brahmakāyikesu brahma purohitesu vā kusala jhānam nibbattetvā brahma purohitesu

original: mahābrahmesu vā vipākasukhānubhavanassa labbhanato. Ettha ca dutiyatatiyajjhānabhūmivasena
analyzed: vā vipāka sukha anubhavanassa labbhanataḥ ettha ca dutiya tatiya jhāna bhūmi vasena

original: dutiyatatiyasukhūpapattīnaṃ vuccamānattā paṭhamajjhānabhūmivaseneva paṭhamajjhānasukhūpapatti
analyzed: dutiya tatiya sukha upapattīnam vuccamāna ttā paṭhama jhāna bhūmi vasena iva paṭhama jhāna sukha upapatti

original: vuttā. Tintāti temitā, jhānasukhena ceva jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhakāyena ca
analyzed: vuttā tintā ati temitā jhāna sukhena ca iva jhāna samuṭṭhāna paṇīta rūpa phuṭṭha kāyena ca

original: paṇītā vittāti attho. Tenevāha “samantato tintā”tiādi. Yasmā kusalasukhato vipākasukhaṃ
analyzed: paṇītā vittā ti attho tena iva āha samantataḥ tintā atiādi yasmā kusala sukhataḥ vipāka sukham

original: santataratāya paṇītataraṃ bahulañca pavattati, tasmā vuttaṃ “idampi vipākajjhānasukhaṃ
analyzed: santatara tāya paṇītataram bahulam ca pavattati tasmā vuttam idam api vipāka jjhāna sukham

original: eva sandhāya vutta”nti. Tesanti ābhassarānaṃ. Sappītikassa sukhassa ativiya uḷārabhāvato
analyzed: eva sandhāya vuttanti tesanti ābhassarānam sappītikassa sukhassa ativiya uḷāra bhāvato

original: tena ajjhotthatacittānaṃ bhavalobho mahā uppajjati. Santamevāti vitakkavicārasaṅkhobhapītiubbilāvivigamena
analyzed: tena ajjhotthata cittānam bhava lobhaḥ mahā uppajjati santam eva ati vitakka vicāra saṅkhobha pīti ubbila avi vigamena

original: ativiya upasantaṃyeva. Tathā santabhāveneva hi taṃ attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ativiya upasantaṃya iva tathā santa bhāvena iva hi tam attano paccayehi padhāna bhāvam

original: nītatāya “paṇīta”nti vuccati. Tenāha “paṇītamevā”ti. Atappakena sukhapāramippattena
analyzed: nīta tāya paṇītanti vuccati tena āha paṇītam eva ati atappakena sukha pārami pattena

original: sukhena saṃyuttāya tusāya pītiyā itā pavattāti tusitā. Yasmā te tato uttari sukhassa
analyzed: sukhena saṃyuttāya tusāya pītiyai itā tusitā yasmā te tatas uttari sukhassa

original: abhāvato eva na patthenti, tasmā vuttaṃ “tato…pe… santuṭṭhā hutvā”ti. Tatiyajjhānasukhanti
analyzed: abhāvataḥ eva na patthenti tasmā vuttam tatope santuṭṭhāḥ hutvā iti tatiya jhāna sukhan ti

original: tatiyajjhānavipākasukhaṃ.
Satta ariyapaññāti aṭṭhamakato paṭṭhāya sattannaṃ ariyānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ āveṇikapaññā.
analyzed: satta ariya paññā ati aṭṭhamakataḥ paṭṭhāya sattannam ariyānam tesam tesam āveṇika paññā

original: Ṭhapetvā lokuttaraṃ paññaṃ avasesā paññā nāma. Sabbāpi tebhūmikā paññā “sekkhā”tipi
analyzed: ṭhapetvā lokuttaram paññam avasesā paññā nāma sabbā api tebhūmikā paññā sekkhā atipi

original: na vattabbā, “asekkhā”tipi na vattabbāti nevasekkhānāsekkhā, puthujjanapaññā.
analyzed: na vattabbā asekkhā atipi na vattabbā ati nevasekkha anāsekkhā puthujjana paññā

original: Yogavihitesūti paññāvihitesu paññāpariṇāmitesu upāyapaññāya sampāditesu. Kammāyatanesūti
analyzed: yoga vihitesu uti paññā vihitesu paññā pariṇāmitesu upāya paññāya sampāditesu kamma āyatanesu uti

original: ettha kammameva kammāyatanaṃ, kammañca taṃ āyatanañca ājīvādīnanti vā kammāyatanaṃ.
analyzed: ettha kammam eva kamma āyatanam kammam ca tam āyatanam ca vā kamma āyatanam

original: Esa nayo sippāyatanesupi. Tattha ca duvidhaṃ kammaṃ hīnañca vaḍḍhakikammādi, ukkaṭṭhañca
analyzed: esa nayo sippa āyatanesu pi tattha ca duvidham kammam hīnam ca vaḍḍhaki kamma ādi ukkaṭṭham ca

original: kasivāṇijjādi. Sippampi duvidhaṃ hīnañca naḷakārasippādi, ukkaṭṭhañca muddagaṇanādi.
analyzed: kasi vāṇijja ādi sippam pi duvidham hīnam ca naḷakāra sippa ādi ukkaṭṭham ca mudda gaṇanā ādi

original: Vijjāva vijjāṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ dhammikameva nāgamaṇḍalaparittaphudhamanakamantasadisaṃ
analyzed: vijjā ava vijjāṭṭhānam tam dhammikam eva nāga maṇḍala paritta phudhamanakam anta sadisam

original: veditabbaṃ. Tāni panetāni ekacce paṇḍitā bodhisattasadisā manussānaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ
analyzed: veditabbam tāni pana etāni ekacce paṇḍitāḥ bodhisatta sadisāḥ manussānam phāsu vihāram

original: ākaṅkhantā neva aññehi kariyamānāni passanti, na vā katāni uggaṇhanti. Na karontānaṃ
analyzed: ākaṅkhantā na iva aññehi kariyamānāni passanti na vā katāni uggaṇhanti na karontānam

original: suṇanti, atha kho attano dhammatāya cintāya karonti. Paññavantehi attano dhammatāya
analyzed: suṇanti atha kho attanaḥ dhamma tāya cintāya karonti paññavantehi attanaḥ dhamma tāya

original: cintāya katānipi aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi katasadisāneva honti. Kammassakatanti
analyzed: cintāya katāni api aññehi uggaṇhitvā karontehi kata sadisāna eva honti

original: “idaṃ kammaṃ sattānaṃ sakaṃ, idaṃ no saka”nti evaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ. Saccānulomikanti
analyzed: idam kammam sattānam sakam idam no sakanti evam jānana ñāṇam sacca ānulomikanti

original: vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Tañhi saccapaṭivedhassa anulomanato “saccānulomika”nti vuccati. Idānissa
analyzed: vipassanā ñāṇam tañhi sacca paṭivedhassa anulomanato sacca ānulomikanti vuccati idānissa

original: dukkhānattalakkhaṇānipi gahitānevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ nānantariyakabhāvato. Yañhi aniccaṃ,

original: taṃ dukkhaṃ. Yaṃ dukkhaṃ, tadanattāti [(sijjhanato) adhikapāṭho viya dissati]. Yaṃ
analyzed: tat dukkham yat dukkham tat anattā iti sijjhanataḥ adhika pāṭhaḥ viya dissati yam

original: evarūpanti yaṃ evaṃ heṭṭhā niddiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ. “Anulomikaṃ khanti”ntiādīni paññāvevacanāni.

original: Idha kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando adhippeto. Chandaṃ janetīti taṃ chandaṃ uppādeti.

original: Taṃ pavattento hi janeti nāma. Vāyāmaṃ karotīti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ
analyzed: tam pavattentaḥ hi janeti nāma vāyāmam karoti iti payogam parakkamam karoti vīriyam

original: ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ pavatteti. Cittaṃ upatthambhetīti teneva sahajātavīriyena
analyzed: ārabhati iti kāyika cetasika vīriyam pavatteti cittam upatthambheti iti tena iva sahajāta vīriyena

original: cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti padhānaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni padāni
analyzed: cittam ukkhipati padahati iti padhānam vīriyam karoti paṭipāṭiyā pana itāni padāni

original: uppādanāsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni. Vitthāraṃ pariharanto

original: “ayamettha saṅkhepo”tiādimāha.
analyzed: ayam ettha saṅkhepa iti ādim āha

original: Chandaṃ nissāyāti “chandavato cetosamādhi hoti, mayhaṃ evaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ chandaṃ
analyzed: chandam nissāya ati chandavataḥ cetaḥ samādhi hoti mayham evam hoti iti evam chandam

original: nissāya chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā pavatto samādhi chandasamādhi.
analyzed: nissāya chandam dhuram jeṭṭhakam pubbaṅgamam katvā pavattaḥ samādhi chanda samādhi

original: Padhānabhūtāti padhānajātā, padhānabhāvaṃ vā pattā. Saṅkhārāti catukiccasādhakaṃ

original: Apihitenāti thinamiddhapidhānena na pihitena. Anaddhenāti asañchāditena. Saobhāsanti

analyzed: tattha purimassa vasena khīṇāsavassa ati visesetvā vuttam tassa

analyzed: satta ṭṭhānikassa ati abhikkante paṭikkante sampajāna kārī hoti itiādinā vuttassa satta ṭṭhānikassa

original: Satipi sekkhānaṃ pariññātabhāve ekantato pariññātavatthukā nāma arahanto evāti vuttaṃ

original: yenākārena vipassanā kilese pajahati, tenevākārena taṃnimittake, khandhe ca “pajahatī”ti

original: vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha “vipassanā…pe… pariccajatī”ti. Yasmā vipassanā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ

original: vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena pakkhandanapariccāgavossaggāpi veditabbā. Vossaggatthāyāti

original: pariccāgavossaggatthāya ceva pakkhandanavossaggatthāya ca. Pariṇamatīti paripaccati.
analyzed: pariccāga vossagga tthāya ca iva pakkhandana vossagga tthāya ca pariṇamati iti paripaccati

original: Taṃ pariṇamanaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappattiyā ceva ariyamaggabhāvappattiyā ca icchitanti

original: bhāvetī”tiādīsu sesasambojjhaṅgakoṭṭhāsesu.
analyzed: bhāveti iti ādīsu sesa sambojjhaṅga koṭṭhāsesu

original: Bhaddakanti abhaddakānaṃ nīvaraṇādipāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena rāgavidhamanena ekantahitattā,

original: dullabhattā ca bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ. Na hi aññaṃ samādhinimittaṃ evaṃdullabhaṃ, rāgassa

original: ca ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ atthi. Anurakkhatīti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigatasamādhito
analyzed: ca uju vipaccanīka bhūtam atthi anurakkhati iti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigata samādhito

original: Aṭṭhikasaññādikāti aṭṭhikajjhānādikā. Saññāsīsena hi jhānaṃ vadati.

original: Ekapaṭivedhavasena catusaccadhamme ñāṇanti catūsu ariyasaccesu ekābhisamayavasena

original: pavattañāṇaṃ, maggañāṇanti attho. Catusaccantogadhattā catusaccabbhantare nirodhadhamme

original: pavatti, yato taṃsamudayapakkhiyesu dhammesu paṭippassaddhippahānavasena pavattati,

original: Duvidhāpi hi paññā aparappaccayatāya attapaccakkhato ariyasaccadhamme kiccato ca

original: tesaṃ aviparītasabhāvattā, saṅkhatappavaro vā ariyamaggo, tassa ca phaladhammo. Tattha
analyzed: tesam aviparīta sabhāva ttā saṅkhata ppavaraḥ vā ariya maggo tassa ca phala dhammo tattha

original: paññā taṃsahagatā dhammeñāṇaṃ.

original: Anvayeñāṇanti anugamanañāṇaṃ. Paccakkhato disvāti cattāri saccāni maggañāṇena paccakkhato

analyzed: paṭivijjhitvā yathā idāni iti yathā etarahi pañca upādāna kkhandhāḥ dukkha saccam evam

original: atītepi anāgatepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccamevāti ca sarikkhaṭṭhena vuttaṃ.

original: Esa nayo samudayasacce, maggasacce ca. Ayamevāti avadhāraṇe. Nirodhasacce pana sarikkhaṭṭho
analyzed: esa nayo samudaya sacce magga sacce ca ayam eva ati avadhāraṇe nirodha sacce pana sarikkhaṭṭho

original: Pattenāti saccānaṃ patvā ṭhitena. Viditenāti saccāni viditvā ṭhitena. Pariyogāḷhenāti

analyzed: na na yujjati iti atīta anāgate nayam neti iti atīte anāgate ca nayam neti harati peseti

original: nāma hoti. Nayidaṃ aññaṃ ñāṇuppādanaṃ nayanayanaṃ, ñāṇasseva pana pavattivisesoti.

analyzed: paresam cetasaḥ paritas ayanam paricchindanam tasmin pariye tena āha paresam

original: Duddasattāti daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Oḷārikā hi dukkhasamudayā, tiracchānagatānampi

original: assa kāraṇa”nti yāthāvato ñāṇena ogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tāni gambhīrāni. Dveti nirodhamaggasaccāni.

original: Tāni saṇhasukhumabhāvato sabhāveneva gambhīratāya yāthāvato ñāṇena durogāhattā “duddasānī”ti.
