original: Sotāpattiyaṅgādicatukkavaṇṇanā
311. Soto nāma ariyasoto purimapadalopena, tassa ādito sabbapaṭhamaṃ pajjanaṃ sotāpatti,
analyzed: sotaḥ nāma ariya soto purima pada lopena tassa āditaḥ sabba paṭhamam pajjanam sotāpatti

analyzed: dhammam pariyāpuṇāti iti ādinā vuttā pariyatti sā pana mahā visaya tāya na sabbā sabbassa

original: visesāvahāti tassa tassa anucchavikameva dassento āha “sappāyassa tepiṭakadhammassa
analyzed: visesa āvahā ti tassa tassa anucchavikam eva dassentaḥ āha sappāyassa tepiṭaka dhammassa

original: savana”nti. Yonisomanasikāro heṭṭhā vutto eva. Pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyāti vipassanānuyogassa.
analyzed: savanam ti yoniso manasikāro heṭṭhā vuttaḥ eva pubbabhāga paṭipattiyā ti vipassanā anuyogassa

original: Aveccappasādenāti saccasampaṭivedhavasena buddhādīnaṃ guṇe ñatvā uppannappasādena,
analyzed: avecca ppasādena ati sacca sampaṭivedha vasena buddha ādīnam guṇe ñatvā uppanna ppasādena

original: so pana pasādo devādīsu kenacipi akampiyatāya niccaloti āha “acalappasādenā”ti. Etthāti
analyzed: so pana pasādaḥ deva ādīsu kenacipi a kampiya tāya niccalaḥ ti āha acala ppasādena ati ettha ati

original: etasmiṃ catukkattaye āhāracatukke. Lūkhapaṇītavatthuvasenāti odanakummāsādikassa
analyzed: etasmin catukkattaye āhāra catukke lūkha paṇīta vatthu vasena ati odana kummāsa ādikassa

original: lūkhassa ceva paṇītassa ca vatthuno vasena. Sā panāyaṃ āhārassa oḷārikasukhumatā
analyzed: lūkhassa ca iva paṇītassa ca vatthunaḥ vasena sā pana ayam āhārassa oḷārika sukhuma tā

analyzed: āhāram upādāya morāṇam āhāro sukhumaḥ ti ādinā aṭṭhakathā ayam vitthārato āgatā eva

original: Ārammaṇaṭṭhitivasenāti ārammaṇasaṅkhātassa pavattipaccayaṭṭhānassa vasena. Tiṭṭhati

original: etthāti ṭhiti, ārammaṇameva ṭhiti ārammaṇaṭṭhiti. Tenevāha “rūpārammaṇa”ntiādi. Ārammaṇattho
analyzed: ettha ati ṭhiti ārammaṇam eva ṭhiti ārammaṇa ṭhiti tena iva āha rūpa ārammaṇa ntiādi ārammaṇa atthaḥ

original: cettha upatthambhanattho veditabbo, na visayalakkhaṇova. Upatthambhanabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: ca ittha upatthambhana atthaḥ veditabbaḥ na visaya lakkhaṇaḥ uva upatthambhana bhūtam rūpam

original: upetīti rūpūpāyaṃ. Tenāha “rūpaṃ upagataṃ hutvā”tiādi. Rūpakkhandhaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhati

analyzed: tena vinā appavattanataḥ tanti rūpa kkhandham nissāya ṭhāna ppavattanam etanti

original: etaṃ vacanaṃ. Rūpakkhandho gocaro pavattiṭṭhānaṃ paccayo etassāti rūpakkhandhagocaraṃ
analyzed: etam vacanam rūpa kkhandho gocaraḥ pavatti ṭṭhānam paccayaḥ etassa ati rūpa kkhandha gocaram

original: rūpaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhāvena patiṭṭhā etassāti rūpappatiṭṭhaṃ. Iti tīhi padehi abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: rūpam sahakārī kāraṇa bhāvena patiṭṭhā etassa ati rūpa ppatiṭṭham iti tīhi padehi abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇam

original: pati rūpakkhandhassa sahakārīkāraṇabhāvoyevettha vutto. Upasittaṃ viya upasittaṃ,
analyzed: pati rūpa kkhandhassa vuttaḥ upasittam viya upasittam

original: yathā byañjanehi upasittaṃ sinehitaṃ odanaṃ rucitaṃ, pariṇāmayogyañca, evaṃ nandiyā
analyzed: yathā byañjanehi upasittam sinehitam odanam rucitam pariṇāma yogyam ca evam

original: upasittaṃ sinehitaṃ kammaviññāṇaṃ abhirucitaṃ hutvā vipākayogyaṃ hotīti. Itaranti
analyzed: upasittam sinehitam kamma viññāṇam abhirucitam hutvā vipāka yogyam hoti iti itaranti

original: dosasahagatādiakusalaṃ, kusalañca upanissayakoṭiyā upasittaṃ hutvāti yojanā. Evaṃ
analyzed: dosa sahagata ādi akusalam kusalam ca upanissaya koṭiyā upasittam hutvā iti yojanā evam

original: pavattamānanti evaṃ rūpūpāyanti desanābhāvena pavattamānaṃ. Vipākadhammatāya vuddhiṃ…pe…
analyzed: pavattamānanti evam desanā bhāvena pavattamānam vipāka dhamma tāya

original: āpajjati. Tatthāpi nippariyāyaphalanibbattanavasena vuddhiṃ, pariyāyaphalanibbattanavasena
analyzed: āpajjati tattha api nippariyāya phala nibbattana vasena vuddhim pariyāya phala nibbattana vasena

original: viruḷhiṃ, nissandaphalanibbattanavasena vepullaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaphalanibbattanena
analyzed: viruḷhim nissanda phala nibbattana vasena vepullam diṭṭhadhamma vedanīya phala nibbattanena

original: vā vuddhiṃ, upapajjavedanīyaphalanibbattanavasena viruḷhiṃ, aparāpariyāyaphalanibbattanavasena

original: vepullaṃ āpajjatīti yojanā. Ekantato vedanupāyādivasena patti nāma arūpabhave yevāti
analyzed: vepullam āpajjati iti yojanā ekantataḥ vedan upāya ādi vasena nāma arūpa bhave

original: āha “imehi panā”tiādi. Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ kataṃ vā-saddaggahaṇañca samatthitaṃ
analyzed: āha imehi pana atiādi evañca katvā pāḷiyam katam vāsadda gahaṇam ca samatthitam

original: hoti. “Rūpūpāya”ntiādinā yathā abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa upanissayabhūtā rūpādayo gayhanti,
analyzed: hoti rūpa upāyanti ādinā yathā abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassa upanissaya bhūtāḥ rūpa ādayaḥ gayhanti

original: evaṃ tena nibbattetabbāpi te gayhantīti adhippāyena “catukkavasena…pe… na vutta”nti
analyzed: evam tena nibbattetabbā api te gayhanti iti adhippāyena na vuttam ti

original: āha. Vipākopi hi dhammo vipākadhammaviññāṇaṃ upagataṃ nāma hoti tathā nandiyā upasittattā.
analyzed: āha vipākaḥ api hi dhammaḥ vipāka dhamma viññāṇam upagatam nāma hoti tathā nandiyā upasitta ttā

original: Tenāha “nandūpasecana”nti. Vitthāritāneva siṅgālasutte.
analyzed: tena āha siṅgāla sutte

original: Bhavati etena ārogyanti bhavo, gilānapaccayo. Parivuddho bhavo abhavo. Vuddhiattho
analyzed: bhavati etena ārogyanti bhavaḥ gilāna paccayo parivuddhaḥ bhavaḥ abhavaḥ vuddhi attho

original: hi ayaṃ akāro yathā “saṃvarāsaṃvaro, phalāphalaṃ”ti ca. Telamadhuphāṇitādīnīti ādi-saddena
analyzed: hi ayam akāraḥ yathā ca tela madhu phāṇita ādīni iti ādi saddena

original: sappinavanītānaṃ gahaṇaṃ, telādīnaṃ gahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ. Sabbassāpi gilānapaccayassa
analyzed: sappi navanītānam gahaṇam tela ādīnam gahaṇam ca ittha nidassanam attam sabbassa api gilāna paccayassa

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Atha vā bhavābhavoti khuddako ceva mahanto ca upapattibhavo veditabbo.
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo atha vā bhava abhavo ti khuddako ca iva mahanto ca upapatti bhavo veditabbo

original: Evañca sati “imesaṃ panā”tiādivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Bhavūpapattipahānattho hi
analyzed: evam ca sati imesam pana ati ādi vacanam samatthitam hoti bhava upapatti pahāna atthaḥ hi

original: visesato catutthaariyavaṃso. Taṇhuppādānanti taṇhuppattīnaṃ, cīvarādihetu uppajjanakataṇhānanti
analyzed: visesataḥ catuttha ariya vaṃso taṇhā uppādānam ti taṇhā uppattīnam cīvara ādi hetu uppajjanaka taṇhānam ti

original: attho. Padhānakaraṇakāleti bhāvanānuyogakkhaṇe. Sītādīni na khamatīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgakālaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ padhāna karaṇa kāle iti bhāvanā anuyoga kkhaṇe sītā ādīni na khamati iti bhāvanāya pubbabhāga kālam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Khamatīti sahati abhibhavati. Vitakkasamananti nidassanamattaṃ.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam khamati iti sahati abhibhavati vitakka samanam ti nidassana mattam

original: Sabbesampi kilesānaṃ samanavasena pavattā paṭipadā.
analyzed: sabbesam pi kilesānam samana vasena pavattā paṭipadā

original: Samādhijhānādibhedo dhammo pajjati paṭipajjīyati etenāti dhammapadaṃ. Anabhijjhāva
analyzed: samādhi jhāna ādi bhedaḥ dhammo pajjati paṭipajjīyati etena ati dhamma padam

original: dhammapadaṃ anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva alobhapakkhe nayo, itarapakkhe pana
analyzed: dhamma padam anabhijjhā dhamma padam ayam tāva alobha pakkhe nayaḥ itara pakkhe pana

original: anabhijjhāpadhāno dhammakoṭṭhāso anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ. Akopoti adoso, mettāti attho.
analyzed: anabhijjhā padhānaḥ dhammakoṭṭhāsaḥ anabhijjhā dhamma padam akopo ti adosaḥ mettā ati attho

original: Suppaṭṭhitasatīti kāyādīsu sammadeva upaṭṭhitā sati. Satisīsenāti satipadhānamukhena.
analyzed: su ppaṭṭhita satī iti kāya ādīsu sammat eva upaṭṭhitā sati sati sīsena ati sati padhāna mukhena

original: Samādhipadhānattā jhānānaṃ “samāpatti vā”ti vuttaṃ. Kāmaṃ saviññāṇakaasubhepi jhānabhāvanā

original: alobhappadhānā hoti kāyassa jigucchanena, paṭikkūlākāraggahaṇavasena ca pavattanato,
analyzed: a lobha ppadhānā hoti kāyassa jigucchanena paṭikkūla ākāra ggahaṇa vasena ca pavattanato

original: sattavidhauggahakosallādivasena panassā pavatti satipadhānāti tatiyadhammapadeneva
analyzed: sattavidha oggaha kosalla ādi vasena pana assā pavatti sati padhānā āti tatiya dhamma padena iva

original: naṃ saṅgaṇhitukāmo “dasa asubhavasena vā”ti āha. Hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattanato
analyzed: saṅgaṇhitu kāmaḥ asubha vasena vā āti āha hitu upasaṃhāra ādi vasena pavattanato

original: tatiyadhammapade eva saṅgahaṃ gatā. Āruppasamādhiabhiññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato kasiṇabhāvanā,
analyzed: tatiya dhamma pade eva saṅgaham gatā āruppa samādhi abhiññānam adhiṭṭhāna bhāvato kasiṇa bhāvanā

original: ettheva saṅgahetabbāni siyuṃ, paññāpadhānatāya pana na saṅgahitāni.
analyzed: ettha iva saṅgahetabbāni siyum paññā apadhāna tāya pana na saṅgahitāni

original: Dhammasamādānesu paṭhamaṃ acelakapaṭipadā etarahi ca dukkhabhāvato, anāgatepi apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhāvahato.

original: Acelakapaṭipadāti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ channaparibbājakānampi ubhayadukkhāvahapaṭipattidassanato.
analyzed: acelaka paṭipadā iti ca nidassana mattam daṭṭhabbam channa paribbājakānam pi ubhaya dukkha āvaha paṭipatti dassanato

original: Dutiyaṃ…pe… brahmacariyacaraṇaṃ etarahi satipi dukkhe āyatiṃ sukhāvahattā. Kāmesu
analyzed: brahmacariya caraṇam etarahi sati pi dukkhe āyatim sukha āvaha tā kāmesu

original: Dussīlyādipāpadhammānaṃ khambhanaṃ paṭibandhanaṃ khandhaṭṭho, so pana sīlādi evāti
analyzed: dussīlya ādi pāpa dhammānam khambhanam paṭibandhanam khandhaṭṭho so pana sīla ādi eva ati

original: āha “guṇaṭṭho khandhaṭṭho”ti. Guṇavisayatāya khandha-saddassa guṇatthatā veditabbā.
analyzed: āha guṇa ṭṭho khandha ṭṭho ti guṇa visaya tāya khandha saddassa guṇa ttha tā veditabbā

original: Vimuttikkhandhoti paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu vimuttā guṇadhammā adhippetā, na avimuttā,
analyzed: vimutti kkhandho ti paṭipakkhataḥ suṭṭhu vimuttāḥ guṇa dhammāḥ adhippetāḥ na a vimuttā

original: adhippetaṃ, catūsupi ṭhānesu phalameva vutta”nti ca. Eteneva cettha vimuttikkhandhoti
analyzed: adhippetam catūsu pi ṭhānesu phalam eva vuttan ti ca etena iva ca ittha vimutti khandho ti

original: phalapariyāpannā sammāsaṅkappavāyāmasatiyo adhippetāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: phala pariyāpannā sammāsaṅkappa vāyāma satiyaḥ adhippetā iti veditabbam

original: Upatthambhanaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammānaṃ tattha thirabhāvena pavattanato, eteneva
analyzed: upatthambhana ṭṭhena sampayutta dhammānam tattha thira bhāvena pavattanataḥ etena iva

original: ahirikaanottappānampi savisaye balaṭṭho siddho veditabbo. Na hi tesaṃ paṭipakkhehi
analyzed: ahirika anottappānam pi sa visaye balaṭṭhaḥ siddhaḥ veditabbaḥ na hi tesam paṭipakkhehi

original: akampiyaṭṭho ekantiko. Hirottappānañhi akampiyaṭṭho sātisayo kusaladhammānaṃ mahābalabhāvato,

original: akusalānañca dubbalabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā “abalā naṃ balīyanti, maddante naṃ parissayā”ti
analyzed: akusalānam ca dubbala bhāvataḥ tena āha bhagavā abalāḥ nam balīyanti maddante nam

original: bodhipakkhiyadhammavasenāyaṃ desanāti “samathavipassanāmaggavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya dhamma vasena ayam desanā ati samatha vipassanā magga vasena ati vuttam

original: Adhīti upasaggamattaṃ, na “adhicitta”ntiādīsu viya adhikārādiatthaṃ. Karaṇādhikaraṇabhāvasādhanavasena
analyzed: adhi iti upasagga mattam na adhicittam ti ādīsu viya adhikāra ādi attham karaṇa adhikaraṇa bhāva sādhana vasena

original: adhiṭṭhāna-saddassa atthaṃ dassento “tena vā”tiādimāha. Tena adhiṭṭhānena tiṭṭhanti
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna saddassa attham dassento tena vā ti ādim āha tena adhiṭṭhānena tiṭṭhanti

original: attano sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ guṇādhikā purisā, te eva tattha adhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti sammāpattiyā,
analyzed: attano sammāpaṭipattiyam guṇa adhikā purisā te eva tattha adhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti sammāpattiyā

original: ṭhānameva adhiṭṭhānameva sammāpaṭipattiyanti yojanā. Paṭhamena adhiṭṭhānena. Aggaphalapaññāti
analyzed: ṭhānam eva adhiṭṭhānam eva sammā paṭipattiyanti yojanā paṭhamena adhiṭṭhānena agga phala paññā ti

original: ukkaṭṭhaniddesoyaṃ. Kilesūpasamoti kilesānaṃ accantavūpasamo. Paṭhamena nayena adhiṭṭhānāni
analyzed: ukkaṭṭha niddeso yam kilesūpasamo ti kilesānam paṭhamena nayena adhiṭṭhānāni

original: ekadesatova gahitāni, na nippadesatoti nippadesatova tāni dassetuṃ “paṭhamena cā”tiādi
analyzed: eka desataḥ iva gahitāni na nippadesato ti nippadesataḥ iva tāni dassetum paṭhamena ca atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. “Ādiṃ katvā”ti etena jhānābhiññāpaññañceva maggapaññañca saṅgaṇhāti. Vacīsaccaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ādim katvā iti etena jhāna abhiññā paññañca iva magga paññañca saṅgaṇhāti vacī saccam

original: ādiṃ katvāti ādi-saddena viratisaccaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tatiyena ādi-saddena kilesānaṃ
analyzed: ādim katvā iti ādi saddena virati saccam saṅgaṇhāti tatiyena ādi saddena kilesānam

original: vītikkamapariccāgaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānapariccāgaṃ, heṭṭhimamaggehi anusayapariccāgañca
analyzed: vītikkama pariccāgam pariyuṭṭhāna pariccāgam heṭṭhima maggehi anusaya pariccāgam ca

original: saṅgaṇhāti. “Vikkhambhite kilese”ti etena samāpattīhi kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti vikkhambhite kilese iti etena samāpattīhi kilesānam vikkhambhana vasena

original: vūpasamaṃ vatvā ādi-saddena heṭṭhimamaggehi kātabbaṃ tesaṃ samucchedavasena vūpasamaṃ
analyzed: vūpasamam vatvā ādi saddena heṭṭhima maggehi kātabbam tesam samuccheda vasena vūpasamam

original: saṅgaṇhāti. Arahattaphalapaññā kathitā ukkaṭṭhaniddesatova, aññathā vacīsaccādīnampi
analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti arahatta phala paññā kathitā ukkaṭṭha niddesato va aññathā vacī sacca ādīnam pi

original: gahaṇaṃ siyā. Nibbānañca asammosadhammatāya uttamaṭṭhena saccaṃ, sabbasaṃkilesapariccāganimittatāya
analyzed: gahaṇam siyā nibbānam ca asammosa dhamma tāya uttama aṭṭhena saccam sabba saṃkilesa pariccāga nimitta tāya

original: Pañhabyākaraṇādicatukkavaṇṇanā

analyzed: nibbedhabhāgiya chakka vaṇṇanā

analyzed: sattaka vaṇṇanā

original: Samādhiṃ parikkharonti abhisaṅkharontīti samādhiparikkhārā, samādhissa sambhārabhūtā sammādiṭṭhiādayo. Idha pana sahakārīkāraṇabhūtā adhippetāti āha “samādhiparivārā”ti.

analyzed: vivāda vatthu saṅkhāte atthe paccatthikā attha paccatthikā saṅgha sammukha tā parihāyati

original: Nanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. “Na chandāgatiṃ gacchatī”tiādinā vuttaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ.
analyzed: vivāda adhikaraṇam na chanda āgatim gacchati iti ādinā vuttam pañcaṅga samannāgatam

original: Guḷhakādīsu alajjussannāya parisāya guḷhako salākaggāho kātabbo lajjussannāya vivaṭako,
analyzed: guḷhaka ādīsu a lajju ssannāya parisāya guḷhakaḥ salāka ggāhaḥ kātabbaḥ lajju ssannāya vivaṭakaḥ

original: bālussannāya sakaṇṇajappako. Yassā kiriyāya dhammavādino bahutarā, sā yebhuyyasikāti
analyzed: yassa kiriyāya dhamma vādinaḥ bahutarā sā yebhuyyasikā ati

original: āha “dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: āha dhamma vādīnam yebhuyyatāya atiādi

original: “Catūhi samathehi sammatī”ti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. Tattha pana dvīhi
analyzed: catūhi samathehi sammatī ti idam sabba saṅgāhika vasena vuttam tattha pana dvīhi

original: dvīhi eva vūpasamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ vinicchitanti sace āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā,
analyzed: dvīhi eva vūpasamanam daṭṭhabbam evam vinicchitanti sace āpatti natthi ubho khamāpetvā

original: atha atthi, āpattiṃ dassetvā ropanavasena vinicchitaṃ. Paṭikammaṃ pana āpattādhikaraṇasamathe parato āgamissati.
analyzed: atha atthi āpattim dassetvā ropana vasena vinicchitam paṭikammam pana āpatta adhikaraṇa samathe paratas āgamissati

original: Na samaṇasāruppaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ, samaṇehi akattabbaṃ, tasmiṃ. Ajjhācāre vītikkame sati.
analyzed: na samaṇa sāruppam a ssāmaṇakam samaṇehi a kattabbam tasmin ajjhācāre vītikkame sati

original: Paṭicaratoti paṭicchādentassa. Pāpussannatāya pāpiyo, puggalo, tassa kattabbakammaṃ
analyzed: paṭicarato ti paṭicchādentassa pāpussanna tāya pāpiyaḥ puggalo tassa kattabba kammaṃ

original: tassa pāpiyasikaṃ. Sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi paṭiññāya tathārūpāya, khantiyā
analyzed: tassa pāpiyasikam sammukha avinayena iva vūpasamaḥ natthi paṭiññāya tathārūpāya khantiyā

original: vā vinā avūpasamanato.
analyzed: vā vinā

original: Etthāti āpattidesanāya. Paṭiññāte āpannabhāvādike karaṇaṃ kiriyā “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti, parivāsadānādivasena ca pavattaṃ vacīkammaṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ati āpatti desanāya paṭiññāte āpanna bhāva ādike karaṇam kiriyā āyatim saṃvareyyāsi iti parivāsa dāna ādi vasena ca pavattam vacī kammam paṭiññāta karaṇam

original: Yathānurūpanti “dvīhi samathehi catūhi tīhi ekenā”ti evaṃ vuttanayena yathānurūpaṃ.
analyzed: yathānurūpam ti dvīhi samathehi catūhi tīhi ekena ati evam vutta nayena yathānurūpam

original: Etthāti imasmiṃ sutte, imasmiṃ vā samathavicāre. Vinicchayanayoti vinicchaye nayamattaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ati imasmin sutte imasmin vā samatha vicāre vinicchaya nayoti vinicchaye naya mattam

original: Tenāha “vitthāro panā”tiādi. Samantapāsādikāyaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathāya vutto, tasmā vuttanayeneva
analyzed: tena āha vitthāraḥ pana atiādi samantapāsādikāyam vinaya ṭṭhakathāya vutto tasmā vutta nayena iva

original: veditabboti adhippāyo.
analyzed: veditabbaḥ iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Sattakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sattaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Niṭṭhitā ca dutiyabhāṇavāravaṇṇanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca dutiya bhāṇa vāra vaṇṇanā

original: Aṭṭhakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: aṭṭhaka vaṇṇanā

original: 333. Ayāthāvāti na yāthāvā. Aniyyānikatāya micchāsabhāvā. Viparītavuttikatāya yāthāvā. Niyyānikatāya sammāsabhāvā aviparītavuttikā.
analyzed: ayāthāvā ati na yāthāvā a niyyānika tāya micchā sabhāvā viparīta vuttika tāya yāthāvā niyyānika tāya sammāsabhāvā aviparīta vuttikā

original: 334. Kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. Yassa dhammassa vasena
analyzed: kucchitam sīdati iti kusītaḥ dakārassa takāram katvā yassa dhammassa vasena

original: puggalo “kusīto”ti vuccati, so kusītabhāvo idha kusīta-saddena vutto. Vināpi hi bhāvajotanaṃ
analyzed: puggalo kusīto ti vuccati saḥ kusīta bhāvaḥ idha kusīta saddena vuttaḥ vinā api hi bhāva jotanam

original: saddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā “paṭassa sukka”nti, tasmā kusītabhāvavatthūnīti
analyzed: saddam bhāva tthaḥ viññāyati yathā paṭassa tasmā kusīta bhāva vatthūni iti

original: attho. Tenāha “kosajjakāraṇānīti attho”ti. Kammaṃ nāma samaṇasāruppaṃ īdisanti āha
analyzed: tena āha kosajja kāraṇāni iti attho ti kammam nāma samaṇa sāruppam īdisanti āha

original: “cīvaravicāraṇādī”ti. Vīriyanti padhānavīriyaṃ, taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe “kāyika”ntipi
analyzed: cīvara vicāraṇā ādi iti tam pana caṅkamana vasena karaṇe

original: vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “duvidhampī”ti. Pattiyāti pāpuṇanatthaṃ. Osīdananti bhāvanānuyoge
analyzed: vattabba tam labhati iti āha duvidham pi iti pattiyā ati pāpuṇana attham osīdanam ti bhāvanā anuyoge

original: saṅkoco. Māsehi ācitaṃ nicitaṃ viyāti māsācitaṃ, taṃ maññe. Yasmā māsā tintāvisesena
analyzed: saṅkocaḥ māsehi ācitam nicitam viyāti māsa ācitam tam maññe yasmā māsā tintā visesena

original: garukā honti, tasmā “yathā tintamāso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhito hoti gilānabhāvāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: garukāḥ honti tasmā yathā tintamāso tiādi vuttam vuṭṭhitaḥ hoti gilāna bhāvā ti adhippāyaḥ

original: 335. Tesanti ārambhavatthūnaṃ. Imināva nayenāti iminā kusītavatthūsu vutteneva nayena.
analyzed: tesam ti ārambha vatthūnam iminā ava nayena ati iminā kusīta vatthūsu vuttena iva nayena

original: “Duvidhampi vīriyaṃ ārabhatī”tiādinā, “idaṃ paṭhamanti idaṃ handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmīti
analyzed: duvidham pi vīriyam ārabhati itiādinā idam idam handa aham vīriyam ārabhāmi iti

original: evaṃ bhāvanāya abbhussahanaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārambhavatthū”tiādinā ca attho veditabbo. Yathā
analyzed: evam bhāvanāya abbhussahanam paṭhamam ca atthaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā

original: tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ abbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti. Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni
analyzed: tathā paṭhamam pavattam abbhussahanam hi upari vīriya ārambhassa kāraṇam hoti anurūpa paccavekkhaṇā sahitāni

original: hi abbhussahanāni, tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni veditabbāni.
analyzed: hi abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha ārambha vatthūni veditabbāni

original: 336. Āsajjāti yassa deti, tassa āmodanahetu tena samāgamanimittaṃ. Tenāha “ettha
analyzed: āsajjāti yassa deti tassa āmodana hetu tena samāgama nimittam tena āha ettha

original: āsādanaṃ dānakāraṇaṃ nāmā”ti. Bhayāti bhayahetu. Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhukāmatā rāgādayo
analyzed: āsādanam dāna kāraṇam nāma ati bhaya ati bhaya hetu nanu bhayam nāma laddhu kāma tā rāga ādayaḥ

original: viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ, taṃ kasmā idha gahitanti? Na idaṃ tādisaṃ corabhayādiṃ
analyzed: cetanāya a visuddhi karam tam kasmai idha naḥ idam tādisam

original: sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adāsi meti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ
analyzed: sandhāya vuttanti dassetum tattha atiādi vuttam adāsi mā iti yam pubbe katam upakāram

original: cintetvā dīyati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dassati meti paccupakārāsīsāya yaṃ dīyati,
analyzed: cintetvā dīyati tam sandhāya vuttam dassati mā iti paccupakāra āsīsāya yam dīyati

original: taṃ sandhāya vadati. Sāhu dānanti “dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññatta”nti sādhusamācāre
analyzed: tam sandhāya vadati sāhu dānam ti dānam nāma etam paṇḍita paññattam ti sādhu samācāre

original: ṭhatvā deti. Alaṅkāratthanti upasobhanatthaṃ. Parivāratthanti parikkhāratthaṃ. Dānañhi
analyzed: ṭhatvā deti alaṅkāra tthanti upasobhana tthanti parivāra tthanti parikkhāra tthanti dānañhi

original: datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo uppajjanti, lobhadosaissāmaccherādayo
analyzed: tam paccavekkhantassa pāmojja pīti somanassa ādayaḥ uppajjanti

original: vidūrī bhavanti. Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena, paccanīkadhammavidūrībhāvakaraṇena
analyzed: vidūrī bhavanti idāni dānam anukūla dhamma paribrūhanena paccanīka dhamma vidūrībhāva karaṇena

original: ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya ca parikkhārāya ca hotīti “alaṅkāratthaṃ, parivāratthañca
analyzed: ca bhāvanā cittassa upasobhanāya ca parikkhārāya ca hoti iti alaṅkāra attham parivāra attham ca

original: detī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “dānañhi cittaṃ mudukaṃ karotī”tiādi. Muducitto hoti laddhā
analyzed: deti iti vuttam tena āha dānam hi cittam mudukam karoti itiādi mudu cittaḥ hoti laddhā

original: dāyake “iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato”ti, dātāpi laddhari. Tena vuttaṃ “ubhinnampi cittaṃ mudukaṃ karotī”ti.
analyzed: dāyake iminā mayham saṅgaho kato ti dātā api laddhari tena vuttam ubhinnam api cittam mudukam karoti iti

original: Adantadamananti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti vase vattanti. Adānaṃ
analyzed: adanta damananti adantāḥ anassava apissa dānena dantāḥ assavāḥ honti vase vattanti adānam

original: dantadūsakanti adānaṃ pana pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti.
analyzed: danta dūsakam ti adānam pana pubbe dantānam assavānam pi vighāta uppādanena cittam dūseti

original: Unnamanti dāyakā, piyaṃvadā ca paresaṃ garucittīkāraṭṭhānatāya. Namanti paṭiggāhakā
analyzed: unnamanti dāyakā piyaṃvadā ca paresam garu cittīkāra ṭṭhāna tāya namanti paṭiggāhakā

original: dānena, piyavācāya laddhasaṅgahā saṅgāhakānaṃ.
analyzed: dānena piya vācāya laddha saṅgahā saṅgāha kānam

original: Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya, suparisuddhatāya, guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca.
analyzed: citta alaṅkāra dānam eva uttamam an upakkiliṭṭha tāya su parisuddha tāya guṇa visesa paccaya tāya ca

original: 337. Dānapaccayāti dānakāraṇā, dānamayapuññassa katattā upacitattāti attho. Upapattiyoti
analyzed: dāna paccayā ti dāna kāraṇā dāna maya puññassa katattā upacita ttā ati atthaḥ upapattiyā ti

original: manussesu, devesu ca nibbattiyo. Ṭhapetīti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā uparūpari
analyzed: manussesu devesu ca nibbattiyaḥ ṭhapeti iti eka vāram eva an uppajjitvā yathā upari upari

original: tenevākārena pavattati, evaṃ ṭhapeti. Tadeva casa adhiṭṭhānanti āha “tasseva vevacana”nti.
analyzed: tena iva ākārena pavattati evam ṭhapeti tat eva āha tassa iva vevacanan ti

original: Vaḍḍhetīti brūheti, na hāpeti. Vimuttanti adhimuttaṃ, ninnaṃ poṇaṃ pabbhāranti attho.
analyzed: vaḍḍheti iti brūha iti na hāpa iti vimuttanti adhimuttam ninnam poṇam pabbhāram ti attho

original: Vimuttanti vā visiṭṭhaṃ. Nippariyāyato uttari nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa
analyzed: vimuttam ti vā visiṭṭham nippariyāyataḥ uttari nāma paṇītam majjhe pi hīna majjhima vibhāgassa

original: labbhanatoti vuttaṃ “uttari abhāvitanti tato upari maggaphalatthāya abhāvita”nti.
analyzed: labbhanato ti vuttam uttari abhāvitanti tatas upari magga phala atthāya abhāvitanti

original: Saṃvattati tathā paṇihitaṃ dānamayacittaṃ. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “tañca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
analyzed: saṃvattati tathā paṇihitam dāna maya cittam yam pana pāḷiyam tat ca kho ti ādi vuttam

original: taṃ tatrūpapattiyā vibandhakāradussīlyābhāvadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na dānamayassa
analyzed: tam tatrūpapattiyā vibandha kāra dussīlya abhāva dassana param daṭṭhabbam na dāna mayassa

original: puññassa kevalassa taṃsaṃvattanatādassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: puññassa kevalassa tad saṃvattana tā dassana paran ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Samucchinnarāgassāti samucchinnakāmarāgassa. Tassa hi siyā brahmaloke upapatti, na
analyzed: samucchinna rāgassa ati samucchinna kāma rāgassa tassa hi siyā brahma loke upapatti na

original: samucchinnabhavarāgassa. Vītarāgaggahaṇena cettha kāmesu vītarāgatā adhippetā, yāya
analyzed: samucchinna bhava rāgassa vīta rāga ggahaṇena ca ittha kāmesu vīta rāga tā adhippetā

original: brahmalokūpapatti siyā. Tenāha “dānamattenevā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kiṃ atthiyanti
analyzed: siyā tena āha dāna mattena iva atiādi yadi evam dānam tattha kim

original: āha “dānaṃ panā”tiādi. Dānena muducittoti baddhāghāte verīpuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
analyzed: āha dānam pana atiādi dānena mudu cittaḥ ti baddha āghāte verī puggalaḥ pi attanaḥ dāna sampaṭicchanena mudu bhūta cittaḥ

original: Parisīdati parito ito cito ca samāgacchatīti parisā, samūho.
analyzed: parisīdati paritas itas citas ca samāgacchati iti parisā samūhaḥ

original: Lokassa dhammāti sattalokassa avassambhāvī dhammā. Tenāha “etehi mutto nāma natthī”tiādi.
analyzed: lokassa dhammā ti satta lokassa avassambhāvī dhammā tena āha etehi muttaḥ nāma natthi itiādi

original: Yasmā te lokadhammā aparāparaṃ kadāci lokaṃ anupatanti, kadāci te loko, tasmā tañcettha
analyzed: yasmai te loka dhammāḥ apara aparam kadācid lokam anupatanti kadācid te tasmai tat ca itthā

original: atthaṃ dassento “aṭṭhime”ti suttapadaṃ āhari. Ghāsacchādanādīnaṃ laddhi lābho, tāni
analyzed: attham dassentaḥ aṭṭhimā iti sutta padam āhari ghāsa chādana ādīnam tāni

original: eva vā laddhabbato lābho. Tadabhāvo alābho. Lābhaggahaṇena cettha tabbisayo anurodho
analyzed: eva vā laddhabbataḥ lābhaḥ tad abhāvaḥ alābhaḥ lābha ggahaṇena ca ittha tad visayaḥ anurodhaḥ

original: gahito, alābhaggahaṇena virodho. Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodhe
analyzed: gahitaḥ alābha ggahaṇena virodhaḥ yasmā lohite sati tad upaghāta vasena pubbaḥ viya anurodhe

original: sati virodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “lābhe āgate alābho āgato evā”ti.
analyzed: sati virodhaḥ laddha avasaraḥ eva hoti tasmā vuttam lābhe āgate alābho āgataḥ eva ati

original: Esa nayo yasādīsupi.
analyzed: e sa nayaḥ yas ādī supi

original: Aṭṭhakavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aṭṭhaka vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Navakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: navaka vaṇṇanā

original: 340. Vasati tattha phalaṃ tannimittakatāya pavattatīti vatthu, kāraṇanti vuttovāyamattho.
analyzed: vasati tattha phalam tad nimittaka tāya pavattati iti vatthu kāraṇam ti vuttaḥ uva ayam atthaḥ

original: Tenāha “āghātavatthūnīti āghātakāraṇānī”ti. Kopo nāmāyaṃ yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: tena āha āghāta vatthūni iti āghāta kāraṇāni iti kopaḥ nāma ayam yasmim vatthusmim uppajjati

original: na tattha ekavārameva uppajjati, atha kho punapi uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “bandhatī”ti.
analyzed: na tattha eka vāram eva uppajjati atha kho puna api uppajjateva ati vuttam bandhati iti

original: Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati,

original: punapi uppajjeyyeva, taṃ sandhāyāha “āghātaṃ bandhatī”ti. Taṃ panassa paccayavasena
analyzed: puna api uppajjeyya eva tam sandhāya āha āghātam bandhati iti tam panassa paccaya vasena

original: nibbattanaṃ uppādanamevāti vuttaṃ “karoti uppādetī”ti.
analyzed: nibbattanam uppādanam eva ati vuttam karoti uppādeti iti

original: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, padajjhāhārena ca attho veditabboti

original: dassento “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha. Kena kāraṇena laddhabbaṃ niratthakabhāvato.
analyzed: dassentaḥ tam anattha caraṇam mā ahosi itiādim āha kena kāraṇena laddhabbam niratthaka bhāvataḥ

original: Kammassakā hi sattā, te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā, sukhitā vā bhavanti, tasmā kevalaṃ
analyzed: kammassakāḥ hi sattā te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā sukhitāḥ vā bhavanti tasmai kevalam

original: tasmiṃ mayhaṃ kujjhanamattaṃ evāti adhippāyo. Atha vā taṃ kopakaraṇamettha puggale

original: kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa, kujjhanakassa ca abhāvato. Saṅkhāramattañhetaṃ,
analyzed: kutas labbhā paramatthataḥ kujjhitabbassa kujjhanakassa ca abhāvataḥ saṅkhāra mattam hetam

original: yadidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Yaṃ “satto”ti vuccati, te saṅkhārā ittarakālā khaṇikā, kassa
analyzed: yat idam khandha pañcakam yam sattā ti vuccati te saṅkhārāḥ ittara kālā khaṇikā kassa

original: ko kujjhatīti attho. Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anuppattito.
analyzed: kaḥ kujjhati iti atthaḥ lābhāḥ nāma ke siyum aññatra anuppattito

original: 341. Sattā āvasanti etesūti sattāvāsā. Nānattakāyā nānattasaññī ādibhedā sattanikāyā.
analyzed: sattāḥ āvasanti etesu iti sattāvāsā nānatta kāyā nānatta saññī ādi bhedā satta nikāyā

original: Yasmā te te sattanikāyā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro

analyzed: attho imam eva suttam āvajjamānā ati imasmin sutte tattha tattha āgate abhiññeyya ādi bhede

original: dhamme abhijānanādivasena samannāharantā. Saha paṭisambhidāhi…pe… patiṭṭhahiṃsūti
analyzed: dhamme abhijānana ādi vasena samannāharantā saha paṭisambhidā āhipe patiṭṭhahiṃsu iti

original: attano upanissayasampannatāya, therassa ca desanānubhāvena yathāraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ upanissaya sampanna tāya therassa ca desanā anubhāvena yathā āraddham vipassanam

original: ussukketvā paṭisambhidāparivārāya abhiññāya saṇṭhahiṃsūti.
analyzed: ussukketvā paṭisambhidā parivārāya abhiññāya saṇṭhahiṃsu iti

original: Sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīgha nikāya ṭṭhakathāya

original: Dasuttarasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā.
Niṭṭhitā ca pāthikavaggaṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca pāthika vagga ṭṭhakathāya līna attha ppakāsanā

original: Pāthikavaggaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: pāthika vagga ṭīkā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā

original: Therānaṃ mahākassapādīnaṃ vaṃso paveṇī anvayo etassāti theravaṃsanvayo, tena; catumahānikāyesu theriyenāti attho.
analyzed: therānam mahākassapa ādīnam vaṃsaḥ paveṇī anvayaḥ etassa ati thera vaṃsa nvayaḥ tena catu mahā nikāyesu theriyena ati attho

original: Dasabalassa sammāsambuddhassa guṇagaṇānaṃ paridīpanato dasabalaguṇagaṇaparidīpanassa.
analyzed: dasabalassa sammāsambuddhassa guṇa gaṇānam paridīpanataḥ dasa bala guṇa gaṇa paridīpanassa

original: Ayañhi āgamo brahmajālādīsu, mahāpadānādīsu, sampasādanīyādīsu ca tattha tattha visesato
analyzed: ayan hi āgamaḥ brahmajāla ādīsu mahāpadāna ādīsu sampasādanīya ādīsu ca tattha tattha visesato

original: buddhaguṇānaṃ pakāsanavasena pavattoti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ādito “saddhāvahaguṇassā”ti.
analyzed: buddha guṇānam pakāsana vasena pavattaḥ ti tathā hi vuttam āditas saddhā vaha guṇassa ti

original: Mahāṭṭhakathāya sāranti dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthasāraṃ.
analyzed: mahā aṭṭhakathāya dīgha nikāya mahā aṭṭhakathāyam attha sāram

original: Ekūnasaṭṭhimattoti thokaṃ ūnabhāvato matta-saddaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: thokam ūna bhāvataḥ matta sadda gahaṇam

original: Mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāranti pubbe vuttaṃ dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāsārameva puna nigamanavasena
analyzed: mūlaka ṭṭhakathā sāram ti pubbe vuttam dīgha nikāya mahā aṭṭhakathā sāram eva puna nigamana vasena

original: vadati. Atha vā mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāranti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ, tenetaṃ dasseti
analyzed: vadati atha vā mūlaka ṭṭhakathā sāram ti porāṇa aṭṭhakathāsu attha sāram tena itam dasseti

original: “dīghanikāyamahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ sumaṅgalavilāsiniṃ karonto sesamahānikāyānampi
analyzed: attha sāram ādāya imam sumaṅgalavilāsinim karonto sesa mahā nikāyānam pi

original: mūlakaṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāyayeva akāsi”nti.
analyzed: mūlaka ṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyoga khamam attha sāram akāsinti

original: “Mahāvihāravāsīna”nti [mahāvihāre nivāsinaṃ (aṭṭhakathāyaṃ)] ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi
analyzed: mahāvihāra vāsīnam ti mahāvihāre nivāsinam ca idam purima pacchima padehi

original: saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ “mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ samayaṃ pakāsayantiṃ, mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
analyzed: saddhim sambandhitabbam mahā vihāra vāsīnam samayam pakāsayantim mahā vihāra vāsīnam

original: mūlakaṭṭhakathāsāraṃ ādāyā”ti ca. Tena puññena. Hotu sabbo sukhī lokoti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo
analyzed: mūlaka ṭṭhakathā sāram ādāya ati ca tena puññena hotu sabbaḥ sukhī loko ti kāmāvacara ādi vibhāgaḥ

original: sabbopi sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamanavasena sampattena nibbānasukhena
analyzed: sabbaḥ api satta lokaḥ yathāraham bodhi ttayā adhigamana vasena sampattena nibbāna sukhena

original: sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantasukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
analyzed: sukhitaḥ hotu uti sa devakassa lokassa accanta sukha adhigamāya attano puññam pariṇāmeti

original: Parimāṇato sādhikaṭṭhavīsasahassanavutibhāṇavārā niṭṭhitāti. Parimāṇato sādhikaṭṭhavīsasahassamattaganthena dīghanikāyaṭīkā racitācariyadhammapālena.
analyzed: parimāṇato sādhika ṭṭha vīsa sahassa navuti bhāṇa vārā niṭṭhitā ati parimāṇato sādhika ṭṭha vīsa sahassa matta ganthena dīgha nikāya ṭīkā racitā ācariya dhammapālena

original: Micchādiṭṭhādicorehi, sīlādidhanasañcayaṃ;
analyzed: micchādiṭṭha ādi corehi sīla ādi dhana sañcayam

original: Rakkhaṇatthāya sakkaccaṃ, mañjūsaṃ viya kāritanti. (etthantare pāṭho pacchā likhito)
analyzed: rakkhaṇa atthāya sakkaccam mañjūsam viya kāritanti etthantare pāṭhaḥ pacchā likhito

original: Niṭṭhitā sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsanā.
analyzed: niṭṭhitā sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīgha nikāya ṭṭhakathāya līna attha ppakāsanā

original: Dīghanikāyaṭīkā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dīgha nikāya ṭīkā niṭṭhitā
